So make yu leave mi make I distroy all of dem komot from dis eart. Den I go make strong and mighty pipol from yor shidren-shidren.”
So I turn komot di mountin as di fire still dey burn and di two kovenant stones dey my hand.
Wen I rish where una dey, I si sey una don really sin against di Oga una God and una don make juju for unasef; una don kwik-kwik turn komot from di way wey God kommand una!
So I take di two kovenant stones wey di kommandment dey kon skata dem for una front.
Den I go stay for God present for anoda forty days and forty nite; I nor chop or drink anytin bikos of all di sins wey una don kommit wen una dey do wiked tins wey go make God vex well-well.
I dey fear God vexnashon, bikos E sey E go distroy una. But dis time, E still listin to mi again.
God vex well-well for Aaron and E won kon distroy am too. But I pray for Aaron and God kon sorry for am.
I take una sin; di juju wey una make kon melt and grind am till e bi like san-san. Den I pour am for wota wey dey flow kom from di mountin.
And una still make God vex for Taberah, Massah and Kibrot Hattaavah.
Den wen E send una from Kadesh Barnea kon sey, “Make una go take di land wey I don give una,” una still sin against di Oga una God, bikos una nor bilive or obey am.
Una don dey sin against di Oga una God rite from di first day wey I know una!
I liedan for groun for God present for forty days and forty nite, bikos E sey E go distroy una.
I pray to am, “My Oga God, make Yu nor distroy yor pipol wey bi yor betta propaty; pipol wey Yu save with yor own pawa kon take dem komot from Egypt with yor strent.
Make Yu remember yor savant, Abraham, Isaak and Jakob; den nor look as dis pipol sturbon, wiked and di sins wey dem dey kommit.
Bikos if Yu distroy dem, Egypt pipol go sey, ‘God nor fit karry dem go rish di land wey E promise dem and bikos God hate dem well-well, E take dem komot here go kill for di wildaness.’
Dem bi yor pipol, yor betta propaty wey Yu take komot Egypt with yor great strent and pawa.”
For dat time, God kon tell mi, “Make yu kut two stones like di first ones den kom meet mi for di mountin; make yu still make box with wood for yorsef.
Di same word wey dey di stones wey yu break, I go rite dem put for dis ones and yu must put dem for di box.”
So I use akasia wood take make box kon kut two stone like di first ones. Den I klimb go di mountin with di two stones for my hand.
So di same word wey bi di ten kommandment wey E tell mi for di mountin and from di fire wen una gada go meet am, God kon rite dem put for dis ones as E bin rite am for di first stones.
Den I kom down from di mountin kon put di two stones for di box wey I make, just as God kommand mi and di stones still dey der.
For dat time, Israel pipol travel from Beerot Bene Jaakan go Mosera. Aaron die for der and dem beri am and en pikin Eleazar kon take-ova as priest.
From der, dem travel go Gudgodah kon from der travel go Jotbatah where wota for dey flow.
For dat time, God separate Levi tribe sey make dem karry God Kovenant Box kon stand for God present to serve am and na dem go dey bless pipol with en name and na so e bi till today.
Dat na why Levi pipol nor get propaty or land among di oda tribes for Israel. Na God ensef bi dia propaty, just as di Oga una God tok.
But for mi, I stay for di mountin just as I do for di first time for forty days and forty nite. For dat time, God still listin to mi kon sey E nor go distroy una.
Den E tell mi, “Make yu and di pipol start una journey, so dat dem go-go kollect di land wey I promise dia grand-grand papa.”

Naw, Israel pipol, wetin di Oga una God wont from unasef? E wont make una dey fear am kon dey live di kind life wey E wont make una live. E wont make una love, respet and serve am with all una soul and heart.
Una must always obey God kommand and law wey I dey give una today, so dat evritin go dey well with una.
Di heavens, di heavens wey high pass, plus di eart and evritin wey dey inside am, na God get all of dem.
Yet God show en love to una grand-grand papa dem. And E choose una wey bi dia grand-shidren above evry oda pipol, as all of us dey si am today.
So make una shange una heart and stop to dey do strong head.
Bikos di Oga una God na God of all gods and Oga of all ogas. Na en bi di great Oga God, di God wey dey do wonders, God wey nor dey do wayo and nobody fit bribe am.
Doz wey nor get papa and mama and doz wey nor get husband again, E dey make sure sey E fight for dem. E dey show love to strenjas wey dey stay with una kon give dem food and klot to wear.
So una too must show love to strenjas, bikos unasef bi strenja for Egypt before.
Una must fear di Oga una God kon woship and love am. Wen una swear, e go must bi with en name.
Na only en bi God; di only one wey wi go dey praiz; di Pesin wey don do many wonderful mirakles wey una don si with una own eyes.
Wen una grand-grand papa dem go Egypt, dem bi only seventy. But naw, di Oga una God don make una plenty like di stars for sky!
Una must love di Oga wey bi una God kon obey evritin wey E tok. Dat is, en law, rules and kommand wey E give una.
Make una know for una mind sey, I nor dey tok to una shidren wey neva si as di Oga una God judgement bi or si as E big and strong rish.
Dem nor si all di wonderful signs wey E do for una wen una dey serve King Fero and en pipol for Egypt.
Dem nor si wetin God do to Egypt sojas and dia shariot. How E take kill dem for di Red Sea wen dem dey porshu una. E distroy dem finish and dem neva fit balance kon rish today!
Una shidren nor si wetin God do for una wen una dey di wildaness before una rish here.
Dem nor si wetin E do to Datan and Abiram (wey Eliab wey kom from Reuben tribe, bi dia papa) wen groun open for Israel kamp kon swallow dem with dia family, dia house and evritin wey dem get.
But I dey tok to una bikos na una si all di wonderful tins wey God do!
Naw, make una listin to all en kommand wey I dey give una today, so dat una go strong rish to kollect and enter di land wey una dey go so.
If una obey di kommand, una go get long life for di land wey God promise sey, E go give una grand-grand papa and una wey bi dia shidren; land wey milk and honey full!
Bikos di land wey una go soon enter go stay, nor bi like Egypt where una from dey kom and where una nid to work with una hand and leg to take plant vegitabol.
But di land wey go soon bi una own, na land wey get hills and valleys with plenty rain,
di kind land wey di Oga una God like well-well. From one year to anoda, God dey wosh ova di land!
Naw, if una listin well-well to my kommand, wey I dey tell una today kon love di Oga una God and serve am with all una heart and mind,
E go send rain for una land for di rite time, both di early and late rain, so dat una go harvest una food, new wine and oil.
E go give una animals plenty grass for di land and una go chop beleful.
But make una dey kareful. Make una nor let anybody deceive una, so dat una nor go turn from God kon dey serve and woship oda gods.
If una do like dis, God go vex for una well-well. E go lock di sky and rain nor go fall, den di groun nor go bear food. Den una go kwik-kwik die for di good land wey God dey give una.
So make una keep dis kommand for una mind. Make una tie dem for una hand kon wear dem for una head, so dat una go remember dem.
Make una tish dis kommand to una shidren. Make una tok about dem wen una dey house and wen una dey for road, even wen una won sleep and wen una wake-up.
Make una rite dem put for una door-mot and for una gate,
so dat as long as di sky dey on-top di eart, una and una shidren go dey betta for di land wey God promise una grand-grand papa.
Make una dey kareful as una dey obey all di kommand wey I dey give una today. Make una show love to di Oga una God kon bilive and do as E sey make una do.
Den God go drive all di kountries wey dey una front, aldo dem really strong and great pass una, but una go take dia land.
Anywhere wey una waka rish, dat land go bi una own. Una land go long and wide from di wildaness go Lebanon and from River Eufrates go rish Mediterranean Sea.
Nobody go fit stop una; di Oga una God go make dem fear una for any land wey una waka enter, just as E promise una.
Si, today I dey give una shance to pick between blessing and curse!
God go bless una if una obey di Oga una God kommand wey I dey give una today.
But na curse bi una own, if una rijet di Oga una God kommand kon turn from am go woship oda gods wey una nor know before.
Wen di Oga una God take una enter di land kon help una stay der, una must tok about di blessing for Mount Gerizim and di curse for Mount Ebal.
(Dis two mountins dey di west side for Jordan River where Kanaan pipol for di Valley, dey stay, near Gilgal town wey nor far from Moreh Oak.)
Bikos una go soon cross Jordan River go take di land wey God dey give una. Wen una take di land kon dey stay inside,
make una dey kareful as una dey obey all di rules and law wey I dey give and tell una today.
Dis na di rules and laws wey una must obey, wen una don enter di land wey una grand-grand papa God, dey give una. As long as una dey alive, una must obey dem.
Wen una porshu di kountries wey dey der, una must distroy all di place wey dem for dey woship dia gods, both for di mountin, on-top di hill and under evry tree.
Make una break di altars and skata di pilas. Make una burn di Asherah juju poles kon kut dia juju. Make una make sure sey una distroy all dia gods!
Make una nor woship di Oga una God just as dis pagans dey woship dia gods,
but una must woship di Oga una God for where en ensef go choose from among all di tribes and na der una go for honor en name.
For der, una go karry burnt ofrin, sakrifice, vow ofrin, ordinary ofrin and una ofrin for di first fruit and animals wey una get.
For der, una with una family go chop for di Oga una God present and una go happy for evritin wey una get, bikos di Oga una God don bless una.
Una nor go woship God as wi dey do for here today, where evribody dey do as dem like,
bikos una neva even rish where una dey go kon kollect di land wey di Oga una God dey give una.
Wen una don cross Jordan River kon kollect and stay for di land; wen God don give una rest from all una enemies and una dey save for di land,
una must bring evritin wey I kommand una: una burnt ofrin; sakrifice ofrin; tithe and vow ofrin kom di place wey God choose as where dem go for woship and honor en name.
For der, una must celebrate for di Oga una God present, with all una shidren, savants and Levi shidren wey dey stay una town, (bikos dem nor get land or propaty among una).
Make una dey kareful, so dat una nor go sakrifice una burnt ofrin for anywhere wey una like.
Una go only sakrifice am for di place wey God go choose from among una tribe. Na der una go for offa una burnt ofrin and do evritin wey I kommand una.

But una fit kill una animals kon chop en meat for any town wey una wont. Una fit chop di animal wey God give una as una like. All of una, weda una dey klean or not, fit chop meat, just as una dey chop gazelle and deer.
But una must nor chop blood. Una must pour di blood for groun like wota.
But make una nor chop ofrin for una own town or tithe for una harvest and for una first fruit or animal, or sakrifice ofrin and vow ofrin.

Una must chop dis tins for di Oga una God present and e go bi for di place wey E choose. Make una chop for der with una shidren and Levi wey dey stay with una and for evritin wey una dey do, make una dey celebrate for di Oga una God present.
As long as una dey dis land, make una dey kareful as una dey kare for Levi shidren.
Wen di Oga una God don make una land big as E sey E go do and una like to chop meat, una dey free to chop as una like.
If di place wey God choose sey una go woship am too far for una, una fit kill any of una animal wey E don give una, just as I kommand una; kon chop dem for una town as una like.
Just as una dey chop gazelle or deer; doz wey dey klean and doz wey nor dey klean, fit chop dem too.
But make una nor chop blood, bikos blood na life and una must nor chop animal blood with di meat.
Instead, make una pour di blood for groun like wota.
Make una nor chop di blood, so dat evritin go dey well with una and una shidren-shidren and if una do like dat, belle go sweet God.
But make una take di holy ofrin and di vow wey una make, go di place where God choose.
Di meat and blood from una burnt ofrin, make una put am for di Oga una God altar. Make una pour di oda sakrifice blood for di Oga una God altar, but una fit chop di meat.
Make una make sure sey una obey all di kommand wey I dey give una, so dat evritin go dey well with una and una shidren-shidren, bikos una do wetin dey good and betta for una Oga God eye.
Wen di Oga una God dey go for una front go distroy all di kountries and una drive dem komot kon stay di land,
make una nor follow dem serve dia juju and gods. Make una nor ask about dia gods or sey, “Na how dis pipol take dey woship dia gods? Make wi serve God like dem.”

Una must nor woship di Oga una God, just as di oda kountry dey woship dia own gods, bikos all wetin dem dey do take woship dia gods, na tins wey una Oga God hate well-well. Dem even dey burn dia shidren as sakrifice for dia gods.
So all dis kommand wey I dey give una so, make una obey dem with kare. Make una nor add join or remove from dem.
May bi una get profet or doz wey dey si wetin go happen among una and dem kon show una signs and wonders,
den wetin dem show una kon happen. If dem sey, “Make una kom make wi woship oda gods; gods wey una neva sey before.”
Doz profets wey dey si wetin go happen, make una nor listin to dem, bikos di Oga una God go dey test una, to know weda una love am with all una mind and heart.
Una must follow di Oga una God kon woship only en and una must follow en kommandment, obey, serve and always dey loyal to am.

But for di profet and doz wey dey si wetin go happen, make una kill dem, bikos dem won make pipol sin against di Oga una God wey take una komot from Egypt where una for bi slave. Una must kill dem, bikos dem dey try to deceive una komot from di way wey God wont make una follow. So like dis, una must skata and distroy evry bad tin or pipol wey dey among una.
Weda na una broda, pikin, wife or friend kon tok and wont make una serve oda gods wey una or una grand-grand papa nor know before,
or if dem wont make una woship doz oda pipol gods,
make una nor do am or listin to dem. Make una nor sorry for dem or protet dem.
Una must kill dem! Make una bi di first to attack dem and evry oda pesin go join una.
Una must stone dem die, bikos dem try to make una turn from di Oga una God wey diliver una from Egypt, di place where una for bi slave.
Den, Israel pipol go hear about am kon fear and nobody go won do wiked tins again.
Wen una don start to stay for di land, una fit hear sey,
some wiked pipol don leave una go tok to pipol wey dey di land before sey, “Make wi go serve and woship anoda god.” (Gods wey una neva si before.)
For dis kind matter, una must look di kase well-well. If una find out sey dis bad tin wey happen, na true,
den make una make sure sey una kill all doz wey dey di town; plus all di animals wey dem get.
Una must gada all di dirty for der kon put am for di street centre, den burn di town rish groun as ofrin to di Oga una God. Una must distroy di town forever and make nobody build am again.
Anytin wey God sey E go judge, una must nor take am at-all. Den God nor go vex again, but E go sorry for una kon make una plenty as E promise una grand-grand papa.
Di Oga una God go sorry for una only if una listin to en vois, keep en kommand wey I tell una kon dey do wetin dey good for en eye.
Since una bi Oga God shidren, make una nor ever kut unasef or shave una hair sey una dey kry for who don die.
Bikos una dey holy to di Oga una God, na-im make am choose una as en pipol wey E love pass among evry oda tin for dis world.
Make una nor chop anytin wey dem dey forbid.
Dis na di animals wey una fit chop: melu, sheep, goat,
gazelle, deer, wiked goat, antelope, wiked oryx and di sheep for mountin.
Una fit chop animals wey dia leg divide into two and dey shew grass,
but if di animal nor get am, make una nor chop am. So make una nor chop kamel, hare or hyrax. Dem dey really shew grass, but dia leg nor divide, so dem nor dey klean to chop.
Make una nor chop pig. E get strong leg wey divide, but e nor dey shew, so e nor dey klean. Make una nor chop dis animals or even tosh dia dead body.
For all di animals wey dey for river, una fit chop anytin wey get both fins and skales.
But make una nor chop any animal for wota wey nor get fins and skales, bikos dem nor dey klean.
Una fit chop any bird wey dey klean.
Di birds wey una nor go chop na: eagle, vulture, black vulture,
kite, falkon, any buzzard,
any kind raven,
ostrich, owl, seagul, any kind hawk,
small owl, big owl or barn owl,
owl for wildaness, Egypt vulture, kormorant,
stork, any kind herons, hoopoe and bat.
Any insect wey dey waka for groun with feada nor dey klean for una and make una nor chop dem.
But una fit chop any bird and insect wey dey fly, bikos dem dey klean.

Make una nor chop anytin wey die on en own. Una fit gi-am to strenja wey dey stay una town or una fit sell am give strenjas. But make una nor chop am at-all, bikos una bi di Oga una God pipol. Make una nor kill or chop small goat wey still dey suck breast.
Una must make sure sey una dey give God one from evry ten tin wey una get or harvest dat year.

Una go bring am kom di Oga una God present, so dat en go chop from una plant, new wine, olive oil and evry first-born for una animal. Una go bring am kom meet am for di place wey E choose sey una go for honor en name, so dat una go learn to always woship di Oga una God.
Wen E bless una, if di place where E choose sey una go for honor en name dey far,
una fit sell all doz tins kon travel with di money wey una sell am go di place wey di Oga una God don choose by ensef.

Wen una rish der, una fit use di money take buy any food wey una wont, plus kattle, sheep, goats, wine or beer and anytin wey una like. Den make una do party for di Oga una God present kon celebrate with una family.
Make una nor forget Levi pipol wey dey una town, bikos dem nor get land or propaty among una.
For di end of evry three years, una go bring all di tithe for dat year harvest kom, den keep am for di town wey dey near where God choose.

Make una gi-am to Levi pipol, bikos dem nor get land or propaty among una. Make una still give to di strenjas wey dey stay with una; shidren wey nor get papa and mama and wimen wey dia husband don die, so dat dem go chop beleful. Den di Oga una God go bless una for evritin wey una dey do.
For di end of evry seven year, make una kancel di debt wey anybody dey owe una.

Dis na how una go dey do am. Evribody must kancel di debt wey dia fellow Israel broda dey hold dem. Dem must nor sey make dia neighbour or rilative pay dem back, bikos God time to free pipol, don rish.
Dis freedom from debt na for only una brodas nor bi for di strenjas.
Make poor pesin nor dey among una, bikos di Oga una God go really bless una for di land wey E dey give una as una own forever.
Una go receive dis blessing if una really obey dis kommand wey I dey give una.
Bikos di Oga una God go bless una just as E promise; una go give to many kountries, but una nor go borrow from any one. Una go rule many kountries, but no kountry go rule una.
But if anybody dey poor for Israel wen una rish di land wey di Oga una God dey give una, make una nor do strong head for am at-all.
Una must make sure sey una dey good to am kon gi-am anytin wey e nid.

Make una dey kareful, if not wiked tins go full una mind, den una nor go give pesin money, bikos di seven years don dey near. If una nor gri give di pesin money and di pesin kon kry give God, dat mean sey una don kommit sin.
Make una dey give to poor pipol with happiness, bikos di Oga una God go bless una for evritin wey una dey do.
E go always get some pipol for di land wey go dey poor. Dat na why I dey kommand una to dey give with happy mind to poor pipol and odas for Israel wey nid anytin.
If una fellow Hibru sell ensef to bi una savant kon serve una for six years, for di sevent year, una must free di pesin.
Wen una dey free una savant, make una nor let dem go like dat.
Make una give dem betta gift with happiness from una animal and from una wine. Make una give some of di blessing wey God give una.
Make una remember sey una bi slave for Egypt until di Oga una God kon save una! Na dis make mi dey give una dis kommand.
But if una savant sey, “I nor wont go,” bikos e love una and una family and e don serve una well.
For dat kind kase, make una take sharp iron take press en ear join di door, den e go bi una savant forever. Una go do like dis both for una man and woman savant.

Make una nor si am as big lost wen una free una savants. Make una remember sey, di work wey dem don work for una for six years, if una sey make una hire pesin make e do am, una go pay am times two. So di Oga una God go bless una for dis tin wey una do.
All di first male wey una animal born, una go give dem to God. Make una nor use dem take go klear una field and make una nor shear dem at-all.
Instead, for evry year, una and una family go chop dem for di Oga una God present, for di place wey E choose.
But if di first pikin for di animal get problem like sey e nor fit waka or e blind or if any oda tin dey happen to am, make una nor sakrifice am give di Oga una God.
Instead, make una use am take kook for una family for house. Anybody, weda e dey klean or e nor klean, fit chop from am, just as anybody fit chop deer or gazelle.
But make una nor chop blood. Una must pour di blood for groun like wota.
Just to honor di Oga una God, make una dey celebrate di Passova evry year for Abib mont, bikos dat na di mont wey di Oga una God take karry una komot from Egypt for nite.
Una Passova sakrifice go bi from di animal wey una get and una must sakrifice am give di Oga una God for di place wey E sey make una woship am; where E choose make dem honor en name.

Make una chop am with bread wey dem nor make with yist and una go chop dis bread for seven days, just as e bi wen una rush dey komot from Egypt. Make una chop dis bread (bikos na-im una chop wen una dey sofa), so dat as long as una dey alive, una go remember di day wey una komot from Egypt.
Make dem nor si yist for anybody house for dis land thru-out di seven days. And wen una sakrifice di Passova lamb for evening for di first day, make una nor let any meat remain till morning.
Una nor go just sakrifice di Passova lamb for any town wey God dey give una.

Una go only sakrifice am for di place wey dem for dey woship God; di place wey di Oga una God choose sey dem go for honor en name. As di sun dey go down, una go sakrifice am der for evening to take celebrate and remember wen una komot from Egypt.
Make una roast and chop di lamb for di place wey una Oga God choose. Den, di next day, una fit go back to una house.
For di next six days, make una nor chop any bread wey dem make with yist. Una go make di sevent day anoda holy day to honor di Oga una God and make nobody work for dat day.
From di day wey una bigin harvest, make una kount seven weeks.
Den make una celebrate Harvest Feast to honor di Oga una God. Make una gi-am ofrin from una mind, akordin to how E bless una rish.

Dis na time to celebrate before di Oga una God for di place wey dem for dey woship am; di place wey E choose sey make dem honor en name. Make una celebrate with una shidren, all una savants, Levi pipol for una town, strenjas, shidren wey nor get papa and mama again and wimen wey dia husband don die wey dey stay with una.
Make una remember sey na slave una bi for Egypt before, so make una obey all dis kommand with kare.
Make una celebrate Shelta Feast for seven days for di time wen una dey harvest una plant and grapes.

Wen una dey celebrate dis feast, make una happy with una shidren, all una savants, Levi pipol for una town, strenjas, shidren wey nor get papa and mama again and wimen wey dia husband don die, wey dey stay with una.

Una must celebrate dis feast for seven days to honor di Oga una God for di place wey E choose, bikos na en bless una well-well kon make all una work, prosper. Dis feast go bi time for evribody to happy.

For evry year, evry man for Israel go dey celebrate dis three feast: Bread wey nor get yist, Harvest Feast and Shelta Feast. For each feast, evribody must karry gift kom give di Oga una God for di place wey E choose.
Evribody must give God as dem fit do rish and na akordin to how di Oga God bless dem rish.
For all di towns wey di Oga una God dey give una, make una pick doz wey fit judge from each tribe for Israel. Di judge dem must judge di pipol well.
Make una nor judge anyhow or judge wetin una nor know. Make di judge dem nor take bribe from pipol, bikos bribe dey blind wise pesin eye kon spoil betta pipol mind.
Make una judge well, so dat una go stay long for di land wey di Oga una God dey give una.
Apart from di altar wey una build for di Oga wey bi una God, make una nor ever use wood take build house for Asherah juju.
Make una nor ever build juju house kon woship dem, bikos di Oga una God nor like all dat kind tin.
Make una nor sakrifice any animal wey nor well or get problem give di Oga una God, bikos dat kind tin dey make am vex.
Wen una don dey stay di town wey di Oga una God go give una, if one man or woman among una do bad tin for God eye kon go against en kovenant,
bikos e go serve anoda god or woship di sun, moon, star or di pawas for heaven, tins wey I sey make una nor do,
wen una hear about dat kind tin, make una shek di matter well-well. If na true sey dem do dis bad tins for Israel,
den make una take di man or woman wey kommit dis sin go outside di town gate kon stone am die.
But make una nor ever kill pesin, bikos of wetin one pesin tok. Two or three pesin must tok di same tin, before una go fit stone pesin die.
Di pipol wey tok about di tins wey di pesin do, na dem go first stone di pesin, before oda pipol go join dem. Like dis, una go stop wiked and evil tins among una.
If matter too strong for una to judge; matter like to kill pesin or matter wey koncern propaty or wahala for village, make una karry doz kind matter go di place wey di Oga una God don choose.
Una go-go meet di Levi priest or di judge wey dey on duty. Dem go hear di kase kon give judgement.
Una must do as dem judge for di place wey God choose. Una must do just as dem tok.
Afta dem don read di law kon pass judgement, una must do anytin wey dem tok; make una nor try to shange wetin dem tok at-all.
Anybody wey nor gri obey wetin di judge or di priest wey dey ripresent di Oga una God tok, una must kill dat pesin. Like dis, una go end bad and wiked tins for Israel.
Den wen all di pipol hear am, dem go fear to do wiked tins.
Wen una rish di land wey di Oga una God dey give una and una don take and dey stay inside, den una sey, “Like all di kountries wey dey around us, na so too wi go selet king for awasef,”
Una must selet di king wey di Oga una God go choose. Una go choose king from among unasef. Make una nor choose pesin wey nor kom from Israel.
Make di king nor build big house where e go put horse, or make di pipol go back to Egypt go buy horse, bikos God don sey, “Make una nor go back to Egypt.”
Make di king nor marry many wife for ensef, bikos dem go turn en heart from di Oga una God. Make e nor gada money, silva or gold for ensef.
Wen e sidan for di throne as king, make e kopy dis kommand put for book for di Levi priest present.
Make e always keep dat kopy with am evriday as long as e dey alive. Like dat, e go learn how to fear di Oga en God as e dey obey all di laws and kommand.

As e dey read am evriday, e nor go dey proud and e nor go do like sey e important pass evribody. Dis nor go let am turn from dis kommand at-all. And e go make en and en shidren-shidren reign as king for Israel forever.

Make una remember sey Levi pesin wey bi priest, plus di whole Levi tribe nor get any propaty or land among di oda tribes for Israel. Instead di priest and Levi pipol go chop from di special gift wey di oda tribes go give God, bikos na dat bi dia share.
Dem nor get any land for diasef for Israel. Na God bi dia propaty, just as E don tell dem.
Di tins wey di priests go take as dia own share, na di animals and oda tins wey di oda tribes bring kom as ofrin: dem go take di animals shoulder, jaw and belle.
Di first share for una harvest, new wine, olive oil and di wool wey una kollect wen una dey shear di sheep, make una give dem to di priest.
Bikos na di Oga una God choose Levi tribe out of all di tribes wey dey Israel to serve am forever.
And if one Levi pesin kom from any town for Israel kon sey e dey go where God don choose sey make dem woship am,
e fit serve for der with God name, just like evry oda Levi wey bi priest wey dey serve God for der.
Dem go give di same food like di oda priests and e fit keep anytin wey en family send kom gi-am.
Wen una enter di land wey di Oga una God dey give una, make una nor learn wetin di oda kountries for der dey do.
For ezample, make una nor burn una shidren as sakrifice. And make nobody learn how to dey tell pipol dia future;
learn to use juju; how to tok to oda spirit or witch spirit.
Anybody wey dey do dis kind tin, dey make God vex. Na bikos of dis tins wey di oda kountries do, na-im make God porshu dem komot from di land for una.
But make una serve di Oga una God well-well, so dat E nor go si any fault for una body.
Di pipol wey una won porshu dey do dis tins, but di Oga una God dey sey make una nor do dis kind tin.
Di Oga una God go raiz profet like mi from among una and e go bi una own kountry man and make una listin to am.
Bikos dis na wetin una ask di Oga una God by unasef wen una gada go meet am for Mount Sinai. Una sey, “God, make Yu nor let us hear yor vois again or si di big fire again, bikos wi go die.”
God kon tell mi, “Wetin dem tok dey good.
From among dia own pipol, I go raiz one profet like yu. I go put my word for en mout and e go tell dem anytin wey I kommand.
Anybody wey nor gri listin to wetin di profet tok, na mi go ponish am with my own hand.
But any profet wey tok wetin I nor send am or tok about any oda god, go die.
“But una fit ask unasef, ‘How wi won take know sey, dat message nor bi from God?’
Wen any profet dey tok with God name and wetin e tok nor kon happen at-all, una go know sey nor bi God send am, but di profet just dey tok on en own, so make una nor listin, bilive or fear am.”
Wen di Oga una God don distroy di pipol wey E won give dia land to una, una go take di land kon stay for dia towns and house.
Den for di centre for di land wey God dey give una, make una keep three town for der.
For di aria for di land wey God dey give una as una own, una go measure and divide am into three, so dat pesin wey kill anoda pesin fit run go der.
If pesin kill anoda pesin by mistake, without sey dem kworel or dey fight before, di pesin fit run go any of di town go stay.

For ezample, may bi pesin go forest with en neighbour go kut wood. Den one of dem kon karry di axe make e kut di tree and di axe head komot from di wood wey hold am kon kill di oda pesin. For dis matter, dat pesin wey kill di pesin fit run go one of dis towns and e go dey save.
Bikos if di town too far for am, before e go run rish der, di pesin wey dey vex sey dem kill en pesin fit porshu di pesin kon kill-am. Dis pesin deat nor good, bikos na mistake e take kill pesin.
Na dis make mi sey, make una keep three town wey pesin go run go and e go dey save.
And if di Oga una God don make una land big, just as E promise una grand-grand papa kon give una all di land wey E promise dem
and una dey obey all di kommand wey I dey give una today (wey bi to love di Oga una God and always do as E tok), dat time, make una add three towns join di first three.
Una must nor kill innocent pesin for di land wey di Oga una God won give una, bikos dat go make una dey guilty.
But if pesin hate en neighbour kon hide for korna dey wait am, so dat e go attack and kill-am, den run go dis towns,
di pesin wey old pass for en family go sey make dem bring am kom, so dat dem go kill-am too.
Make una nor sorry for dat kind pesin! Pipol wey dey kill pipol wey nor do anytin, make una komot dem from Israel, den evritin go dey well with una.
Wen una rish di land wey di Oga una God dey give una, make una nor ever tif anoda pesin land or komot di boundary stone for where una grand-grand papa sey make dem put am.
Make una nor hold anybody sey e do bad, if na only one pesin bi witness. Di trut for di matter bi sey, two or three pesin must sey dem si wetin happen.
If pesin kom outside kon tok wetin e nor si about anoda pesin,
den, both who tok and who dem dey tok about go kom God present kon tok before di priest and di judge wey dey der.
Den di judge go handle di matter well-well. If di oda pesin lie for en broda head,
den di deat wey e won make e broda die, na en go die-am. Like dis, una go remove all dis bad pipol among una.
Den di rest pipol go hear wetin happen and dem go kon dey fear to do doz kind bad tins.
Anybody wey dey guilty, make una nor sorry for am! Una matter must bi life-for-life, eye-for-eye, tit-for-tit, hand-for-hand and leg-for-leg.
Wen una go fight una enemies and una si dia horse and dia sojas wey strong pass una own, make una nor fear. Di Oga una God wey bring una kom out from Egypt, dey with una!
Wen una dey ready for war, make di priest kom front kon tok to di sojas.

E go tell dem, “Israel men, make una listin to mi! Today, as una dey go fight una enemies, make una nor fear at-all! Make una heart nor fail una or una kon dey shake for dia front like pikin wey nor well.
Bikos di Oga una God dey go with una! E go fight una enemies for una kon make una win di war!”

Den di soja oga go tok to di sojas sey, “E get anybody for here wey just build new house and e neva dedikate am? If na so, den yu fit go house, bikos dem fit kill yu for war and anoda pesin go dedikate yor house.
E get anybody for here wey just plant vineyard and neva chop anytin from am? If na so, yu fit go house, bikos dem fit kill yu for war and anoda pesin go chop di first fruit for yor harvest.
E get anybody for here wey just engage woman, but e neva marry am? If na so, yu fit go house go marry, bikos dem fit kill yu for war and anoda pesin go marry di woman.”
Den di soja oga go sey, “E get anybody among us wey dey fear or en heart dey shake? If na so, yu fit go house before yu go make anoda pesin, fear too.”
Wen di oga don tok to dia sojas finish, dem go choose pesin wey go dey kommand each group.
As una near any town wey una won attack, make una first try to make peace with en pipol.
If dem agri with una kon open di gate for una, den all di pipol for dia go serve una as una savants.
But if dem nor gri open di gate for una and dem dey ready to fight, una must attack dat town.
Wen di Oga una God don give dat town to una, make una use una swod take kill all di men, yong boys or boy pikin for dat town.
But una fit take all di wimen, shidren, animals and oda tins wey una fit take. Make una enjoy all di tins wey una take from una enemies land wey God dey give una.
But dis kommand na for only di towns wey dey far-far, nor bi for di towns inside di kountries wey una won stay.
For doz towns and kountries wey di Oga una God dey give una as where una go stay, make una distroy evritin wey dey inside dem.
Hit, Amor, Kanaan, Periz, Hiv and Jebus pipol, una must distroy dem finish, just as di Oga una God kommand.
If una distroy dem finish, di pipol for di land nor go dey to tish una how to serve and woship dia own gods and juju wey go make una sin against di Oga una God.

Wen una dey attack any town and di war nor dey end, make una nor use una axe take kut di trees. Una fit chop dia fruit, but make una nor kut dem. Na di trees bi una enemies wey make una won attack dem?
Di only tree wey una fit kut, na di ones wey nor good for food, den kon use dem take make tins wey una nid to take attack di enemies town until di town go fall.
Wen una dey di land wey di Oga una God dey give una, una fit si pesin wey dem kill for di field and una nor know who kill-am.
For dat kind matter, una eldas and judge go measure from where dem for kill di pesin go rish di town wey dey near der.
Di eldas for di town wey dey near where dem for kill di pesin, go take one small melu wey dem neva tish anytin or use work at-all.
Dem go escort am go di valley wey dem neva plant or klear before and wey wota dey rush pass. Wen dem rish di valley, dem go break di melu neck for der.
Den di Levi priest go kon front (bikos di Oga una God don choose dem to serve am and to bless una with en name). Na dem go dey judge both good and bad kase for di town.
Di eldas for dat town must wosh dia hand on-top di small melu wey dem don break en neck.
Den dem go sey, “Awa hand and leg nor dey for dis pesin deat and wi nor si am wen dem dey kill-am.
So God go forgive en pipol Israel wey E save and E nor go ponish dem sey na dem kill pesin wey nor do anytin.” Den di sin nor go dey dia head at-all.
If una follow dis kommand, una go do wetin dey rite for God eye and una go dey save from dis sin.
Wen una dey go fight una enemies and di Oga una God make una win kon katch some of dem as una prisona
and among di pipol wey una take so, una si fine woman for inside wey una like marry,
una fit karry am go una house. Di woman must shave en head, kut en finger
burn di klot wey e wear wen dem katch am, den kon stay una house. E go take one mont take mourn for en papa and mama wey die. Den una fit marry am as una wife.
But if una marry am and e nor dey do as una wont make e do, make una let am go free. Since una force and sleep with di woman, una nor go fit trit am like slave kon sell am.
If man get two wife and e love won pass di oda, den di two wife born boy pikin, If di first-born na from di wife wey e nor love,
wen di man dey divide en propaty, make e nor give di biggest part to di yonga one wey e love en mama, bikos nor bi en dem first-born.
E must give di first pikin wetin bi en own, even doh e nor love di mama. E must gi-am times two of wetin e give di sekond pikin, bikos na di first son bi en papa pawa and honor.
If pesin get sturbon son wey nor dey listin to en papa and mama even doh dem ponish am,
make en papa and mama seize am kom meet di eldas for di town gate.
Dem go tell di eldas for di town sey, “Awa pikin too sturbon and e nor dey hear word, e dey chop and drink anyhow.”
Den, all di men for di town go stone di pikin die. Like dis, una go remove all di wiked pipol wey dey among una and wen evribody for Israel hear wetin happen, fear go katch dem.
If pesin do wetin go make dem kill-am and dem hang am for tree make e die,
make di body nor dey di tree till di next day. Na dat same day una go beri di body, bikos en body wey dem hang, na curse for God eye. Make una nor dirty di land wey di Oga una God dey give una.
Wen una si una neighbour animal dey waka lost, make una nor trowey una eye; una must riton am go give di owner.
If di owner nor dey stay near una or una nor know who e bi, make una take am go una house until di owner go kom find am, den una must gi-am back en animal.
Na di same tin una go do to donkey, klot or any oda tin wey una neighbour lost wey una si. Make una dey ready to always help una neighbour.
Wen una si una neighbour donkey or melu dey faint for road, make una nor trowey una eye or waka pass am; instead make una make sure sey una help di animal.
Make woman nor wear klot wey bi man own and make man nor wear woman klot, bikos anybody wey dey do dis kind tin, dey make di Oga una God vex.
If una si bird house for tree or for groun and yong birds or eggs dey inside with dia mama for der, make una nor take di mama from en shidren.
Make una free di mama, but una fit take di shidren. Make una do like dis, so dat e go dey well with una and una go get long life.
If una build new house, make una build guide round di roof, so dat dem nor go sey una kill pesin in kase pesin fall from di top.
Make una nor plant two difren seed for una vineyard; if not, all di fruit and di seed wey una plant, go skata.
Make una nor klear una farm with donkey and melu togeda.
Make una nor wear klot wey dem use wool and linen take make.
Una must fold una kover klot for di four korna.
If anybody marry woman kon sleep with am den
e porshu am for publik kon sey, “Na wen I marry dis woman, I know sey e nor bi virgin.”
Den di woman papa and mama must bring proof kon give di eldas for di town gate sey, dia pikin na virgin.
Di girl papa go tell dem, “I give my pikin to dis man as en wife and naw, e don rijet am.
E dey curse di girl sey, ‘I don know sey yu nor bi virgin.’ But dis klot show sey my pikin na virgin, before e marry am.” Den, dem go spread di girl bed shit for di eldas front.
Di eldas go take di man kon ponish am.

Dem go still tell am make e pay 100 silva to di woman papa, bikos na for publik e for curse di woman sey e nor bi virgin. Den di woman go still bi di man wife and e nor go fit sey make di woman pak komot from en house.
But if wetin di man tok na true and e show sey di woman nor bi virgin,

den dem go take di woman go en papa door-mot. For der, di men for di town go stone am die. E don kommit bad sin for Israel, bikos e dey sleep with difren men wen e dey en papa house. Like dis, una go remove evil from among una.
If dem katch anybody dey sleep with anoda man wife, both of dem must die; like dis, una go remove evil from Israel.
If virgin don dey engage to one man and anoda man for di town kon sleep with am,

una must bring di two of dem kom di town gate kon stone dem die. Una go stone di girl die, bikos e nor kry wen di man dey sleep with am and una go kill di man, bikos e sleep with di woman wey en broda suppose marry; like dis, una go remove evil from among una.
But if di man meet di woman for outside di town kon force and rape am, den na only di man go die.
Una must nor do anytin to di woman, bikos e nor do anytin wey go make dem kill-am. Dis one na di same tin as wen pesin attack and kill anoda pesin,
bikos di man meet am for field and di woman kon dey shaut, but nobody dey der to save am.
If one man si virgin wey dey engage kon force and rape am and dem katch dem.
Di man wey rape di woman go pay 50 silva give di woman papa and di woman go bi en wife, bikos e don dis-virgin am. E nor go ever fit porshu di woman komot en house till e die.
Make nobody marry en papa former wife, bikos dat na disgrace to en papa.
If anybody wound or dem kut en private part komot, make una nor let am kom God present.
Make una nor let pesin wey nor know en papa kom God present; even to en tent generashon, make nor of dem enter where God dey.
Make no Ammon or Moab pesin enter God present; even to dia tent generashon, make nor of dem enter where God dey.
Dis pipol nor welkom una with food and wota wen una kom out from Egypt. Instead dem hire Balaam wey en papa bi Beor from Petor wey dey Aram Naharaim sey make e curse una.
But di Oga una God nor gri listin to Balaam. Di curse wey Balaam suppose curse una, e turn am to blessing bikos di Oga una God love una.
As long as una dey dis life, make una nor ever pray for peace or betta tin for dem.
Make una nor hate Edom or Egypt pipol, bikos Edom pipol na una brodas and una stay as strenjas for Egypt.
Di third generashon for Edom and Egypt pipol fit enter God present.
Wen una dey go fight una enemies, make una guide unasef against anytin wey nor klean.
If anybody dey among una wey nor dey klean, bikos of wetin e do with en body for nite, e must komot di kamp and e nor go enter for sometaim.
Wen evening don rish, make e wosh ensef with wota, den wen sun don go down, e fit enter di kamp again.
Una must get somewhere outside di kamp where pipol go for dey piss or shit.
Una must get shovel among evry oda tin wey una get, so dat wen una shit for outside di kamp, una go dig groun with di shovel den pour di shit for der kon kover am.
Bikos di Oga una God dey waka for di kamp to diliver una kon kill una enemies. So una kamp must dey holy, so dat E nor go si anytin wey go make am turn from una.
Any slave wey run leave en masta kom meet una, una must nor take am go back.
Make dem stay with una for any town wey dem choose and make una nor opress dem.
Make nobody for Israel, weda na man or woman, turn ashawo for di temple.
Wen una dey bring una vow ofrin, make una nor bring any ashawo pesin ofrin kon give di Oga una God, weda na man or woman, bikos dat kind tin dey make di Oga una God vex.
If una give money, food or any oda tin to una fellow brodas for Israel, make una nor put intrest at-all.

Una fit borrow with intrest give strenja, but nor bi to una own fellow Israel broda and if una keep dis kommand, di Oga una God go bless una for evritin wey una dey do for di land wey una go soon take as una own.
Wen una make promise give di Oga una God, make e nor tey before una do wetin una promise, if not, God go hold una sey una don sin.
But e nor go bi sin, if pesin nor make promise or vow at-all.
Anytin wey una promise, una must dey kareful sey una do am. And di promise wey una make to di Oga una God must kom from una free mind.
If una enter una neighbour vineyard, una fit chop as many grapes as una wont, but make una nor take any one komot from di vineyard.
And wen una enter una neighbour grain field, una fit plok di grain head with una hand, but make una nor kut am with knife.
Wen man marry woman and e nor like am, bikos e don si one bad karata for en body, e fit rite divorce paper give di woman, den tell am make e komot from en house.
Wen di woman komot di house, e fit marry anoda man.
But if di sekond husband still get problem with di same woman kon divorce am or di man die,
di first husband nor go marry am again, bikos di woman nor dey klean and dis tin nor dey good for God eye. Make una nor bring problem kom di land wey di Oga una God dey give una.
Make una nor put man wey just marry among di sojas or gi-am any oda work. E must dey free to spend one year for en house, so dat di wife go dey happy.
Wen una borrow pesin money, make una nor take en grindin stone as shorti, bikos dat na di only tin wey di family take dey chop.
If una katch pesin wey kidnap anoda Israel pesin kon dey trit am like slave or sell am, di pesin wey kidnap anoda pesin, must die. Like dis, una go remove bad-bad tins from among una.
As una dey do as di priest sey make una do, make una dey kareful about bad diziz. Make una obey all di kommand wey I don give una.
Make una remember wetin di Oga una God do to Miriam as una dey kom out from Egypt.
If una borrow anytin give una neighbour, make una nor enter en house kon take wetin e use as shorti.
Una go wait for outside den e go enter en house go bring am for una.
If una neighbour na poor man and e kon give una en klot as shorti for di money wey e borrow, make una nor keep dat klot till di next day.
Make una take di klot go give who get am wen evening rish, so dat en body go dey warm for nite and e go bless una, den di Oga una God go si una as pipol wey dey do good.
Make una nor opress poor pipol and doz wey dey work for una; weda dem bi Israel pipol or strenjas wey dey stay with una.
Una must pay dem for dia work evriday wen evening rish, bikos dem poor and dey wait dat money. If una nor pay dem, dem fit kry give God and di sin go dey una head.
Make una nor kill papa or mama, bikos of di sin wey dia shidren kommit, or kill shidren bikos of wetin dia papa and mama do; if una go kill pesin at-all, e must bi for en own sin.
Una must judge well for di strenjas wey dey with una; doz wey nor get papa and mama and woman wey en husband don die. Make una nor ever take dia klot as shorti for debt.
Make una always remember sey una bi slave for Egypt, before di Oga una God kon save una. Na dis make mi give una dis kommand.

Wen una harvest una plant kon leave some for di farm, make una nor go back go gada dem. Make una leave doz ones for strenjas; doz wey nor get papa and mama and doz wey dia husband don die, den di Oga una God go bless una for all di work wey una dey do.
Wen una dey plok olive fruit from en tree, di ones wey remain bilong to doz wey bi strenjas; wey nor get papa and mama and doz wey dia husband don die.
Wen una dey gada grape for una vineyard, make una nor go back again go gada wetin remain; bikos doz ones na for doz wey bi strenjas; wey nor get papa and mama and doz wey dia husband don die.
Make una remember sey una bi slave for Egypt before and na dis make mi dey kommand una to do all dis tins.
If two pipol kworel kon go kourt and di judge sey one dey rite and di oda one dey wrong.
If di judge sey make dem flog di one wey dey wrong, di judge go kommand am make e liedan for en front make dem flog am.
But make una nor flog pesin pass forty times, bikos if una flog am pass forty times, den una don disgrace am bi dat.
Make una nor stop una melu make e nor chop wen e dey harvest for una.

If two brodas dey stay togeda and one die and e nor get boy pikin, di wife wey en husband don die must nor marry anoda man wey nor dey dat family. Instead, di woman husband broda go marry am kon kare for am.
Den di first boy wey di woman go born, go ansa dat one wey don die name, so dat dem nor go forget di broda name for Israel.

But if di broda sey e nor go fit marry en dead broda wife, den make di woman go ripot to di eldas for di town gate sey, “My husband broda sey e nor fit keep en broda name for Israel; so e nor gri marry mi!”
Den di eldas for di town go koll and tok to am. If e still sey, “I nor won marry am,”

den di woman go waka go meet am for di eldas front kon remove en sandal from e leg den spit for en face. Den di woman go sey, “Make dis kind tin happen to any man wey nor gri keep en broda name for Israel!”
Den dem go dey koll en family, “Family wey dem pul di man sandal komot en leg.”
If two men dey fight with hand and one wife kon join help en husband attack di oda, den di woman use en hand take hold di oda man private part,
una go kut di woman hand komot and make una nor sorry for am.
Wen una dey measure tins, una must measure well
and make una get only one kontaina for una house to take measure.
Make una always dey use di rite skale take measure, so dat una go get long life for di land wey di Oga una God dey give una.
Doz wey dey measure with fake skale, dey sin against di Oga una God.
Make una nor ever forget wetin Amalek pipol do una wen una just dey kom out from Egypt.
Dat time, as una taya and dey hongry, bikos dem nor dey fear God, dem attack una kon kill doz wey dey stagga dey kom for back.
So wen di Oga una God don give una rest from all una enemies for di land wey E promise una, una must distroy Amalek pipol finish for dis world and nor of dem go remain.
Wen una enter di land wey di Oga una God won give una as una own and una don win evribody for der,
make una put some of di first fruits and plant wey una harvest inside one basket kon bring dem kom di place wey God don choose for woship and where dem go for honor en name.
Make una go meet di priest wey dey der for dat time kon tell am, “With dis gift, wi won make di Oga awa God know sey wi don enter di land wey E promise awa grand-grand papa sey E go give us.”
Den di priest go take di basket from una hand kon go put am for di Oga una God altar.
Den una go sey, “Awa papa Jakob waka from Aramean go stay for Egypt as strenja. En family for dat time, nor many, but wen dem dey komot Egypt, dem kon plenty and dem bi strong pipol naw.
Wen Egypt pipol dey opress and ponish us as dia slaves,
wi kry to God wey bi awa grand-grand papa God. E hear awa kry kon si as wi dey sofa and as Egypt pipol dey ponish and trit us.
So God take us komot from Egypt with en pawa, en strong hand and all en pawaful signs and wonders.
Den E bring us kom dis place kon give us dis land wey full with milk and honey!
And naw, awa God, wi don bring di first fruit, plants and animal wey Yu give us for dis groun.” Make una put evritin for di Oga una God present, den bow woship am.
Afta una don woship am, una go celebrate bikos of all di good tins wey di Oga una God don give una and una family, di Levi and di strenjas wey dey stay among una.

Evry three years, una must offa special tithe for una plants. For dat year, una must give una tithe to Levi pipol, di strenjas, doz wey nor get papa and mama and wimen wey dia husband don die, so dat dem go dey si food chop for di town.

Den for di Oga una God present, una go sey, “Wi don take di holy gift from awa house kon gi-am to Levi pipol, di strenjas, doz wey nor get papa and mama and wimen wey dia husband don die, just as Yu kommand us. Wi neva forget and wi don do evritin wey Yu kommand.
Even wen wi dey mourn, wi nor chop any one; wen wi nor dey klean at-all, wi nor tosh am and wi neva offa any of am to dead body. Wi don obey di Oga awa God and wi don do evritin wey Yu kommand us.
Naw, make Yu look down from yor holy house for heaven kon bless Israel wey bi yor pipol and di land wey Yu promise awa grand-grand papa sey, Yu go give us. Di land wey full with milk and honey.”
Today, di Oga una God don kommand una to obey all en laws and rules. So make una dey sure sey una dey obey dem with all una heart.
Una don tok today sey na di Oga bi una God. And una don promise to do wetin E tok and obey en kommand, laws, rules and to do evritin wey E tell una.
Today, God don sey una bi en pipol, en betta gift wey E value well-well, just as E promise, so una must obey en kommand.
If una obey am, E go karry una high pass evry oda pipol wey E kreate. Den una go get praiz, honor and evribody go dey tok good about una. Una go bi holy pipol to di Oga una God, just as E promise.
Den Moses and di eldas for Israel kommand di pipol sey: “Make una obey all di kommand wey I dey give una today.
Wen una cross Jordan River kon enter di land wey di Oga una God dey give una, make una gada some big stones kon pash dem.
Wen una don cross di river won kon enter di land wey milk and honey full, wey di Oga dey give una, just as una grand-grand papa God promise una, make una rite all dis kommand put for di stones.
Wen una don cross Jordan River, make una gada di stones for Mount Ebal kon pash dem, just as I dey kommand una today.
Den for der, make una build altar for di Oga una God and make una nor use anytin take kut dem at-all.
Una go build di Oga una God altar with betta stones; nor bi with ones wey dem kut, den una go offa burnt ofrin for der give di Oga una God.
Una go still offa fellowship ofrin kon chop dem for der as una dey happy for di Oga una God present.
Una must rite all dis kommand for di stone and una go rite am as evribody go fit take si am.”
Den Moses and Levi priests kon tok to Israel pipol: “Israel pipol, make una kwayet and listin! Today, una don bi di Oga una God pipol.
So una must obey di Oga una God as una dey keep all dis kommand and laws wey I dey give una today.”
Dat day, Moses still tell dem:
“Wen una cross Jordan River, Simeon, Levi, Judah, Issakar, Josef and Benjamin tribe must stand on-top Mount Gerizim kon bless di pipol.
And Reuben, Gad, Asher, Zebulun, Dan and Naftali tribe go stand on-top Mount Ebal kon curse any tribe wey nor follow God kommand.
“Den Levi tribe go shaut give Israel pipol sey:
‘Anybody wey make juju or image to woship, na curse go follow dat pesin, bikos juju wey human being dey make, na sin to God.
Den all di pipol go ansa, “Amen.”
Anybody wey nor respet en papa and mama, na curse go follow am.
Den all di pipol go ansa, “Amen.”
Anybody wey tif en neighbour propaty or kut en neighbour land join e own, na curse go follow am.
Den all di pipol go ansa, “Amen.”
Anybody wey go show blind man wrong road, na curse go follow am.
Den all di pipol go ansa, “Amen.”
Strenjas, pesin wey nor get papa and mama or wimen wey dia husband don die, if anybody nor judge dia kase well, na curse go follow am.
Den all di pipol go ansa, “Amen.”
Anybody wey sleep with en papa wife, na curse go follow am, bikos e nor gri honor en papa.
Den all di pipol go ansa, “Amen.”
Anybody wey go sleep with animal, na curse go follow am.
Den all di pipol go ansa, “Amen.”
Anybody wey sleep with en sista, weda na en papa or mama pikin, na curse go follow am.
Den all di pipol go ansa, “Amen.”
Anybody wey sleep with en wife mama, na curse go follow am.
Den all di pipol go ansa, “Amen.”
Anybody wey hide go kill en neighbour, na curse go follow am.
Den all di pipol go ansa, “Amen.”
Anybody wey kollect money to kill pesin wey nor do anytin, na curse go follow am.
Den all di pipol go ansa, “Amen.”
Anybody wey nor gri obey or keep dis law and kommand, na curse go follow am.
Den all di pipol go ansa, “Amen.” ’ ”
If una really obey God kon keep en kommand wey I dey give una today, di Oga una God go make una high pass all di pipol for di world.
Una go get all dis blessings if una obey di Oga una God.
God go bless una towns and una fields.
God go bless una shidren and una plants. E go still bless una animals and dia pikin wey dem go born.
E go bless una basket and una plate.
Anywhere wey una go and anytin wey una dey do, God go bless am.
God go make una win una enemies wen dem attack una. Dem go from one side attack una, but dem go skata and run from una for seven side!
God go kommand blessing for una aria and for evritin wey una dey do; yes, E go bless una for di land wey E dey give una.
If una obey di Oga una God kommand kon do as E tok, E go make una en holy pipol, just as E promise sey e go bi.
Den evribody for di eart go si sey una bilong to God and dem go respet una.
God go make una shidren, animal and plant many kon make una prosper for di land wey E promise una grand-grand papa sey, E go give una.
God go send rain from en rish store kom meet una for di rite time and E go bless all di work wey una dey do. Una go dey give to many kountries, but una nor go ever borrow from dem.
If una listin well to di Oga una God kommand and if una obey dem with kare, God go make una bi di head and nor bi tail and una go always dey on-top and nor dey under.
Make una nor turn from any of dis kommand wey I dey give una today or go follow and woship oda gods.
But if una forget di Oga una God and una nor gri obey en kommand and laws wey I dey give una today, den all dis curse go kom meet una with full force:
God go curse una towns and fields.
E go curse una basket and una plate.
God go curse una shidren and una plants. E go still curse una animals and dia pikin wey dem go born.
Anywhere wey una go and anytin wey una dey do, God go curse am.

Na God by ensef go send curse, problem, wahala, konfushon and E go dey fight una for evritin wey una dey do, until una skata and die finish, bikos of di wiked tins wey una dey do and bikos una don turn from am.
God go send diziz kom meet una, until nor of una go remain for di land wey una go soon enter go stay.
God go kill una with bad diziz, fever, sore, kro-kro and kold. Dis diziz go attack una until una die finish.
Di sky on-top una head go strong like bronze and di eart under una leg go strong like iron.
God go turn una rain wey dey fall for una land to powder and san-san; e go fall on-top una until una die finish.
God go still allow una enemies beat una; una go attack dem from one side, but una go run komot seven side, den all pipol for di eart go dey fear bikos of wetin hapun to una.
Una dead body go bi food for di birds for sky and for wiked animal for di eart and nobody go fit porshu dem.
God go ponish una with boil from Egypt, some part for una body go swell-up, eczema, ring worm and kro-kro go full una body and dem nor go fit cure una.
God go ponish una with madness, una eyes go blind and E go konfuse una mind.

For aftanoon, una go dey find road to pass like blind pipol and doz wey dey darkness and una go dey fail for evritin wey una dey do. Pipol go always dey tif una tin and opress una and nobody go save una.
Di woman wey una dey won marry, anoda man go rape am. Una go build house, but una nor go fit stay inside. Una go plant vineyard, but una nor go chop dia fruit.

Dem go kill una melu for una own eye, but una nor go chop for inside. Dem go tif una donkey for una eye and dem nor go bring dem kom back. Dem go give all una sheep to una enemies and nobody go dey to save una.
God go give una shidren to oda pipol and even as una dey look dis tins, una nor go get pawa to do anytin.
Strenjas go kom chop di plants wey una sofa plant and dem go opress una still una die.
All dis tins wey dey happen go make una mad.
God go make boil wey dem nor fit cure, katch una knee and legs. In-short, di boil go kover una from head go rish una leg.
God go karry una with di king go meet pipol wey una with una grand-grand papa neva hear of before and una go serve and woship gods wey dem make with wood and stone.
For di place where God go send una go, una go bi disgrace among di pipol for di eart.
Una go plant plenty seed, but na small tin una go harvest, bikos siti-siti go chop evritin wey una plant.
Una go plant and kare for una vineyard, but una nor go drink di wine or chop di grapes, bikos worm go distroy evritin.
Una go plant olive tree for una land, but una nor go ever use di olive oil, bikos di fruits go drop before e ripe.
Una go get shidren, but dem go die finish, bikos dem go katch dem as slaves go anoda kountry.
Wiked insect go distroy una trees and plants.
Di strenjas wey dey among una go dey strong well-well, while una go dey weak evriday.
Dem go dey borrow una money, but una nor go borrow anybody. Dem go bi head and una go bi tail!
If una nor gri listin to di Oga una God or obey en kommand and law wey E give una, all dis curse go porshu una, until e distroy all of una.
Di curse go bi sign against una and una shidren-shidren forever.
Bikos una nor gri serve di Oga una God with betta heart and mind for di good tins wey E do for una,

una go-go serve una enemies wey God go send against una. Una go dey hongry; una nor go si wota drink or get klot to wear and una nor go get anytin at-all. God go put load like iron for una neck wey go press una well-well until e don distroy una.
God go bring some pipol from far against una and dem go kill una like vulture. And dem bi pipol wey una nor go undastand wetin dem dey tok;
pipol wey wiked well-well and dem nor go respet una old pipol or pity for una yong ones.
Dem go chop una animals pikin and una plants, den dem go distroy una. Dem nor go leave any korn, new wine, olive oil or animals for una and una go hongry die.
Dem go attack una towns until all di strong walls, (di walls wey una trust sey go protet una) go fall rish groun. Dem go attack all di towns for di land wey di Oga una God don give una.
Bikos of di honga and ponishment wey una enemies put una, una go dey chop una own shidren wey di Oga una God give una.
Di man among una wey kwayet pass, go turn kon attack en broda, en wife and en shidren wey remain.
En own shidren flesh wey e dey chop, e nor go give anybody as nor-tin dey to chop, bikos of di wahala and honga wey di enemy put una for una own town.
Di woman wey dey kwayet and gentol among una, wey nor go even put en leg for groun, bikos of how e fine rish, go turn kon attack en husband and shidren
and e go chop some since nor-tin dey to chop, bikos of di wahala and honga wey di enemies put una for una own town.
“If una nor gri obey my law, di tins wey dem rite for dis book or una nor gri fear di Oga una God wonderful name,
God go make una and una shidren-shidren ponishment many and di ponishment go tey well-well.
E go give una all doz diziz wey una dey fear for Egypt and dem go trobol una forever.
Di Oga una God go still ponish una with difren sickness wey nor dey join dis ones and E go dey bring dem kom, until una don die finish.
Even doh una many like di stars for sky, na only some of una go remain, bikos una nor gri listin to God.
Just as e sweet God to prosper and make una plenty, na so too God go dey happy to distroy una.
“E go remove una from di land wey una won enter go stay,

bikos God go skata una among many kountries from one end for di eart go rish di oda end. For der, una go woship gods wey una or una grand-grand papa nor know before; gods wey dem make with wood and stones!
For dat kountry, una nor go get peace or rest. And God go make una heart dey fear; una eye nor go dey si well and una soul go dey worry.
Na so-so fear una go dey fear both for day time and for nite, bikos una nor know wen una go die.

For morning time, una go sey, ‘If to sey na evening wi dey’ and for evening time, una go sey ‘If to sey na morning wi dey!’ Dis na bikos, di kind tins wey una go dey si around una go make una dey fear.

Den God go put una for ship kon send una go back to Egypt, to di place wey E promise sey una nor go ever si again. Den for der, una go sell unasef give una enemies as slaves, but nobody go gri buy una.”
Dis na di kovenant wey God kommand Moses sey make e make with Israel pipol wen dem dey Moab, plus di kovenant wey E make with dem for Mount Sinai.
Moses gada evribody for Israel kon tell dem, “Una don use una own eye take si evritin wey God do to Fero, all en savant and di whole Egypt.
Una eye don si en great judgement, signs and wonders.
But till today, God neva make una undastand all dis tins or give una eyes wey fit si or ear wey dey hear!
I karry una thru di wildaness for forty years, but una klot or sandal nor tear.
Una nor chop bread or drink wine or any oda drink, but E give una food, so dat una go know sey na-im bi di Oga una God.
“Wen wi rish here, King Sihon for Heshbon and King Og for Bashan kom fight us, but wi win dem.
Wi take dia land kon gi-am to Reuben, Gad and half of Manasseh tribes as dia own.
“So make una obey di words wey dey dis kovenant, so dat e go betta for una for evritin wey una dey do.
Today, all of una stand before di Oga una God, di head for di tribes, una eldas, una ofisas, evry man for Israel,
una small pikin, wifes and di strenjas wey dey stay with una, plus doz wey dey kut wood or karry wota,
so dat una go asept di kovenant wey di Oga una God dey make with una today.
Today, God go sey una bi en pipol and na-im bi una God, bikos na-im promise una and una grand-grand papa Abraham, Isaak, Jakob.
Nor bi only una I dey make dis kovenant with,
but na with all di pipol wey stand with una for di Oga awa God present today, even with doz wey nor dey with us today.
“(Una know how wi dey live awa life wen wi dey Egypt and how wi take cross many nashons as wi dey travel.
Una si di bad tins and di juju wey dem make with wood, stone, silva and gold.)
Make no man, woman, tribe or family among una leave di Oga una God kon go woship gods for oda kountries. Make nobody among una get any tree wey go bear fruit wey bitter or fit kill.

“Make una make sure sey nobody among una wey dey hear dis tins today, bilive sey evritin dey okay with am, even doh e nor dey hear pipol word. Dis kind tin go skata all of una, weda una dey good or bad.
God nor dey ready to forgive dat pesin. Instead, God vexnashon and jealousy go raiz for di pesin and all di curse wey dey dis book go bi en own.
God go pick and judge only di pesin from all di tribes for Israel akordin to all di curse wey dey dis Law Book.
“En shidren-shidren wey go kom afta una, plus di strenjas wey go kom from far place, all of dem go si di wahala for dat land and di sickness wey God go send for dia head.
Fire and sulfur go kover di whole land. Dem nor go fit plant for der and nor-tin go grow for der. E go bi like Sodom and Gomorrah, Admah and Zeboiim, di towns wey God vex distroy.
Den all di nashons go ask, ‘Wetin make God do all dis tins for dis land? Wetin make God dey vex like dis?’
“Den di pipol go sey, ‘Na bikos dem nor gri obey di kovenant wey God wey bi dia grand-grand papa God make with dem wen E bring dem kom out from Egypt.
Dem kon go serve and woship oda gods wey dem nor even know and God sey make dem nor woship doz gods.
Na dis tin make God dey vex for dem well-well for dis land and naim make am ponish dem with all di curse wey dey dis book.
So God don vex remove dem from dia land kon karry dem go anoda land and evribody dey si as e bi today.’ ”
Na di Oga awa God get all di sekret tins, but di tins wey E tell us, na for wi and awa shidren-shidren forever, so dat wi go fit obey all di words for dis law.

I don give una choice to choose between di blessing and di curse. Wen all dis tins don happen to una and una dey stay for di nashons where di Oga una God skata una go, una go remember di choice wey I give una.
If una and una shidren-shidren turn kom meet God kon obey all en kommand wey I dey give una today, with una heart and soul,
den di Oga una God go sorry for una. E go bring una kom back from di kountries wey E bin skata una go kon make una prosper again.
Even if una skata for evriwhere for di eart, di Oga una God go gada and bring una kom back to una land.
Di Oga una God go take una enter di land wey E give una grand-grand papa, so dat e go bi una own too. E go make una prosper and many pass una grand-grand papa dem.
Di Oga una God go sekonsaiz una and una shidren heart by ensef, so dat una go love am with all una heart and soul, den una go get betta life.
But di Oga una God go put all dis curse for una enemies head and doz wey dey won kill una.
Den una go obey God vois kon keep all en kommand wey I dey kommand una today.

For all di work wey una go do with una hand, God go make una prosper. Una and una animals go get plenty pikin and una plant go produce plenty food. Bikos God go dey happy to make una prosper, just as E dey happy wen una grand-grand papa dey prosper.
Dis tin go happen wen una obey di Oga una God vois kon keep all en law and kommand wey dem rite for di Law Book, bikos una don turn kom meet God with all una heart and soul.
Di way wey I dey kommand una today, nor dey too strong for una and e nor too mush.
E nor dey for heaven so make nobody sey, “Who go-go heaven go bring di kommand kom for us, so dat wi go hear and do am?”
Di kommand nor dey for di oda side for di river, so una nor nid to ask, “Na who go cross di river go bring am for us, so dat wi go hear and obey am?”
But di word and kommand dey here with una. Una know am and una fit read am, so make una obey am.
Make una know sey, “I dey give una choice between good and bad; life and deat.

If una obey di Oga una God kommand wey I dey give una today so, den una kon love di Oga una God; dey do as E tok; dey keep en rules, law and kommand, una go get long life kon dey many more-more and di Oga una God go bless una for di land wey una won enter as una own.
“But if una turn against God and E kommand kon dey woship juju and oda gods,
I dey tell una today sey una go die! Una nor go stay tey for di land wey una dey cross Jordan River go take as una own.

“I koll heaven and eart make dem bi witness against una today sey, I don give una choice between life and deat, blessing and curse. So make una choose life, so dat una with una shidren go get long life.
Den una go love di Oga wey bi una God kon dey obey en vois and hold am strong, bikos God go give una long life for di land wey E promise to give una grand-grand papa Abraham, Isaak and Jakob.”
Den Moses tell Israel pipol dis word.
“I don rish one hundred and twenty years naw and I nor go fit still bi una leader again. God don tell mi sey, ‘Yu nor go follow dem cross Jordan River.’
Na di Oga una God bi di Pesin wey go cross before una. E go distroy all di oda kountries for una and una go porshu dem komot. Oga God sey na Joshua go lead una cross Jordan River.
God go ponish dis kountries just as E do to Amor pipol kings, Sihon and Og kon distroy dia land.
God go put dem for una hand and na wetin I kommand una, una must do to dem.
Make una dey strong and make una heart nor shake; make una nor fear dem at-all, bikos na di Oga una God dey go with una. E nor go leave or forget una.”

Den Moses koll Joshua kom out for all di pipol present kon sey, “Make yu dey strong and make yor heart nor shake, bikos na yu go lead dis pipol go di land wey God promise dia grand-grand papa and na yu go make dem get am.
God go-go for yor front. E go dey with yu; E nor go leave or forget yu. Make fear nor katch yu and make di work nor taya yu.”
Moses rite all dis law kon gi-am to di priest, Levi shidren wey karry God Kovenant Box and e still give di law to all di eldas for Israel.
Moses kommand dem: “For di last day for evry seven years, for di rite time for di year wey dem dey kansol pipol debt, durin di time wey dem dey do Shelta First,
wen Israel pipol go kom before di Oga una God for di place wey E choose, yu must read dis law for dem make dem hear.
Make una gada all di pipol: men, wimen and shidren, plus all di strenjas among una, so dat dem go hear, learn and know how to fear di Oga una God kon obey all en law.
Den dia shidren wey know di law, go still hear, learn and fear di Oga una God as long as una dey di land wey una dey cross Jordan River go stay.”
Den God tell Moses, “Di time wey yu go die don near well-well. Make yu koll Joshua kom di Tabanako, so dat I go fit tell am wetin e go do.” So Moses and Joshua go di Tabanako where di pipol gada put.
God appear to dem like kloud for di door-mot.
Den God tell Moses, “Yu go soon die, den di pipol go kon dey sin with strenj gods for di land where dem dey go. Dem go rijet mi kon break my kovenant wey I make with dem.

For dat time, I go vex for dem well-well kon leave and hide my face from dem until dia enemies kill dem finish. Many wahala and trobol go ovakom dem and dem go sey, ‘Dis wahala don finish us, bikos God no dey with us again.’
But dat time, I go really hide my face, bikos of all di wikedness wey dem don do as dem dey serve oda gods.
“But make yu rite dis song for yorsef kon tish evribody for Israel. Make sure sey dem know am, so dat dis song go bi my witness against dem!

Bikos afta I don bring dem kom di land wey I promise dia grand-grand papa; di land wey get milk and honey; where dem go chop beleful kon get body, dem go turn go serve anoda god kon rijet and break my kovenant.

Den wen wahala and sofa fall for dia head, dis song go bi witness against dem, bikos dia shidren-shidren nor go forget am. I know wetin dem dey tink for dia mind today, even before I take dem go di land wey I promise dem.”
So for dat day, Moses rite di song kon tish evribody for Israel
and God kon make Joshua, Nun pikin leader for Israel sey, “Make yu dey strong and nor fear, bikos yu go take Israel, my pipol go di land wey I promise dem and I go dey with yu.”
Wen Moses rite finish for dia present,
e kon kommand Levi pipol wey dey karry God Kovenant Box sey,
“Make una take di Law Book kon put am near di Oga una God Kovenant Box. E go dey der as witness against una,
bikos I know as una sturbon rish. True-true, as I stay among una kon rish today, una still dey disobey God; so how una sturbones go kon bi wen I don die?
Make all di tribes kom meet mi; una eldas and ofisas, so dat I go tok to dem by mysef about dis tins kon koll di heavens and eart to bi witness against dem.
Bikos I know sey wen I don die, una go spoil unasef kon turn from dis way wey I kommand una. Wahala go kom meet una dat time, bikos una don do bad tins wey go make God vex.”
Den Moses sing di words for di song from biginnin go rish di end, so dat evribody wey dey Israel, go hear am.
Heavens make una listin to mi as I dey tok;
eart make una listin to di words wey I won tok so.
Make wetin I dey tish una, fall on-top una like rain;
make wetin I dey tok bi like dew for morning.
Make my words fall like rain on-top grass
and make e bi like shawa on-top plant wey just dey grow.
Bikos I go tok about God name
and how E dey strong!
Na-im bi di Rock;
evritin wey E dey do dey korrect,
bikos wayo nor dey en tins.
En na God wey pesin fit bilive,
bikos E nor just dey judge pipol anyhow.
En pipol nor dey respet or fear am;
dem nor dey bihave like en shidren
and na dis bi dia sins.
Dem wiked well-well
and na lie-lie full dia generashon.
Dis pipol wey nor get sense at-all,
na like dis una won take pay God?
Nor bi en bi una papa wey kreate una?
Na-im kreate and make una strong.
Make una remember as e bi before,
make una tink about di generashon wey don pass.
Make una ask una papa and una eldas
and dem go tell una evritin.
Wen di God of all ogas give di nashons dia propaty;
wen E divide evry human being,
E give di pipol where dem go stay rish,
akordin to di nomba wey dey for heaven.
Na God get di pipol for Israel;
na Jakob bi en special propaty.
Na empty dirty land for wildaness E for si dem.
E dey look and guide dem for evry korna;
E dey guide dem as pipol wey E love well-well.
Just as di eagle dey wosh en house
kon kover en shidren,
na so too God spread en feada
kon karry dem go up.
Na God dey guide dem by ensef,
e nor get any oda god wey dey with am.
E allow dem travel pass di high place for di land
kon chop from di plants wey dey di field.
E use honey from di rock
and olive oil from strong groun take kare for dem.
E feed dem with milk from di animals
and with di fats wey dey lamb body.
E give dem betta ram and goat form Bashan,
plus fine-fine food.
Una don drink di wine
wey sweet pass wey dem make from grape.
But Israel pipol kon fat and wiked more-more.
Di pipol kon heavy, round and tick for body!
Dem forget God wey kreate dem;
den kon rijet di Rock wey bi dia salvashon.
Dem make am jealous,
bikos dem dey serve juju and oda gods.
Instead make dem sakrifice give God,
dem dey sakrifice give juju
and gods wey dem nor know;
new gods wey dem just si,
even gods wey dia grand-grand papa
dem nor know about.
Dem don forget di Rock wey bi dia papa
and di God wey kreate dem, nor dey dia mind again.
So wen God si all dis tins,
E vex bikos en shidren dey disobey am.
God sey, “I go rijet dem,
I go si wetin go happen to dem;
bikos dis generashon dey show sey dem too know
and dem nor get sense.
Dem don make mi dey vex
for di gods wey dem dey serve;
dem don make mi dey vex well-well
with tins wey nor mean anytin:
So, I go make dem jealous doz wey nor bi human being:
I go make dem vex well-well for kountry wey nor get sense.
Bikos my vexnashon don kause fire
and e don burn rish di part wey deep pass for di grave
kon distroy di eart and en plants,
den e skata di mountins foundashon.
I go inkrease dia wahala,
I go use all my arrow for dia body.
Honga go kill dem,
betta sofa go worry dem.
I go send wiked animal
and bad snakes go chop dem.
Di swod go bring deat for outside and for inside,
fear go kill both men and wimen;
small pikin and di ones wey don big.
“I sey, ‘I won kut dem to pieces.
I won make pipol forget dem forever.
But I nor go like how di enemies go si am,
bikos dem nor go undastand
and dem go sey, wi too get pawa
and nor bi God do all dis tins!’ ”
Dem bi pipol wey nor get sense
and dem nor fit undastand at-all.
How I wish sey dem get sense and fit undastand dis tins
or know wetin go happen to dem.
How one pesin go fit porshu 1,000 among dem
and two pipol porshu 10,000;
if nor bi sey dia Rock sell dem
and dia God give dem to dia enemies?
Bikos awa enemies rock nor bi like awa Rock
and even awa enemies know sey na so e bi.
Dia vine na from Sodom and Gomorrah field.
Dia grape get poizin and e bitter well-well.
Dia wine na snake poizin
and e bad like kobra own.
God sey, “I nor dey keep all dis tins
among di tins wey I value?
I go revensh and pay dem back wen dem go fall,
bikos di day wen wahala go kom meet dem,
don near well-well
and dia judgement don almost full!”
God go judge en pipol
and E go shange en plan about en savant;
wen E si sey dia pawa don vanish
and nobody remain again,
weda na slave or free pesin.
E go sey, “Where una gods,
di rock wey una bilive sey, e go guide una,
wey dey chop di best for una sakrifice
kon drink di wine for una drink ofrin?
Make dem raiz naw kom help una;
make dem kon save and guide una!”
God sey, “Na Mi, bi Mi!
And e nor get any oda god escept Mi.
I dey kill and give life,
I dey make pesin sick and heal pesin too
and nobody go fit fight mi.
Bikos I raiz my hand go heaven kon sey,
‘As long as I dey forever,
I go make my lite sharp like swod
