and wiked pipol wey dia house don vanish bikos of sin.
Abi yu neva tok to pipol wey travel before?
Yu nor know di kind ripot wey dem dey bring kom back?
Di day wey God go vex ponish pipol,
na di wiked ones E go sorry for.
E nor get who fit blame wiked pipol
for all wetin dem don do.
Dem go guide di grave wey dem beri
dem put afta dem don die.
Pipol go many for dia burial
and di san go kold for dia body.
So how yor bad words won take konfort mi
wey e bi sey evry ansa wey yu dey give mi, na lie!”
Elifaz wey kom from Teman still sey:
“E get any wise pesin
wey God fit gain from?
Yu feel sey God get gain from di good tins wey yu dey do
or di rite way wey yu dey follow?
God dey ponish yu,
bikos yu too obey and respet am?
No! Na bikos of yor sin
and all di oda bad tins wey yu do.
Yu sey make yor broda pay di money
wey e dey hold yu kon seize all en klot.
Pipol wey don taya to work,
yu nor agri give dem wota drink
and wen dem dey hongry,
yu nor give dem food chop.
Yu dey opress pipol with yor pawa and pozishon.
Nor bi only sey yu nor gri help wimen wey
nor get husband again,
but yu dey ponish
and kollect from shidren wey dia papa and mama don die.
Naw, si as trobol surround yu
and fear don dey kill yu small-small.
Yu nor dey si again,
bikos di trobol don too dark for yor eye and wota don kover yu.
God too dey big!
E high pass di heavens
and from der E dey look di stars as dem high rish.
But yu still ask, ‘Wetin God know?
How E won take judge us thru dis tick darkness?’
Yu feel sey as di kloud tick rish,
God nor go si as E dey waka for heaven?
Yu really won waka for di road
wey wiked pipol dey pass?
Even before dia time end,
wota don karry dem go.
Dis na di pipol wey rijet God,
dem bilive sey E nor fit do dem anytin.
Na dis God make dem get money,
yet I nor fit undastand how wiked pipol dey tink sef.
Good pipol dey happy
and doz wey dia belle klean, dey laf.
Evritin wey wiked pipol get don skata
and fire don burn di ones wey remain.
Job! Abeg, go setol with God.
Nor dey bihave like sey God na yor enemy.
If yu follow am make peace,
E go bless yu.
Make yu follow di tins wey E dey tish
kon keep en words for yor heart.
Make yu go back go meet God;
if yu remove wiked tins for yor house,
E go karry yu up.
If yu stop to porshu money
kon trowey yor gold for river,
God wey dey heaven go bi yor propaty.
E go bi yor gold and silva.
Den yu go bilive God
kon know sey na-im dey give happiness.
Wen yu pray, E go ansa yu
and yu go keep di promise wey yu don make.
Yu go prosper for evritin wey yu dey do
and lite go shine for yor way.
God dey save pipol wey dey honbol,
but doz wey feel sey dem wise,
E dey disgrace dem.
God go save pesin wey nor dey innocent,
bikos yor hand dey klean.”
Job kon ansa:
“Today, my komplain still dey make my heart betta;
I nor fit hold my bitterness.
If to sey I know where I go for si God
and how to go where E dey,
I for komplain gi-am
kon tell am all di trobol wey I dey face.
I won know wetin E go tok
and how E go ansa mi.
God go fight mi with all en pawa?
No! I nor tink so.
E go listin and ansa mi wen I tok.
Since pesin wey dey rite with God fit go follow am tok,
den E go diliver mi from pipol wey dey judge mi, forever.
I don find am go east, but I nor si am.
I nor si am for west wen I find am go der too.
Wen God dey work for nort and sout,
I nor still si am.
Yet, God know evry step wey I dey take.
If E sey make E test mi,
I go klean kom out like gold.
Bikos I just dey waka follow God for back;
for di road wey E choose by ensef
and I nor dey waka on my own.
I dey always do wetin E tok;
dey follow en words; nor bi my own.
E neva shange and nobody fit oppoz
or stop am from wetin E won do.
E go do wetin E don plan for mi.
Na-im dey kontrol my destini.
Na dis make mi dey fear and wen ever I si am,
my hold body go dey shake.
True-true, na God make mi dey fear.
E don distroy di mind wey I get.
Na God, nor bi di darkness make mi kwayet,
even doh di darkness don kover my face.
“Why God nor set di time wen E go take judge pipol;
di day wey E go judge di pipol wey dey woship am?
Stone wey dem take mark land,
pipol dey move am komot from where dem put am,
so dat dem go get many land;
dem still dey tif animals join dia own.
Shidren wey nor get papa and mama again,
dem dey take dia donkey
and bikos of di money wey wimen wey
nor get husband dey hold,
pipol dey seize dia animals.
Dem nor let poor pipol get wetin dem suppose get
and doz wey nor get at-all,
dey run go hide.
Just like wiked donkey for desert, na so poor pipol dey find food waka.
Dem even dey find food rish desert
so dat dia shidren go chop.
Dem just dey work for land wey nor bi dia own
and dem dey chop from wiked pipol land.
For nite, dem dey sleep without kover klot;
nor-tin dey to keep dem from kold.
Rain wey dey fall on-top di mountin dey beat dem
and dem dey go hide under rock, bikos dem nor get house.
Wiked pipol dey use small pikin wey nor get papa take do slave
kon seize poor pipol shidren,
bikos of di money wey dem dey hold.
But poor pipol dey naked go out;
na with honga dem take dey work.
Dem go press oil kom out from olive fruit
and wine from grape fruit,
but demsef nor go even si wota drink.
For inside town, doz wey wound
and di ones wey dey die, dey kry,
but God nor dey ansa dem.
E get pipol wey rijet di lite;
dem nor undastand di lite
or follow where e dey lead dem go.
For day break, wiked pipol go get up go kill poor pipol
and for nite,
dem go-go tif dia propaty.
Di ones wey don marry wey dey sleep with oda pipol,
go kover dia face make nobody si dem.
For nite, tif go break enter pipol house,
but for day time, di tif go-go hide from lite.
Dem dey fear morning lite,
but dem nor get anytin to fear for nite.
But na wota go karry wiked pipol go;
God go curse dia land
and nobody go work for dia farm again.
As snow dey dry for heat and melt for sun,
na so sinnas go vanish from dis land.
Even dia mama nor go remember dem again.
Na worm go chop dem and dem go bi like tree wey dem kut trowey.
Dem dey ponish wimen wey dia husband don die
and doz wey nor get pikin.
But God go distroy wiked pipol with en pawa;
wen God take akshon, wiked pipol nor get hope again.
God fit let dem stay for peace,
but en eye nor go komot for dia body at-all.
Wiked pipol fit dey great naw,
but e nor go tey before dem go die go like grass
and korn wey dem kut trowey.
If nor bi so e bi, who go fit sey I dey lie
or sey wetin I tok, nor bi true?”
Bildad kon sey:
“Na God get pawa pass.
E keep en kingdom wey dey heaven for peace.
Anybody fit kount di angels?
Abi e get where God lite nor dey shine rish?
Anybody fit dey klean before God?
How yu wey woman born won take dey pure?
For God eye, even di moon nor brite
and di stars nor shine rish.
Tok-less of human being wey just bi like worm and magot!
Wetin dia life mean to God?”
Job ansa:
“Si how yu don help pipol wey nor get pawa.
Yu don save pipol wey nor get strent at-all!
Yu dey give dem good advise kon share wetin yu know with fools,
like mi!
Who yu feel sey go hear all wetin yu dey tok?
Na wish spirit make yu dey tok like dis?
“Dead body dey shake with fear for dia grave.
Evritin wey dey inside wota dey shake too.
Where dead body dey stay just dey open before God;
nor-tin fit kover am from en eye.
God spread di sky for nort
kon hang di eart for empty space.
Na God put wota for di kloud
and E nor dey let rain fall from di kloud with force.
Na-im use di kloud
take kover di moon.
E kreate di sky wen E separate di wota
and divide lite from darkness.
As God tok, di pila wey hold di sky
kon dey shake with fear.
Na en pawa E use take silent di sea.
Na en wisdom E take distroy Rahab wey bi di wota juju.
Wen E breath, di sky dey klear.
Na en hand E take distroy di big snake.
But all dis na small tin kompare to di pawa wey E get.
Na small wi don hear.
Who go fit really undastand how God strong and great rish?”
Job still sey:
“As long as God Almighty wey nor gri judge my kase
kon make my life bitter dey alive,
as far I dey breath
and God still give mi life,
my mout nor go ever tok bad
and my tongue nor go ever tok lie-lie words.
I nor go ever agri with wetin una dey tok!
I go stand for my rite till I die.
I nor go ever give up, bikos I dey rite;
my mind dey klean and my konscience nor dey judge mi.
“Make all my enemies, sofa like wiked pipol
and doz wey nor know God.
Doz wey nor know God before dem die,
na wish kind hope dem get?
Wen trobol go kom,
God go hear dia kry?
God go show dem en happiness?
Dem go fit koll God anytime wey dem like?
Make I tish yu how God pawa strong rish.
Make I tell yu about di Almighty God plan.
But I nor go tish yu,
bikos yu don si am by yorsef.
So wetin make yu dey
tok all dis bad tins?”
Zofar ansa,
“Na so God take dey ponish pipol wey dey like trobol
and do wiked tins.
If dia shidren many, dem go die for war
and di ones wey remain nor go si food chop beleful.
Di ones wey manage survive, na sickness go still kill dem
and dia wife nor go kry for dem.
Wiked pipol fit get plenty money like san,
dia klot fit plenty pass evribody own,
but na good pipol go wear dia klot
kon kollect dia money.
Wiked pipol dey build house like spider own
or like where hunta dey stay.
E go sleep as rish man,
but wen e wake-up,
e nor go si en money again.
Just as wota dey karry tins go, na so too fear go karry dem go
and for nite, breeze go blow dem trowey.
Strong wind from east go swip dem
komot from dia house
and as dem dey try to run,
God nor go sorry for dem
and E go blow dem fall.
Strong breeze go push dem as dem dey run and with en pawa,
e go porshu dem komot from where dem dey.”
Job sey,
“Where dem for dey dig silva, na der precious stones dey
and e still get where dem for dey rifine gold too.
Na from groun dem for dey dig iron
and melt koppa.
Man don end darkness,
bikos dem shine lite dey search under di eart
and dey dig rock wey dey for darkness.
Where dem for dig di precious stones
dey far from where pipol dey stay
and nobody dey travel pass der again.
Dem dey stagga fall
and pipol nor dey der.
Even doh food dey kom from di eart,
evriwhere under di eart,
don skata like wetin fire burn.
Na betta stone dey di eart
and gold dey en dust.
No bird know di road wey lead to where gold dey
and know vulture don fly pass or si am before.
No lion or oda wiked animals fit travel
pass dat road wons.
Pipol dig di rock and mountins wey hard pass
bikos dem dey find gold.
As dem dey dig hold for di rock,
dem kom si precious stones.
Dem dig rish wota kon bring wetin dem hide,
kom out for lite.
“But where wi go fit si wisdom?
Where wi go fit learn how to undastand?
Yu nor fit si wisdom with human being;
bikos e nor dey among pipol wey dey alive.
Even bottom river sey,
‘E nor dey with mi’
and under sea sey,
‘E nor dey with mi too.’
Dem nor go fit buy wisdom
with gold or silva.
Di gold and jewel wey fine pass
nor get value rish wisdom.
Wisdom dey more important pass gold;
e even dear pass where gold full or where fine glass dey.
Wisdom get betta value pass diamond
or fine glass.
Topaz stone wey fine pass and di gold wey klean pass,
dem nor fit kompare dem with wisdom.
“But where wisdom from kom sef?
Where wi go for fit learn how to undastand?
Nor-tin wey dey live for dis life fit si wisdom,
even di birds wey dey fly nor fit si am.
Deat and distroshon agri sey,
na hear dem just dey hear.
Na only God know di way
and place where dem fit si wisdom,
bikos E dey si di end for di eart
and E dey si evritin wey dey under di sky.
Na God give breeze pawa
kon measure where di sea go rish.
Na God dey choose where di rain go fall rish
and where tonda go travel pass.
Na der E si wisdom kon test as e important rish,
den E si sey e dey good.
God tell human being,
‘Before una go get sense, una must woship mi.
Una go turn live bad tins,
before una go fit get undastandin.’ ”
Job still sey:
“If to sey my life go fit bi as e bi before
wen God dey look and guide mi!
Dat time, God always dey with mi
and E dey give mi lite wen I dey waka for darkness.
Dat na di time wey evritin still dey well with mi.
Den God goodness still dey protet my house.
Den God still dey with mi
and all my shidren gada round mi.
My melu and goats dey give mi plenty milk
and my olive tree dey grow for groun wey dry and strong.
Wen ever di town eldas dey meet
and I go der,
yong boys dey stand as soon as dem si mi dey kom
and old pipol dey stand greet mi with respet.
Di leaders wey dey lead di pipol
go stop to tok.
Even di pesin wey dey important pass,
go shut up for mi.
“Evribody wey hear from mi, dey praiz mi.
Doz wey hear mi dey tok, go-go tok good about mi.
Wen poor pipol kry kom meet mi,
I dey help dem;
I dey help pikin wey nor get papa
and mama and doz wey nor get where to go.
Doz wey dey face wahala, dey praiz mi
and I dey protet and guide wimen wey dia husband don die.
I dey always do betta tin.
Evritin wey I do dey always dey good.
Na mi bi blind pipol eye
and doz wey nor fit waka,
na mi bi dia leg.
I bi like papa to poor pipol
and I dey setol matter even for doz wey I nor know.
I dey distroy wiked pipol pawa
kon release di pesin wey dem katch.
“Den I sey, I go get long life
kon die for my house without trobol.
I go bi like tree wey en rut get wota;
wey dew dey wet en branches.
Evribody go dey praiz mi
and my pawa nor go fail.
“Wen I dey advise pipol,
dem dey kwayet listin to wetin I dey tok
and dem nor dey get anytin to tok wen I don tok finish.
My word dey enter dia mind well.
Evribody dey welkom mi,
just as farmer dey welkom rain wey won fall.
I dey smile give dem wey nor bilive diasef again
and my betta face dey give dem hope.
I dey lead dem as king dey lead many pipol
kon konfort dem wen dem dey face trobol.
“But pipol wey yong pass mi
dey laf mi naw!
Pipol wey dia papa nor dey yuzful,
wey I nor go even allow join di dogs wey dey guide my sheep.
Dem bi yuzles pipol
and dem too weak to do any work for mi.
Bikos dem poor well-well and honga won kill dem,
dem kon dey chop dry rut and dirty for nite.
Dem dey pul and chop plant for desert;
even di small tree wey en rut nor get taste,
dem dey chop am too!
Evribody dey shaut follow dem like tif
kon porshu dem komot from di land.
Dem dey stay for inside hold wey en wota don dry
and inside rock too.
Dem dey bihave and shaut like animals
and gada togeda for bush.
Dem nor get sense or name
and dem porshu dem komot di town.
“Naw, dem dey kom laf
and take mi sing.
Na mi dem dey take do joke naw.
Dem dey trit mi like sey I dey smell;
dem feel sey dem too good pass mi,
so dem kon spit for my face.
Bikos God don make mi weak and I nor get who go help mi;
dem kon use all dia vexnashon take face mi.
Dem gada kon fight mi;
dem drive mi from one place to anoda
and dem don agri for wetin dem go do mi.
Dem follow mi as I dey run
kon dey try to distroy mi
and e nor get who fit stop dem.
Dem kon attack mi from difren angle.
Dem jump press mi wen I don already fall.
Fear don chop my full body;
my respet don go like wota proof wey breeze blow
and my glory don vanish like kloud.
“I won die naw;
bikos na so-so pains full my days.
Di nite dey make my bones pain mi; di pains dey bite mi
and e nor gri stop.
God hold mi for neck with pawa
kon make di klot wey I wear, dirty.
E trow mi for mud and naw,
I bi like dust and ashes.
God, I dey koll Yu,
but Yu nor gri ansa and wen I pray,
Yu nor gri listin to my prayers.
Yu dey do mi anyhow;
Yu dey ponish mi with all yor pawa.
Yu allow breeze blow mi go;
Yu trow mi up-and-down for inside strong breeze.
I know sey Yu dey karry mi go where I go for die;
di place wey Yu keep for evribody.
“True-true, nobody go fight poor pesin,
wen e kry sey make dem help am from en trobol.
Abi I nor follow pipol wey dey trobol kry
kon sorry for pipol wey nor get at-all?
Na happiness and lite I dey hope for,
but na trobol and darkness I kom get.
Pain and worry don skata my body;
I dey sofa evriday.
I just dey waka for darkness and I nor dey si lite at-all.
I dey beg for help for where crowd Gad put.
I don kry sotey my vois don krack
and my neck don long like Ostrich own.
My skin don black finish
and strong fever dey katch mi naw.
I nor fit remember di last time wen I hear betta music,
bikos na only song wey go make mi mourn and kry,
naim dem dey play.
“I don swear with my eye sey I
nor go ever look wimen kon sey I won sleep with dem.
Wetin God for heaven choose for us?
Wetin wi go gain from di Almighty wey dey heaven?
Shebi trobol na for doz wey dey do bad tins
and wahala for wiked pipol?
God know evritin wey I dey do;
E dey si evry step wey I dey take.
I neva do wiked tin before
and I neva ever lie to anybody.
Make God just test mi weda I dey klean
and E go si sey I nor do any bad tin.
If I don komot from di rite way;
if my heart don follow wetin my eye si
or if sin full my hand,
den make anoda pesin chop wetin I plant.
Make dem rut and distroy evritin wey I plant.
If I dey like and won sleep with woman for my heart
kon dey wait and hide outside en door,
den make my wife kook for anoda man chop
and make e sleep for anoda man bed.
Bikos dat go bi big shame
and na deat dem take dey ponish dat kind wikedness.
Make e bi like hell-fire wey dey distroy tins;
fire wey go burn evritin wey I get.
If any of my savant komplain give mi,
I dey listin and I dey trit dem well.
If I nor dey do dem well, how I won take face God?
Wetin I won tok if God kom judge mi?
Na di same God wey kreate mi,
kreate my savants too.
I dey always help poor pipol;
I neva let wimen wey nor get husband live for pain
or allow shidren wey nor get papa and mama dey hongry,
while I dey chop.
Na since wen I small I don dey kare for doz wey
nor get papa and mama and till I die,
I go always dey kare for wimen wey dia husband don die.
If I si pesin wey nor get at-all;
wey won die, bikos e nor get wetin to wear,
I go gi-am klot wey dem use my own animal wool take make.
Den e go tank mi with en hold heart.
If I don ever do bad to
who nor get papa and mama,
bikos I know sey I go win di matter
wen wi go kourt,
den make my hand break.
Make e break
komot from my shoulder.
But bikos I dey fear God ponishment,
I nor fit do dat kind tin.
I neva ever bilive money.
I nor ever si am as wetin go protet mi
or kom dey karry body,
bikos of di money wey I get.
I neva ever woship sun,
bikos e dey give lite or di moon, bikos e fine.
I neva for one day like dem rish wen I go
kon dey kiss my hand dey woship dem.
Na deat dem take dey reward dat kind sin;
bikos e go mean sey I nor honor God name.
I neva happy wons, bikos my enemies dey sofa;
or dey for peace, bikos dem dey face trobol.
I neva ever pray make dem die,
bikos if I do like dat, God nor go forgive mi.
My savants neva ever sey,
‘Awa oga let hunga kill some pipol.’
Doz wey dey travel, I dey koll dem enter my house
and I nor dey let dem travel or sleep for road wen nite rish.
Oda pipol dey try to hide dia sin, but I neva ever hide my own.
I nor dey kwayet or stay for inside house,
bikos I dey fear sey pipol go curse or tok against mi.
“Nobody won listin to wetin I dey tok?
I swear sey evry word wey I dey tok na true.
Make God kom ansa mi.
Make dem rite wetin my enemies tok about mi,
so dat I go si dem.
I go karry dem without shame for my shoulder
kon wear dem like king crown.
I go dey proud to tell God evritin wey I don do.
I go waka go meet am like prince.
“If I tif di land wey I for dey farm
or take am from di original owner,
or chop di food wey grow for der,
so dat di owner nor go si chop,
den instead of fruit or korn to grow, make bush
and grass grow full dat land!”
Den Job kon stop to dey tok.
So Job three friends nor gri ansa Job again, bikos dem know sey e dey tok trut.
Den Elihu wey bi Barakel pikin from Ram family for Buz kon dey vex. E dey vex, bikos Job sey e nor do God anytin.
E still vex for Job friends, bikos dem nor know how to ansa Job and evritin kon bi like sey, na God dey wrong.
Bikos na Elihu small pass for der, e wait until evribody tok finish.
Wen e si sey di three men nor fit ansa Job again, e kon dey vex.
Elihu wey en papa na Barakel wey kom from Buz kon sey:
“I know sey I small and yu don old
and na dis make mi dey fear to tell yu wetin I dey tink.
I tell mysef sey make una tok,
bikos una wey don old fit get wisdom wey una go share.
But I don si am sey na God Almighty spirit dey enter
and give human being wisdom.
Nor bi old age go make pesin wise
or tish pipol how to undastand wetin dey rite.
Naw, I won tok and una go listin to mi.
Make I tell una wetin I know.
I kwayet dey listin to wetin una dey tok since;
I dey listin to una wise word
and as una dey tink wetin to tok.
I hear una well-well,
but una nor fit show sey Job dey wrong;
nobody among una fit ansa en kweshon.
So why una dey tell pipol sey una get wisdom?
Naw, na only God go fit ansa am, bikos una don fail.
Job dey tok to una;
nor bi mi e dey tok to, but if na mi e tok to,
I nor go ansa am di way wey una take ansa am.
“Job, yor words too strong for all of dem;
dem nor get ansa for yu.
Make I dey wait wen dem nor get anytin to tok?
Dem just stand for der,
bikos dem nor get anytin to tok again.
But I go give yu my own ansa
and I go tell yu wetin I dey tink.
I nor fit wait to tok
or hold my words again.
If una nor let mi tok,
my belle go burst like wine wey dey new wine bag.
I must tok make I dey free!
I nor fit bear-am again!
I nor go support one pesin for dis matter
and I nor go praiz anybody sef!
I nor sabi praiz pesin anyhow,
bikos God go ponish mi,
if I do like dat.
“Job, make yu listin
and hear evritin wey I won tok!
Si naw, I don open my mout
and my tongue won start to tok.
All my words na true
and na true I go tok.
Na God Spirit make mi
and na en breath give mi life.
Make yu ansa mi if yu fit.
Make yu dey ready and prepare yor kweshons.
Na di same tin mi and yu bi for God eye,
na san dem take make mi and yu.
So yu nor get rizin to fear mi
and I nor go wahala yu too mush.
“Naw, dis na wetin I hear
wen yu dey tok:
‘I nor dey guilty;
I neva do any bad tin or kommit sin.
But God dey find rizin make E for dey ponish mi
like sey I bi en enemy.
E tie my leg with shain;
E dey si evriwhere wey I waka go.’
But I won tell yu sey yu dey wrong,
bikos God big pass evribody.
Why yu dey akuiz God sey E
nor dey ever ansa yor komplain?
“Even as God dey tok evritime,
nobody won wait listin to wetin E dey tok.
For nite wey pipol dey sleep,
God dey tok to dem for vishon or thru dreams.
Wen E make dem listin to wetin E dey tok,
dem go dey fear for di warnin wey E dey give dem.
God dey tok so dat dem go stop to sin kon honbol demsef,
make E for fit save dem.
E nor go let dem distroy demsef;
E go save dem from deat.
God dey send sickness to take korrect some pipol
and dem go take korreshon
wen dia body dey feel di pain.
Pipol wey dey sick nor fit even chop di food
wey sweet well-well.
Dia body dey die go
and yu nor go fit si dia bones again.
Dem go soon go join dead body.
Deat angel dey wait for dem.
May bi one angel go help am;
one out of di tazon angels wey God get
wey go tell am wetin dey rite.
Bikos God don forgi-am, di angel go sey,
‘Release am! E nor go fit go join dead body.
Si wetin dem take replace en sin,
so e don dey free.’
En body go kom yong and strong again
like small pikin own.
Den wen e pray, God go ansa am.
E go woship God with happiness.
God go make am dey raitious for en eye again.
Di pesin go sing give odas sey,
‘I sin kon do wetin dey bad,
but God nor ponish mi as e suppose to bi.’
E don save mi from deat
and I still dey alive.
“True-true, God dey always do like dis,
many-many times with pipol.
E dey save pesin life from deat
and make am enjoy life again.
So Job, make yu listin to wetin I dey tok.
Naw, kwayet make yu let mi tok.
But if yu get wetin yu won tok,
tok and I go tell yu if yu dey rite.
But if yu nor get,
make yu kwayet listin to mi
and I go tish yu wisdom.”
Elihu still sey:
“Wise men, make una listin to my words;
Make una hear mi, men wey know well-well.
Una know betta food wen una put am for mout,
but una ear nor know wise word wen e hear am.
So make wi choose wetin dey rite.
Make wi know among awasef wetin dey good.
Job sey en know do bad tin
and God nor gri defend am.
E sey, ‘As I dey rite so, make I lie sey I dey wrong?
Dem nor fit heal my wound, even doh I nor sin at-all.’
Yu don si any man wey bi like Job
wey dey tok anyhow?
E like make bad pipol dey stay with am
and e dey waka with sinnas.
E sey pesin nor dey gain anytin,
if e dey obey God.
“Men wey dey undastand, make una listin to mi!
God Almighty go fit do wetin dey wrong?
E dey reward pipol for wetin dem do
and dey trit dem as dem deserve.
True-true, God nor dey do bad tin;
E dey judge evribody as e suppose bi.
Abi God get en pawa for anoda place?
Na somebody tell am sey make E kare for di world?
If God remove di breath
wey dey give us life,
den evribody wey dey live for dis life go die
kon turn to san.
“Naw, make yu listin to mi.
If yu get undastandin, make yu hear mi.
So yu dey tok sey God nor dey rite naw?
Yu feel sey E hate justice?
God dey kondemn kings and rulers
wey wiked and nor dey yuzful.
E nor dey support rulers or rish pipol against poor pipol,
bikos na-im kreate all of dem.
Pesin fit die for nite just like dat,
but God nor dey struggol to distroy pipol
wey tink sey dem get pawa.
God dey si evritin wey wi dey do.
E dey si evry step wey wi take.
E nor get as di darkness tick rish,
e nor fit hide sinnas from God.
Wi nor fit set di time
wey God go take judge all of us.
E nor nid pesin to tell am anytin, before E go remove leader
kon put anoda pesin for en post.
Bikos E know wetin di leader do.
E fit ova-trow and skata dem for nite.
E dey ponish sinnas bikos of dia sin
and na for where evribody go for si dem,
bikos dem don stop
to follow en laws and kommand.
Dem make poor pipol dey kry to God
and E don hear dia koll for help.
If God sey E nor go do anytin,
nobody go fit ask am kweshon.
If E hide en face, wi nor go get help at-all weda na one pesin
or di hold kountry.
God dey do like dis, so dat wiked pipol nor go rule
and opress di pipol.
“Wetin make pipol nor dey konfess dia sins give God
kon promise sey dem nor go sin again;
den tell mi my fault
so dat I nor go do dem again?
Job! Na yor choice,
nor bi mi go tell God wetin yu wont,
bikos yu don rijet all dis tin.
Naw, make yu tell us
wetin yu dey tink.
True-true, anybody wey get sense go gri
and if wise man hear mi, e go tok sey,
Job just dey tok,
bikos e nor know wetin e dey tok
and all wetin e dey tok,
nor make sense.
But I wish sey dem test Job rish di end,
bikos e dey ansa like wiked pesin.
E don add trobol join e sins,
bikos for awa front,
e dey klap en hand and dey akuiz God.”
Elihu still sey:
“Job, e dey rite make yu dey sey yu
nor do any bad tin for God eye?
Or to ask God sey, ‘Wetin I go gain if I nor sin?
Any nid dey to live klean life?’
I go ansa yu
and all yor friends.
Make una si how di kloud high rish!
Make una look di sky well-well!
If yu sin, e nor give God any trobol.
Even if yu kontinue to dey sin,
e nor go shake am.
Even if yu dey good well-well, na God yu dey favor?
E nor get wetin God wont for yor hand.
Just as yor wikedness dey affect only pipol
wey dey do like yu,
na so too di good wey yu do,
go affect doz wey dey do good.
Bikos of di opreshon
wey pipol dey sofa from strong pipol,
dem dey kry for help.
But dem nor dey kry to God wey kreate dem;
wey dey give dem hope for darkness.
Dem nor dey turn to God wey make us get sense;
di One wey make us wise pass animals and birds.
Dem dey kry for help,
but God nor dey ansa dem,
bikos dem too proud and dem dey do bad tins.
E nor get nid for dem to kry;
bikos God nor dey si or hear dia kry.
Yu sey yu nor fit si God;
but make yu dey patient,
bikos yor matter dey en hand.
Yu sey, ‘Wen God vex,
E nor dey ponish pipol,
bikos E nor dey kare about di bad tins wey dem dey do.’
But Job! No nid for yu to dey tok,
bikos e klear sey yu
nor know wetin yu dey tok about.”
Elihu still sey:
“Make yu relax and listin to mi small,
bikos I still get some tins to tok for God,
as E nor dey here with us.
I go use wetin I know take show sey God dey rite.
I go tok di ones wey I know.
My words nor bi lie;
na betta wise man stand for yor front so.
True-true, God strong well-well!
E nor dey feel sey pesin nor dey yuzful
and e nor get anytin wey E nor undastand.
E nor dey give wiked pipol long life,
but E dey judge well for poor pipol.
E dey protet good pipol;
E dey let dem live like kings
and pipol dey respet dem forever.
But if dem shain dem inside prison
and dem dey sofa,
bikos of wetin dem do,
God go show dem di rizin.
E go show dem dia sin and pride.
E go make dem listin to en warnin,
so dat dem go leave wiked tins.
If dem hear God word kon serve am,
dia life go get peace and dem go prosper.
But if dem nor gri listin to God word,
dem go die and dem nor know anytin
before dem go where dead body dey.
Pipol wey nor know God go just dey vex
and even wen E ponish dem,
dem nor go sey make E sorry for dem.
Dem dey die wen dem still yong
and na disgrace dey end dia life.
But God use sofa take dey tish
and save en pipol kon korrect dem with pain.
God remove yu from trobol
kon make yu dey save
and yu get food full yor tabol.
But naw, yu dey get di kind ponishment
wey fit yu.
Make yu dey kareful,
so dat dem nor go fool yu with money
or sey yu follow money go di wrong way.
E nor go do yu any good sey yu dey kry for help;
bikos yu get betta pawa wey nor fit help yu.
Nor dey wait for nite,
wen pipol don go dia house.
Make yu dey kareful,
so dat yu nor go do bad tin,
bikos yu dey sofa.
Make yu remember how God strong rish,
bikos na-im dey tish tishas.
Nobody fit kommand God
or akuiz am sey E do bad tin.
Na praiz pipol dey always praiz am for anytin wey E do.
So, yusef must praiz am.
Evribody don si wetin E do!
Na from far wi dey look am.
“Wi nor fit know how God strong rish.
Wi nor fit search or kount how many years God don dey.
Na God dey take wota from di eart
kon turn am to rain.
E dey let di rain fall from di kloud,
so dat pipol go prosper as dem dey work.
Nobody know how tonda take dey make nois for di sky
or how kloud take dey waka
for heaven where God dey.
E dey send lite pass di sky,
but under di sea dey-dey dark.
Dis na how E dey feed
and provide plenty food for pipol to chop.
Na en hand E take dey stop tonda lite
kon send am go where E wont.
Even animals know sey tonda
kom before heavy rain dey fall.
“My heart kom dey beat fast-fast
as I bigin tink of dis tins.
Make all of una listin to God vois.
Make una listin to di tonda wey dey
kom out from en mout.
Na-im send lite go cross di sky;
from one end go rish di oda end for di world.
Dat time, una go hear di vois well-well
kon si di brite tonda lite as e dey pass.
Wen God tok, e dey bi like tonda
and wonderful tins dey happen;
tins wey wi nor fit undastand.
Na-im dey kommand snow and heavy rain sey,
make dem dey fall for di eart.
Na only en fit stop di work wey wi dey do,
so dat wi go know how E strong rish.
Den animals go-go dia house
kon stay der.
Heavy rain dey kom from sout,
while strong kold breeze dey kom from nort.
Wen God breath, wota dey turn to block!
Di wota dey block finish!
E load di kloud with wota
and lite dey flash kom out
as di kloud dey go
where God sey make e go.
Di kloud dey do evritin wey God kommand for dis world.
God wey dey send rain kom wota di eart,
fit still send am kom ponish or favor us.
Job, make yu wait small kon listin;
konsida all di wonderful tins wey God don do,
den yu go know how God take dey give kommand
and how E take make di lite flash for di kloud.
Yu know how di kloud take hang for sky?
Dat na one tin wey God do wey dey sopraiz evribody.
Wen yu dey sweet well-well
bikos of di heat wey di sout wind dey bring,
yu fit help God bring di sky kom out kon make am strong
like iron wey dem polish?
Make yu tish us wetin wi go tell God,
bikos wi nor get anytin for mind to tok.
Make dem go tell God sey I won tok to am?
Pesin even fit tok wen e konfuse?
Naw, di lite for sky brite well-well
and wi nor fit look am,
bikos breeze don swip di eart klean.
Na golden lite wi dey si for di nort
and na glory kover us for God present.
Wi nor fit kom klose to God,
bikos en pawa big well-well!
E always dey rite and korrect as E dey deal with us.
No wonder evribody dey fear am
and E nor get anytin to do with pipol
wey feel sey dem wise.”
God kon ansa Job from inside di storm:
“Who yu bi to kweshon my wisdom
with yor empty words?
Naw, make yu stand like man
kon ansa di kweshons wey I go ask yu.
“Yu dey der wen I kreate di heavens and eart?
If yu know well-well, tell mi about dem.
Na who tok how dem go big rish?
Who measure dem with tape?
Yu know di ansa?
Na wetin hold di pilas
wey dey support di eart?
Na who put di korner-stone
for di world,
wen doz wey dey stay heaven
dey shaut for joy
and for morning,
di stars dey sing togeda?
Who klose di sea mout wen e won
komot from di eart belle?
Na mi kover di sea with kloud
kon gada di darkness.
I give di sea where e go flow rish
kon put big gate for en back.
I tell am sey, ‘Na here yu go rish and yu nor go pass der!
Na here yor pawaful wave go for stop.’
For yor life, yu don ever kommand morning
or tell di day wen e go break?
Abi yu don kommand day make e seize di eart
kon shake wiked pipol komot from where dem hide put?
Na day lite make di hill
and valley stand like klot wey dem fold
and evritin klear like wetin dem rite for groun.
Day lite too brite for wiked pipol
and e dey stop dem to make trobol.
Yu don rish where di wota wey dey full di sea dey?
Abi yu don waka for under sea before?
Anybody don ever show yu di gate
wey dey guide where dead body dey?
Yu know how di world big rish?
Ansa mi, if yu know!
Yu know where di lite from dey kom
or wetin dey bring darkness out?
Yu fit show dem how far dem fit go
or send dem go house?
I dey sure well-well sey yu fit,
bikos yu don old,
wise well-well and dey der wen I kreate di world!
Yu don ever go where I dey keep di snow
and di ice-blok rain, put?
I keep dem dey wait di time wen trobol go kom
and di day wen war go start.
Yu don rish di place where sun from dey kom
or di place wey east wind for dey blow kom?
Who dig pit for di rain wey dey fall
kon klear road for tonda nois?
Who make di rain dey fall
for where nobody dey stay?
Who dey wet di dry land with wota,
so dat di grass go grow?
Abi di rain
or dew get papa?
Ice-blok and kold wey dey fall kom from di sky,
na who bi dia mama?
Wish time wota take strong like stone;
wen sea bigin dey turn ice-blok?
Yu fit luz di klot wey dey Orion waist
or yu won shain Pleiades?
Yu fit guide di stars from one sizin to anoda
kon lead di big and small Bear?
Yu know di law wey dey tell di sky wetin to do?
Or wetin dey make di laws work for dis eart?
Yu fit kommand di kloud
kon sey make rain bigin fall?
If yu kommand lite make e flash,
e go ansa yu sey,
‘I go do evritin wey yu tok?’
Na who put wisdom for pesin heart
or make us dey undastand tins?
Who fit kount di kloud, bikos e feel sey e wise
kon tell dem sey make rain fall;
rain wey dey make strong
and dry groun soft?
Na yu dey give lion food make dem chop,
or dey make small lion beleful
wen dem hide for dia hold
or just sleep dey wait for dia house?
Na who dey feed raven bird wen dem dey waka dey find food for evriwhere?
Even wen dia small shidren dey kry give mi sey dem dey hongry,
na yu dey feed dem?
Yu know how dem take born di goats
wey dey stay mountin?
Yu don si wen bush animals
dey born before?
Yu know how long dem dey karry dia shidren for belle?
Yu know di time wey dem take dey born?
Yu know how dem take bend down
for groun born dia pikin?
For inside forest dia pikin dey grow dey strong
and wen dem waka go dia own,
dem nor dey kom back again.
Donkey wey dey forest, na who give dem freedom?
Who release and let dem dey waka up-and-down?
Na mi give dem di desert make dem stay.
I sey make dem stay di empty land.
Dem nor dey stay near di town at-all,
dem dey far and nobody fit go katch dem kom work.
Na for mountin dem for dey si food chop,
na der dem for dey si green leaf chop.
How bush melu won take work for yu?
E go gri stay one nite for yor yard?
Yu fit use rope tie bush melu make e
for follow yu klear di field?
Yu sure sey e go gri use en pawa
take do yor heavy work?
Yu dey espect am to bring wetin e harvest
kon gada am for di place where korn dey?
Si as ostrich wey get long leg dey run,
but e nor fit fly like stork.
E dey leave en egg for groun
make heat for warm dem.
E nor dey kare sey pesin leg fit mash di egg
or wiked animal fit kom break dem.
E dey bihave like sey nor bi en get di egg
and e nor koncern am if di egg break or skata.
Na mi make am nor get sense like dat!
Na mi nor gi-am wisdom.
But wen e don start to run,
e dey laf horse
and di pesin wey dey ride am.
So Job, na yu make horse strong like dat
or na yu give dem hair like klot for dia neck?
Na yu dey make dem jump like lokust
kon make pipol fear wen dem breath?
Dem dey skata groun as dem dey run for valley;
dem dey rush enter war with all dia pawa.
Dem nor know wetin fear mean
and know swod fit make dem turn back.
Di swod wey who dey ride dem karry,
dey make nois and shine for di sun.
Horse dey run go, bikos dem just dey happy anyhow;
even wen dem don blow di trumpet, dem nor go gri stop.
As dem hear di trumpet dem go vex;
dem fit smell war even before dem near der
and dem dey hear dia oga kommand.
Hawk dey kom ask yu make yu tish am wisdom,
so dat e go know how to fly wen e spread en feada face sout?
Abi eagle go wait for yor kommand
before e go build en nest for mountin?
E build en house for di rock wey high pass
kon use rock take do pillow for nite.
From dat place, e dey find sometin wey e go chop,
even if e dey near or far.
Eagle dey gada round dead body,
while small eagle dey drink dia blood.”
Den God tell Job:
“Yu dey argue with God Almighty;
yu don taya to tok or yu still get word to tell mi?”
Den Job ansa God:
“True-true, I dey tok like fool since,
wetin I go fit ansa? I nor go try tok anytin again.
I don tok pass wetin I suppose tok.
I nor get anytin to tok again?”
Den from inside di storm, God kon ansa Job:
Make yu stand strait
kon ansa my kweshons.
Yu dey try to sey I dey wiked,
bikos yu dey sey I dey wrong and yu dey rite?
Yu strong rish mi?
Abi yor vois loud rish my own?
If na so, stand up make yu ansa mi;
dress like king make yu hail yorsef.
Look pipol wey tink sey dem dey important,
den go honbol dem, bikos yu dey vex.
Yes! Look dem, make yu bring dem
kom down kon skata where wiked pipol stand put.
Beri all of dem for groun
kon tie dem for where dead body dey.
Den na mi go first praiz yu
kon gri sey yu don win di fight by yorsef.
Si Behemot; I make am di way I make yu,
e dey chop grass like melu,
but si as en strent bi like lion own
and e pawa dey en body.
En tail stand like tall tree
and di pawa wey dey e leg, strong well-well.
En bones strong like bronze
and en leg bi like iron bar.
E dey among di tins wey God kreate wey dey sopraiz pipol!
Na only God wey kreate am go fit distroy am.
Grass wey dem go chop,
dey grow for di hill wey bush animals dey for play.
E dey sleep for under tree wey valley wota dey pass
and e go hide among di reeds for di bush.
Inside bush dey gi-am betta place to rest.
Di tall tree dey gi-am shade.
E nor dey fear wota wey dey rush pass like river;
en body go kold wen Jordan River flow pass en face.
Who fit blind en eyes kom katch am?
Na who fit use trap katch am thru en nose and mout?
“Yu fit use fish hook take katch Leviatan
or use rope take tie en tongue?
Yu fit put rope pass en nose
or hook en jaw?
E go beg yu make yu let am go?
Or make e beg yu make yu sorry for am?
E go gri make agriment with yu
kon promise sey e go serve yu forever?
Yu go fit tie am like bird wey dem dey train for house;
or like sometin wey go sweet yor wimen savant to play with?
Pipol wey dey katch fish go gri follow am enter agriment?
Pipol wey dey sell pesin go gri sell am?
Yu go fit tosh en skin with spear wey dem take dey katch fish
or katch en head with hook?
Make yu try go tosh am, den yu nor go ever try am again;
bikos yu nor go ever forget di fight!
Anybody wey si Leviatan go fear
fall for groun.
Wen dem don make am vex, e go shaut
and nobody go try go stand for en front.
Who don give mi anytin kon sey make I pay back?
Evritin wey dey under heaven na my own?
Make I tell yu about Leviatan leg
kon tell yu how e dey big and strong well-well.
Nobody fit tear en klot wey dey outside
or shuk di armour wey e wear.
Who fit open en mout or bring en tit wey dey make pesin fear,
kom out?
Na many shield dem take make en back
kon tie dem togeda and dem strong like stone.
Dem join dem strong well-well
and space nor dey wey breeze fit pass enter en body.
En body strong well-well and nor-tin fit tear am En body join togeda and nor-tin fit separate dem.
Wen e sneeze, lite go flash kom out
and na so en eye dey shine like sun for aftanoon.
Fire and tonda lite dey
kom out from en mout.
Like grass wey dey burn under pot, na so too smoke dey
kom out from en nose.
Fire dey kom out from en mout and even wen e breath,
e dey bring fire.
En neck get strong pawa wey fit
make evribody wey near am, fear.
E nor get any weak part for en skin;
e dey strong well-well
and e bi like iron wey dem nor fit bend.
En heart bi like stone wey nor dey fear anytin;
e dey strong well-well like grindin stone.
Wen e stand, even pipol wey strong well-well,
dey fear and di fear dey make dem shake anyhow.
No swod fit wound am;
no spear or arrow fit enter en body.
Iron just bi like straw for en eye
and bronze dey soft like wood wey don rotin.
E nor get di arrow wey won make am run,
even wen dem stone am with rock,
e bi like straw for en body.
Spear bi like straw to am
and e dey laf wen men dey trow arrow kom meet am.
Di skale wey dey en belle bi like pot wey don break;
as e dey waka, e dey leave mark for di mud like
sey e won separate di groun.
E dey shake di sea like wota wey dey boil
kon make am dey dance like oil for pot.
E dey leave shine-shine part for en back
kon make di sea get white foam.
E nor get anytin for eart wey yu fit take kompare am
and I kreate am without fear.
Even di animal wey dey karry body up,
e dey look dem like nor-tin;
bikos naim bi king among all animals.”
Den Job ansa God:
“I know sey na Yu get pawa pass!
Yu fit do anytin wey Yu won do and nobody fit stop!
Yu ask mi sey why I dey kweshon yor wisdom
wen I nor know anytin at-all!
I dey tok tins wey I nor undastand
and mirakles wey too great for mi to know.
Yu sey make I listin as Yu dey tok
and make I try to ansa yor kweshons.
Before, I know only wetin pipol tell mi,
but naw, I don si Yu with my own eye.
So I dey shame, bikos of all wetin I don tok and I go pak dust for my head to take show sey I dey sorry for all wetin I tok.”
Afta God don tok finish with Job, E kon tell Elifaz sey, “I dey vex with yu and yor two friends, bikos yu nor tok di trut about mi, as my savant Job do.

Naw, make una take seven ram and seven melu go give Job kon offa dem as sakrifice for unasef. Job go pray for una; den I go ansa una prayers and I nor go disgrace una again, bikos una nor tok di trut about mi just as Job tok.”
So, Elifaz, Bildad and Zofar kon do wetin God sey make dem do, den God kon ansa dia prayers.
Afta Job don pray for en friends, God kon make am rish for evry side again and E gi-am taims-tu of evritin wey e lost.

Job brodas and sistas plus en friends wey run leave am before kon visit am and dem do party for en house. Dem kom tell am sey, “Wi dey sorry for all di trobol wey God kause for yu.” So all of dem kom give Job money and gold rings.
God bless di remainin days wey Job stay for dis eart pass wen dem born am. Job kom get 14,000 sheep, 6,000 kamel, 2,000 kattle and 1,000 donkey.
Job kon still born seven sons and three dotas.
E koll di first girl Jemimah, di sekond girl Kezaya and di third girl Keren-Happuk.
E nor get any woman for di hold world wey fine rish Job dotas. Dia papa give dem part of wetin e get and e still give di sons too.
Job stay 140 year afta di trobol wey e face, e si en grand and great grand-shidren dem before e die.
So, Job die for betta old age.
Psalms: God Blessing
God go bless di pesin wey nor dey follow wiked pipol advise,
dey waka with sinnas or sidan with aproko pipol!
Instead, e dey always dey happy to obey God kommand
and na both for day and nite,
e dey study dem.
E bi like tree wey dem plant near wota;
wey dey bear fruit for di korrect time and en leaf nor dey dry.
E dey prosper for anytin wey e do.
But nor bi so e bi for wiked pipol!
Instead, dem bi like leaf wey breeze blow trowey.
Bikos of dis, wiked pipol nor go fit stand for Judgement Day
and sinnas nor go fit dey for where God pipol gada put.
True-true, God dey guide en pipol for evritin wey dem dey do,
but E go distroy doz wey nor dey follow en ways.
God Na King
Wetin make pipol wey dey dis world dey vex? Wetin make dem dey make plans wey go fail?
Di kings for di world gada with rulers kon dey plan against God and di king wey E choose.
Dem dey sey, “Make wi break di shains wey dem take shain us! Make wi free awasef from dia trap!”
But di King wey dey heaven dey laf dem anyhow.
Yes! God dey laf dem well-well.
So God kon vex tok to dem and dem bigin fear wen E sey,
“I don choose my king for Zion wey bi my holy hill.”
Den di king sey, “I go tell una wetin God kommand.
God tell mi sey: ‘Yu bi my pikin! Today, I don bi yor papa!
Make yu ask mi, and di pipol wey dey dis world, I go give dem to yu as yor propaty and evriwhere for di world, go bi yor own too.
Na iron rod yu go take break dem kon skata dem like pot wey dem mold with san!’ ”
So naw, una wey bi king, make una do wetin dey rite; una wey dey rule di world, make una dey take korreshon!
Make fear dey una heart as una dey serve God! Make una turn from sin kon meet God as una dey fear am!
Make una dey respet God well-well or E go fit vex kon distroy una at wons, bikos of di way una dey bihave.
But na blessing dey follow doz wey si am as dia Oga God!
Prayer For Help For Morning
David Song
My God, make Yu si as my enemies many rish!
Many of dem dey kom attack mi.
Many of dem dey sey,
“God nor go save am.”
But Yu, my God, na Yu bi di wall wey dey protet mi;
na Yu bi my glory and di pesin wey make mi dey alive.
Wen I kry to God for help,
E ansa mi from en holy hill.
I dey rest, sleep and wake-up well,
bikos God dey protet mi.
I nor dey fear,
even doh doz wey dey attack mi from evry korna,
plenty well-well.
My God, make Yu get up!
My God, make Yu save mi!
Yes, Yu go slap all my enemies for dia face kon break dia tit!
Viktory dey kom from God.
So, I dey beg Yu, God sey, make Yu bless yor pipol.
Prayer For Help For Evening
For Di Kwayamasta: David Song
My God, make Yu ansa mi wen I koll Yu.
Na only Yu go fit diliver and free mi
from wiked pipol and all my trobol.
Make Yu sorry for mi kon hear my prayers.
Na how long pipol go take dey tok bad about mi?
How long una go dey tok wetin I nor do?
How long una go kontinue to dey lie for my head?
Make una know sey,
God dey keep doz wey dey fear am for ensef
and E go ansa wen wi koll am.
So make yu fear God and nor sin.
Make yu tink about am for nite kon turn from yor sins.
Make yu offa sakrifice with di rite spirit give God
kon trust am.
Many pipol dey sey,
“Who go fit show us wetin dey good?”
So my God, make Yu smile for us.
Yu don give mi more joy pass doz wey get many food
and wine to drink.
I dey sleep with peace,
bikos na only Yu wey bi my God,
dey save mi.
Prayer For Proteshon
For Di Kwayamasta: Di Song
My Oga God, make Yu listin as I dey pray to Yu!
Make Yu listin to my komplain.
My King and my God,
make Yu listin to my kry for help,
bikos na only Yu I dey pray to.
Make Yu listin to my vois for morning, bikos evry morning,
I dey kom meet Yu and dey wait with patient make Yu ansa mi.
My God, Yu nor dey like bad tins;
Yu nor fit bear wiked pipol sins.
So, proud pipol nor go fit stand for yor present,
bikos Yu hate anybody wey dey do bad tin.
Yu go distroy doz wey dey lie well-well.
God nor like doz wey dey kill and deceive pipol.
Bikos of yor love wey nor dey die,
I go enter yor house
kon bow woship Yu for yor holy temple.
My God, make Yu save mi as Yu dey lead mi,
bikos my enemies dey korna dey wait to katch mi.
Make Yu remove all di problem wey dey di road
wey Yu dey take mi pass,
bikos my enemies nor dey tok di trut.
Wetin dey hongry dem to do, na to distroy odas;
dia troat bi like open grave
and na so-so lie-lie words full dia mout.
My God, make Yu disgrace dem.
Make dia own trap katch dem.
Make Yu drive dem,
bikos of dia sins and bikos dem don turn against Yu.
But make doz wey Yu dey guide, always dey happy!
Make dem always dey shaut for joy!
Guide dem, so dat doz wey loyal to Yu, go happy!
My God, true-true, Yu dey reward doz wey dey fear Yu.
Yu dey always protet dem well-well,
bikos of yor favor wey nor dey end.
Prayer For Help
David Song
My God, make Yu nor drive mi, bikos Yu dey vex.
Nor ponish mi with yor vexnashon.
Make Yu sorry for mi, bikos I dey weak.
Make Yu heal mi, bikos my bones dey shake.
I dey fear well-well.
Na how e go tey rish, before Yu go kon save mi?
Make Yu kom back kon help mi.
Save mi bikos of yor love wey nor dey fail.
Pesin wey don die, nor dey remember Yu.
Na who go fit praiz Yu from inside grave?
I don taya to komplain,
bikos evry nite,
I dey wet my bed with wota from my eyes.
Sofa don make my eyes blind.
My eyes dey weak, bikos of my enemies.
All of una wey dey do bad tins,
make una leave mi alone,
bikos God don hear my kry.
God don hear as I dey beg;
E go ansa my prayers.
So make disgrace follow all my enemies
and make dem dey fear well-well!
Make dem run turn back,
go hide with shame.
God Dey Judge Well
David Song About Benjamin And Kush Pipol
My Oga God, I don kom meet Yu make Yu protet mi.
So make Yu save mi from doz wey won kill mi!
If Yu nor save mi, dem go chop mi like sey dem bi lion
and nobody go fit save mi.
My Oga God, if I don do any wrong tin
or dey guilty as dem tok;
if I sin against my friend
or ponish my enemies wen dem nor do anytin against mi,
den make my enemies porshu and katch mi.
Make dem mash mi die kon trowey my body for groun.
My God, make Yu vex raiz-up for mi, den kon fight my enemies!
Abeg, raiz-up make Yu kom fight for mi!
Pipol for di world gada round Yu,
so make Yu rule dem from yor throne.
Bikos na Yu dey judge evribody,
make Yu show sey I dey good,
bikos true-true,
I dey innocent and na Yu bi di Most High God!
Make Yu stop di bad tins wey wiked pipol dey do kon defend doz wey dey good,
bikos my God wey dey good, know wetin dey pipol mind and heart.
Na God bi my guide!
E dey save doz wey get klean and true heart.
God dey judge well.
E dey vex for wiked pipol evriday.
If pesin nor gri turn from sin kom meet God,
God go sharp en swod kon ready to shot en bow.
E go ready en swod wey dey kill
kon shot en arrow wey dey hot like fire.
Pesin wey karry wikedness
and bad plans for belle,
dey born lie-lie.
E dey dig deep pit for odas,
but na en ensef dey fall enter
and di trobol wey e plan for odas,
dey fall for en own head.
Na en own wahala dey
kause trobol for am.
So, I go tank God, bikos E dey judge well;
I go sing and praiz di Most High God.
God Glory And Man Honor
David Song
Oga awa God, yor greatness full di whole world!
Yor glory high pass di heavens.
Yu don tish shidren and small pikin,
so dat dem go fit tok about yor pawa
and how Yu take silent yor enemies and doz wey dey oppoz Yu.
Wen I look di sky for nite kon si di work wey Yu do;
di moon and di stars wey Yu keep for dia place,
I dey ask mysef,
“Wetin pipol bi wey Yu dey tink about dem?
Na ordinary human being Yu dey kare about?”
Yu make dem bi like Yu
kon give dem glory and honor.
Yu sey make dem kare for evritin wey Yu kreate,
bikos Yu put evritin under dia kontrol;
all di animals,
both wiked and di ones wey nor wiked,
di birds for di sky, di fish for sea
and evritin wey dey swim for wota.
Oga awa God,
yor greatness full di whole world.
God Korrect Judgement
For Di Kwayamasta: David Song
My God, I go tank Yu with all my heart;
I go tok about all di wonderful tins wey Yu don do.
I go sing with joy bikos of Yu.
Di Most High God,
I go sing praiz yor name,
bikos as my enemies si Yu,
dem stagga fall kon die.
Naw, yor judgement don favor mi
and Yu don judge well from yor throne.
Yu make di nashons dey fear kon distroy wiked pipol,
den Yu remove dia name from yor book forever.
My enemies don die finish forever;
di towns wey Yu rut komot from groun,
dem nor go ever remember dem again.
But God go reign forever
and E go dey judge from en throne.
E go judge di world well
kon rule di pipol with betta mind.
Na God dey guide doz wey dem dey opress;
na-im dey save dem wen trobol kom.
Doz wey dey loyal to Yu,
dey trust Yu,
bikos Yu nor dey leave doz wey wont make Yu help dem.
E good make wi sing praiz to God wey dey rule from Jerusalem.
Make wi tell di world all di tins wey E do,
wey dem nor fit forget.
Bikos di Pesin wey dey ponish doz wey kill pipol,
still dey kare for doz wey nor get helpa.
E nor dey leave pipol wey dey sofa.
My Oga God, make Yu sorry for mi.
Si as my enemies dey trobol mi,
so make Yu kom take mi komot from deat mout.
Save mi so dat I go fit praiz Yu for publik for Jerusalem gate.
Yes! I go dey happy bikos Yu don save mi.
Wiked pipol don fall enter di pit wey dem dig for odas.
Di trap wey dem set, don katch dia own leg.
Dem don know God naw,
bikos E dey judge well and naw,
wiked pipol dey fall enter dia own trap.
Wiked pipol go die enter grave.
Dis na wetin go happen to all di pipol wey rijet God.
But God nor go forget doz wey dey kry for help.
E nor go live dem forever;
E go always dey give poor pipol hope.
My Oga God, make Yu raiz-up!
Nor let wiked pipol win!
Make Yu kom judge di nashons.
Make dem fall with fear.
Make Yu let pipol know sey,
na ordinary human being dem bi.
Betta Judgement
My God, wetin make Yu stand far from mi?
Wetin make Yu dey hide wen I dey trobol?
Wiked pipol dey porshu and ponish poor pipol.
So make di evil trap wey dem set for oda pipol, katch dem.
Bikos dem dey make mout about di evil tins wey dem dey do.
Yes! Dem dey praiz pipol wey get long-trot and dey curse God.
Wiked pipol too sturbon and dem dey always tink sey,
“God nor go do mi anytin, bikos E nor kare.”
Dem dey prosper for evritin wey dem dey do.
Dem nor dey si yor ponishment wey dey wait dem.
Dem dey laf doz wey bi dia enemies.
Dem dey tell demsef sey, “No bad tin go ever happen to us!
Wi go dey free from trobol forever!”
Na curse, lie and to treaten pipol, full dia mout.
Na trobol and evil dey dia tongue.
Dem dey hide wait for di village gate;
where nobody go for si dem kon kill innocent pipol
and dem dey always fine and wound pipol wey nor get help.
Like lion wey hide for korna,
na so dem dey wait to kill innocent pipol.
Dem dey katch and drag innocent pipol for dia net
like hunta wey katch animal.
Dem dey kill pipol wey nor get pesin wey go help dem;
doz wey nor get pawa rish dem.
Wiked pipol dey sey, “God nor dey si us!
E don klose en eye and E nor go even fit si wetin wi dey do!”
So my God, make Yu raiz-up kon ponish wiked pipol!
Make Yu nor leave doz wey nor get who go help dem!
Why wiked pipol dey go free sef, even wen dem nor respet God?
Dem dey sey, “God nor go ever ask us sey wetin wi do.”
But Yu dey si di trobol and wahala wey dem dey kause.
Yu dey si evritin; so make Yu ponish dem.
Doz wey nor get help dey trust Yu
and na Yu dey fight for shidren wey nor get papa and mama.
Make Yu break wiked and evil pipol hand!
Make Yu ponish dem for dia wiked plans
wey dem tink sey Yu nor know about.
Na God bi king forever and ever!
Di pipol wey nor dey fear God, go vanish komot from dis world.
Oga God, na Yu bi di hope wey poor pipol get.
True-true, Yu go hear dia kry kon konfort dem.
Yu go judge well for shidren wey nor get papa and mama and doz wey dem dey opress,
so dat wiked pipol nor go ever treaten dem again.
Hope For God
David Song
I bilive and trust sey God go protet mi.
So wetin make yu dey sey,
“Fly like bird go hide for mountin,
so dat yu go dey save,
bikos wiked pipol dey wound innocent pipol anyhow.
Dem hide for darkness
dey shot good pipol with dia bow and arrow.
So, naw wey di foundashon don skata,
wetin good pipol go fit do?”
But God dey for en holy temple;
E dey rule from heaven.
E dey look as evribody dey live dia life for dis eart.
God dey si both good and bad pipol.
E hate doz wey love wahala.
E go burn wiked pipol with shako, sulfur and fire
kon distroy dem with strong breeze.
God dey good and E dey judge well;
so E go favor doz wey dey do good too.
Prayer for Help
David Song
My God, make Yu diliver mi!
Bikos all doz wey dey fear and respet Yu,
wiked pipol don kill dem finish.
Pipol dey lie give each oda;
dem just dey deceive demsef.
Make God kut di tongue wey dey tok anyhow
kon distroy di mout wey dey boast!
Dem dey sey, “Na di way wi dey tok,
dey make us prosper;
na wi get awa own lip:
who bi awa oga or who go fit stop us?”
So God ansa, “Bikos of di wiked tins wey dem don do
to pipol wey nor get help
and di pains wey poor pipol dey face,
I go do sometin; I go fight for dem,
bikos na so dem wont make I do since.”
God promise dey pure well-well
like silva wey dem melt for fire.
So Oga God, wi know sey Yu go protet doz wey dem dey opress.
Yu go guide dem forever from doz pipol wey sabi lie well-well,
even from doz evil pipol wey dey evriwhere,
bikos wikedness don kover di whole land.
Prayer For Help
For Di Kwayamasta: David Song
My God, Yu go forget mi forever?
Na how long Yu go trowey yor face from mi?
How long I go dey struggol with pain inside my soul and get sorrow for my heart?
Na how long my enemies go always dey opress mi?
My Oga God, make Yu turn kon ansa mi!
Make yu give mi strent again or I go die.
Make Yu nor let my enemies dey make mout sey,
“Wi don win am!”

But I trust yor love wey nor dey fail.
I go happy, bikos Yu don save mi.
Yes! I go sing to God,
bikos E don save mi.
As Man Wiked Rish
For Di Kwayamasta: David Song

No one among dem dey do wetin good!
God dey look evribody from heaven;

Nobody dey do good again.
Yes! E nor get anybody at-all.
Doz wey dey do bad nor go ever learn?
Dem dey chop my pipol like bread and dem nor dey pray to God.
So fear go katch dem,
bikos God dey with di pipol wey dey obey am.
Even doh wiked pipol dey fight poor pipol,
God go guide and protet dem.

So wen God don save en pipol, Jakob shidren go shaut with joy
and Israel pipol go happy well-well.
Wetin God Wont
David Song
My God, na who go fit woship for yor temple?

Na doz wey dey live good life and do wetin dey rite;
pipol wey dey tok trut with pure heart.
Doz wey nor dey judge odas,
wound dia neighbours or tok bad about dia friends.
Doz wey hate pipol wey dey sin and honor doz wey dey fear and follow God!
Pipol wey dey do wetin dem promise even wen e dey pain dem.

Di pipol wey dey do dis kind tins, go stand gidigba forever.
Prayer To Get Strong Mind
David Prayer
My God, make Yu protet mi,
bikos I don run kom meet Yu for help.
I tell my Oga God,

Na doz wey dey fear God for dis land, I dey respet pass!
I dey happy to si and listin to dem.
Pipol wey dey run follow oda gods,
dia trobol dey plenty evriday.

My God, na Yu dey make mi strong and prosper;

even for nite, my heart dey happy to praiz am.
I don make God nomba one for evritin wey I dey do
and bikos E dey for my rite side,

bikos I dey rest well and fear nor dey my life.

and I dey happy to stay with Yu forever.
Innocent Man Prayer
David Prayer
My Oga God, make Yu hear my kry for help, den judge my kase.

bikos Yu dey si doz wey dey rite.

nor let mi follow wiked and bad pipol.

from wiked enemies wey gada round mi,

dey wait to trow mi for groun.
Dem bi like lion wey dey hongry and dem nor fit wait to tear mi to pieces.

My Oga God, make Yu raiz-up!
Make Yu stand against dem kon nak dem fall!
Make Yu use yor swod take save mi from wiked pipol!
My God, with di pawa wey dey yor hand,
make Yu distroy pipol wey dey espect dia reward from dis world.

kon die leave propaty for dia shidren-shidren.
Bikos I dey raitious, I go si Yu.
Wen I don leave dis world kom meet Yu,

David Viktory Song
David Song Wen God Save Am From Saul
My God, I love Yu well-well
and na Yu bi my strent.

I koll God wey get all di praiz
and E save mi from my enemies.

and trobol won kill mi;
na so-so grave I dey dream about and na to die,

and E hear mi from en temple,

dem dey shake bikos God dey vex.

fire dey pour kom out from dia mout with hot shako.
So, God open di heavens
kon kom down and dark kloud dey under en leg.
E sidan on-top angel feada kon fly go;

di sea bottom open and di eart foundashon kon dey show.

den E drag mi kom out from deep wota.

from doz wey hate and too strong for mi.

but God support and help mi.

and I neva ever rijet en laws.

Yu dey give dem respet.

but to wiked pipol, Yu nor dey sorry for dem at-all.

but dey disgrace proud pipol.

With my God wey dey my side, I fit jump pass any wall.

E dey guide evribody wey kom make E protet am.

God make mi strong with en strent
and E make my way strait.

kon make mi fit stand on-top high mountins.

kon bend even di bow wey strong pass.
My God, Yu don give mi wetin go protet mi.
Yor rite hand dey support mi and I don dey strong,
bikos of di way wey Yu dey help mi.
Yu don make betta road for mi,
so dat I nor go draw fall.
I porshu my enemies kon katch dem
and I nor stop until I distroy dem finish.
I kill all of dem finish
and all of dem fall under my leg.
Yu don give mi strent to fight war;
Yu don put my enemies under my leg.
Yu put my leg for dia neck
and I don distroy evribody wey hate mi.

I grind dem till dem turn to dust
kon swip dem enter gutta like dirty.
Yu make mi win doz wey dey akuiz mi.
Yu make mi rule oda nashons
and pipol wey I nor even know, dey serve mi.

Dem nor get strent again
and dem even dey fear for dia house.
God dey alive!
So, make praiz bi my Rock own
and I go bless my God wey save mi!
Na en bi di God wey dey ponish doz wey wound mi.
E put di nashons under mi
kon save mi from my enemies.
E keep mi for where my enemies nor go for fit tosh mi
kon save mi from wiked pipol.
