and for nite, I nor dey fit sleep,
bikos I dey tink about how Yu
help and save mi.
I dey sing for joy,
bikos I dey under yor shadow.
I hold Yu tait,
bikos na yor strong rite hand dey save mi.
But distroshon go follow doz wey dey plan to distroy mi.
Dem go die go where dead body dey.
Na swod go kill dem, den birds
and oda animals go chop dia body.
But di king go happy bikos of God love.
Evribody wey trust God go dey boast,
bikos pipol wey dey lie, go shut up forever.
Prayer For Proteshon
David Song For Di Kwayamasta
My God, make Yu listin to mi as I dey komplain!
Make Yu protet my life from all di wiked attack
wey di enemies dey plan.
Make Yu hide mi from wiked men plan;
di pipol wey dey do evil and bad tins.
Dem don sharp dia tongue like swod
kon ready to shot dia betta words wey bi like arrows.
From where wiked pipol hide put, dem dey shot innocent pipol
kon kwik-kwik attack dem and dis wiked pipol, nor dey fear.
Dem dey enkourage each oda to do wiked tins
and dey plan how to set trap for sekret
kon dey make mout sey,
“Nobody go ever know or si us!”
As dem dey plan dia evil, dem go sey,
“Na betta plan wi dey plan so o-o!”
True-true, nobody fit si wetin
dey inside human being heart or mind.
But God go shot dem;
na wons en arrows go wound dem and dem go fall.
Na dia own bad word go kill dem.
And anybody wey si dem, go shake en head kon sorry for dem.
Den evribody go dey fear
and dem go tok about di mighty and wonderful tins wey God don do.
Pipol wey dey fear God go happy,
bikos of God and dem go dey save inside am.
So make evribody wey dey do wetin dey rite,
praiz God.
Praiz And Tanks
David Song For Di Kwayamasta
My God wey dey Zion, na betta praiz dey wait Yu,
bikos yor pipol dey do wetin dem promise.
Bikos Yu hear and ansa awa prayers;
so evribody go kom meet Yu.
Awa sins too many, so Yu don forget us,
bikos wi nor dey hear word.
But blessing go follow di pesin
wey Yu choose to stay yor palis.
Make di good tins wey dey yor house,
yor holy place, beleful us.
Yu really ansa awa prayers
wen Yu show us how Yu take dey save and diliver us.
Di whole eart trust Yu;
plus pipol wey dey di oda side for di sea.
Yu kreate di mountins with yor strent
kon show as yor pawa strong rish.
Yu make di rof sea kwayet
kon silent di nashons wey dey kause trobol.
Even pipol wey dey far from awa land,
dey sopraiz for yor greatness
and Yu make doz wey dey stay for east and west, praiz Yu.
Yu visit di eart kon make rain fall put,
so dat e go dey good kon produce plenty food.
Yu make wota full di sea and di land dey bring betta food,
bikos Yu don kommand sey na so e go bi.
Yu dey wet di dry groun with rain,
so dat di soil go soft and seeds go grow well.
Yu crown di year with yor good blessing and even where hard pass,
still dey produce plenty food.
Di grass for wildaness dey fresh
and di hill dey shine with joy.
Na animals full di fields and na betta food full di valley.
Evritin dey sing and shaut for joy!
Praiz And Tanksgivin Song
Dis Song Na For Di Kwayamasta
Make di whole eart shaut with joy
as dem dey praiz God!
Make una sing about di glory wey en name dey bring!
Make una tell di world how en glory big rish.
Make una tell God, “Si as di tins wey Yu do dey great.
Yu skata yor enemies with yor strong pawa!
Evritin for eart go woship Yu;
dem go sing yor praiz kon dey shaut for glory
as dem dey koll yor name.”
Make una kom si wetin God don do;
di wonderful mirakles wey E do among en pipol!
E turn di Red Sea to dry land
and en pipol kon dey happy
as dem dey waka pass di dry groun.
Na en great pawa E take dey rule forever.
E dey si evritin wey di nashons dey do;
so make wiked pipol nor dey karry body.
Make di whole world bless awa God!
Make dem shaut tell evribody about en praiz.
Awa life dey en hand
and E nor let us fall.
My God, Yu don test
and make us klean like silva.
Before-before, Yu katch us for yor net
kon make us sofa well-well.
Yu allow men rule us;
wi dey pass thru fire and wota, but naw,
Yu don bring us kom where dey save.
I go enter yor temple with sakrifice;
I go do di tins wey I promise Yu;
di vow wey I tok with my mout
and my lip wen I dey trobol.
I go give Yu fat animals
as burnt ofrin,
plus di smell from ram wey dem sakrifice.
I go give Yu melu and goats.
Kom! All of una wey dey loyal to God,
make una listin as I dey tok wetin E do for mi!
I kry to am make E help mi
kon praiz am with my tongue.
If I gada sin for my heart,
God nor go ansa or listin to mi.
But God dey hear
and listin to my prayers.
Na God get all di praiz, bikos E nor rijet my prayers
and E still dey show mi en love wey nor dey fail!
Tanksgivin Song
David Song For Di Kwayamasta
Make God show us en favor and bless us!
Make E always dey happy with us!
Den pipol wey dey for di world go know wetin Yu like;
all di nashons go know how Yu take diliver yor pipol.
My God, make evribody for dis world tank Yu!
Make all di nashon give Yu praiz!
Make strenjas happy well-well, bikos Yu dey judge pipol matter well
and na Yu dey rule di world.
My God, make evribody for dis world tank Yu!
Make all di nashon give Yu praiz!
All di seed wey dem plant dey grow well for di eart,
so make di Oga awa God, bless us!
Make E bless us,
den evritin for di eart go gi-am di honor wey bi en own.
Viktory Song
For Di Kwayamasta: David Song
Make God raiz-up!
Make all en enemies skata!
Make all di pipol wey hate am, run as dem si am.
As breeze dey blow smoke,
na so too Yu go drive dem go and as butter dey melt near fire,
na so too wiked pipol go die before God.
But pipol wey dey fear God go dey happy;
dem dey happy for God present and dia joy nor dey end.
So, make una sing to God!
Make una sing praiz en name!
Make una praiz di Pesin wey dey ride on-top kloud!
Na God bi en name!
Make una happy for en present!
Na en bi papa to di pipol wey nor get papa
and na en bi husband to wimen wey dia husband don die.
God dey rule from en holy place.
God dey find place put pipol wey don run komot from dia house bikos of war,
E dey free prisonas kon make dem prosper.
But pipol wey dey sin,
dey stay for desert forever.
So, my God, wen Yu lead yor pipol go war;
wen Yu mash pass di desert,
di eart dey shake.
Yes! Rain dey fall from heaven before di Oga wey bi Sinai God;
di Oga wey bi Israel pipol God.
My God, na Yu make rain dey fall for yor pipol land.
Wen yor pipol don taya, na Yu dey give dem pawa,
bikos Yu dey stay with dem.
My God, na yor blessing save doz wey dem dey opress.
God tok di word;
many wimen spread di good news sey:
“Kings and dia sojas dey run!”
So Israel wimen kon divide dia propaty.
Even pipol wey dey stay for animal house,
dey si doves wey get feadas
wey dem make with silva and gold wey dey shine.
Wen God wey get pawa skata kings,
dem dey melt like snow for Mount Zalmon!
Mount Bashan high well-well;
Bashan mountin get many top.
Yu mountin wey get many top, why yu dey jealous di mountin wey God won stay?
True-true, God go stay der forever.
Wen Oga God appear to en pipol for Mount Sinai,
E kom with angels and shariot wey nobody fit kount.
God klimb go where high well-well.
E don katch and put many pipol for prison.
Even men wey sin well-well dey praiz Yu.
True-true, di Oga awa God dey stay for der!
Na Oga God get all di praiz, bikos na evriday E dey karry awa wahala.
Na-im bi di God wey diliver us.
Awa Oga na God wey dey diliver;
di God wey get pawa and wey fit save us from deat.
True-true, God dey nak en enemies head;
E dey nak doz wey dey always do wiked tins.
God sey, “I go koll dem back from Bashan,
I go bring dem kom back from under di sea,
so dat una go waka on-top dia blood
and una dogs go chop una enemies dead body.”
My God, dem dey si as Yu take dey waka;
true-true, my King wey dey mash kom with glory,
pipol dey si as E dey kom.
Pipol wey dey sing, dey waka for en front;
while di odas dey play dia instrument dey follow for back
and yong girls dey play dia sheke-sheke.
So, God pipol wey gada togeda,
make una praiz di Oga una God!
Benjamin tribe wey small pass, na dem dey front,
den Judah leaders with dia group
and di leaders for Zebulun and Naftali tribe, follow for back.
But God don kommand sey una go get pawa well-well.
So, my God wey help us wen wi nor even know, make Yu show yor pawa
as Yu kom out from yor temple for Jerusalem,
bikos kings dey kom give Yu respet for der.
Make Yu ponish dat wiked animal wey dey wota
and di nashons wey dey follow am,
until dem go honbol demsef kon offa gold and silva give Yu.
Make Yu skata doz pipol wey like war.
Egypt and Ethiopia pipol go dey ready to kom serve God on dia own;
nobody go force dem kom.
So, make all di kingdom for di world
sing praiz God!
Make una sing praiz dis God,
bikos na en bi di Pesin
wey dey di sky from one generashon go rish anoda!
Si! Na-im dey make dat loud tonda nois.
Make una tok about di pawa wey God get;
en mighty pawa wey dey save Israel
and di pawa wey E show from di sky!
God dey pawaful as E dey kom from en temple.
Israel God dey give pawa and strent to en pipol.
So make all praiz bi en own!
Cry For Help
David Song For Di Kwayamasta
My God, make Yu save mi,
bikos di wota don almost kover mi.
I dey sink enter mud;
di place wey di groun soft well-well.
I dey for deep wota and di wota dey karry mi go.
I don taya to dey shaut for help;
sore dey my trot naw and my eye don taya to dey look for my God.
Pipol wey just hate mi wen e bi sey I nor do dem anytin,
many pass di hair wey dey my head.
Doz my enemies wey won distroy mi without any rizin,
too plenty to kount.
Dem dey make mi pay for wetin I nor tif!
My God Yu know all di sins wey I kommit for sekret;
bikos my sins nor fit hide from Yu.
My God and king wey get pawa; nor let shame katch doz wey trust Yu!
Bikos of mi, nor let disgrace follow doz wey dey find Yu.
I don sofa well-well, bikos of Yu.
Na disgrace dem rite full my face
My own brodas dey trit mi like strenja;
dem dey do like sey I kom from anoda kountry.
True-true, di love wey I get for yor house dey shark mi;
so I dey bear di curse wey dem dey curse mi.
I dey kry and I nor gri chop food
and na dis make odas dey curse mi.
I wear sak klot and dem dey laf mi.
Doz wey dey sidan for di town gate dey tok about mi and pipol wey don drink,
dey sing and laf mi with dia song.
So my God, make Yu hear my prayers kon favor mi
and bikos of yor great love, make Yu ansa and diliver mi!
Make Yu save mi from di mud! Nor let mi sink!
Diliver mi from pipol wey hate mi and from di deep wota!
Abeg! Make Yu nor let di wota karry mi go!
Nor let di wota swallow mi!
Make Yu nor let mi die inside di pit!
My God, make Yu ansa mi,
bikos yor love wey nor dey fail,
dey good and bikos of how Yu dey sorry for pipol,
make Yu turn face mi!
Nor leave yor savant, bikos I dey trobol,
but make Yu ansa mi naw-naw!
Make Yu kom near and save mi!
Make Yu save mi from my enemies!
Yu know how dem dey curse, disgrace and do mi anyhow
and Yu dey si evritin wey my enemies dey do.
Dia curse dey pain and e dey make my heart kut;
I dey look for who go tell mi sorry, but I nor si.
I dey find who go konfort mi, but I still nor si anybody.
Dem dey put poizin for my food
kon give mi bad wine make I drink.
So, make dia food tabol bi trap for dem!
Make e bi trap for all doz dia friends!
Make dia eyes blind
and make dem dey shake with fear!
Make Yu pour yor judgement for dia head
and make yor strong vexnashon distroy dem!
Make dia house turn where pipol go dey trow dirty put
and make all dia pipol die finish,
bikos dem don curse di pesin wey bi yor own.
Wen Yu ponish pipol wey bi yor own,
na dis wiked pipol dey karry di matter go evriwhere.
So, make Yu hold dem,
bikos of all dia sins! Make Yu nor sorry for dem at-all!
Make Yu remove dia names from yor book wey get life!
Make Yu nor rite dia names join pipol wey dey fear God!
Dem dey opress and sofa mi! So my God,
make Yu diliver and protet mi!
I go sing and praiz God name!
I go dey praiz am as I dey tank am!
Dat one go sweet God pass ordinary melu
or oda animals wey get horn.
So make pipol wey dem dey opress, happy,
bikos God go enkourage doz wey dey obey am.
God dey listin to doz wey nor get help
and E nor go forget en pipol wey dem dey ponish.
So make di heavens and eart praiz am,
plus di sea and evritin wey dey swim inside am!
Bikos God go diliver Zion kon ribuild Judah town
and en pipol go stay der again kon take-ova Zion.
En savant shidren-shidren go inherit am
and pipol wey dey loyal to am go stay der.
Prayer For Help
David Song For Di Kwayamasta
My God, make Yu kwik kom save mi!
Hurry kom help mi!
Make shame and disgrace follow pipol
wey won kill mi!
Pipol wey dey laf dey sey, “Aha! Aha!”
Make Yu porshu dem go back kon disgrace dem!
All di pipol wey dey find Yu,
make dem dey happy with joy, bikos of Yu!
Pipol wey love to si sey Yu diliver dem, make dem always dey sey,
“Make all di praiz bi God own!”
Dem don opress mi and I nor get anytin! Abeg my God,
make Yu kwik kom save mi,
bikos na Yu bi my helpa and di Pesin wey dey diliver mi!
So make Yu kwik kom!
Old Man Prayer
My God, I don run kom meet Yu make Yu protet mi;
so nor let dem disgrace mi.
Make Yu kom take and save mi, bikos Yu dey do wetin dey rite.
Make Yu listin and diliver mi.
Make Yu bi my Savior and di Rock where I go always hide put.
Give kommand make dem save mi,
bikos Yu bi my rock and di place where I dey hide put.
My God, save mi from wiked pipol pawa
and from doz wey dey opress mi,
bikos na only Yu bi my hope and na from wen I bi small pikin,
I don dey trust Yu kom rish naw.
Yes! Yu don dey with mi since wen dem born mi
and Yu dey kare for mi from my mama belle.
No wonder I dey always praiz Yu!
My life na ezample to many pipol,
bikos na Yu bi my strent and proteshon.
Dat na why I nor fit stop to praiz Yu
and I go dey tok about yor glory evriday.
Naw, for my old age, make Yu nor rijet mi.
Make Yu nor leave mi wen I nor dey strong again.
My enemies dey gossip mi.
Dem dey plan how dem go take kill mi.
Dem dey sey, “God don rijet am.
So make wi go katch am, bikos nobody go help am again.”
So, my God, make Yu nor leave mi,
but make Yu hurry kom save mi.
Make Yu disgrace and distroy pipol wey dey akuiz mi.
Make disgrace and shame follow pipol wey won kill mi.
But for mi, I go always dey wait for yor help
and I go dey praiz Yu more and more.
I go tell evribody about yor raitiousness and evriday,
I go always dey tok about di pawa wey Yu take dey save,
even doh I nor really fit esplain how e bi.
My God wey get pawa,
I go praiz Yu bikos of all di great tins wey Yu don do.
I go tell evribody sey na only Yu dey do good.
My God, na from wen I bi small pikin,
Yu dey tish mi yor ways and I always dey tell pipol
about di wonderful tins wey Yu don do.
Naw wey I don old well-well, make Yu nor leave mi.
Make I tell dis new generashon
and all doz wey dey porshu mi about yor pawa.
My God, yor good judgement dey rish di heavens
and Yu don do many wonderful tins,
so na who bi like Yu?
Even doh Yu don make mi sofa well-well,
I know sey Yu go make mi happy again
kon take mi komot from di pit wey I dey.
I know sey Yu go karry mi put for where dem go for honor mi well,
so make Yu turn kon konfort mi.
Den I go praiz Yu with harp,
bikos Yu dey faithful to yor promise.
My God, I go use jita take sing
praiz Yu wey bi di Holy One for Israel.
I go shaut for joy kon sing with praiz,
bikos Yu don save mi
and till I die, I go always dey tell pipol about yor good works,
bikos evribody wey dey try to kill mi,
Yu don disgrace and make shame katch dem.
Prayer For Di King
David Prayer For Solomon
My God, I beg Yu! Make Yu give di king di sense to dey judge well!
Always allow di king pikin dey tok wetin dey korrect!
Den e go judge yor pipol
and doz wey dem dey opress, well.
Di mountin go karry peace news kom meet yor pipol
and di hills go tok about korrect judgement.
E go defend doz wey dem dey opress among di pipol,
diliver poor pipol shidren and distroy doz wey dey opress pipol.
As long as di sun and moon dey di sky,
pipol go always dey fear Yu from one generashon go rish anoda.
Wen di king dey rule, e go bi like wen rain fall
on-top grass wey dem kut;
e go bi like rain wey dey wota di groun.
All di pipol wey dey fear God go prosper as di king dey rule.
So make goodness follow dem,
as long as di moon dey shine for di sky.
Make di king rule from sea go rish sea
and from Eufrates River go rish di end for di eart.
Desert go bow before am;
en enemies go fall for groun for en front.
Tarshish kings for west
and di oda kings go kon pay respet to am.
Sheba kings for east and Seba go kon gi-am gifts.
All di kings go bow for am
and all di nashons go serve am.
Di King go save poor pipol wen dem kry kom meet am
kon help doz wey dem dey opress
and doz wey nor get who go fight for dem.
E go pity for doz wey dey weak
and poor kon save dem.
Bikos dia life dey important to am,
e go save dem from pipol wey dey opress and kause wahala for dem.
Di king go live forever!
Dem go dey gi-am gold from Sheba
and di pipol go always dey pray and bless am evriday.
Food go many for di land
and seeds go even dey grow well on-top mountins.
Make trees bear betta fruit like di trees for Lebanon
and make pipol for di land dey grow well
like betta grass for di field.
Make di king rule forever;
make en kingdom kontinue as long as di sun dey shine.
Make blessing dey all di nashons bikos of am,
so dat dem go praiz am.
Make una praiz di Oga wey bi Israel pipol God
bikos of di wonderful tins wey E do and na only en fit do dem.
Make una praiz en name wey get glory forever!
Make en glory dey di whole eart.
Amen!
David wey bi Jesse pikin,
na here en prayers for end.
God Justice
Asaf Song
True-true, God dey good to Israel pipol
and to doz wey dia heart dey pure.
But for mi, my heart almost fail mi
and my faith don nearly vanish,
bikos I dey jealous proud pipol wen I si dem dey prosper,
even doh dem wiked.
E bi like sey dem dey enjoy life
and dia body dey fresh and strong.
Dem nor dey face trobol like oda pipol
or si wahala like evry oda pesin.
Dem wear pride like shain for neck
kon wear yanga like belt for waist.
Dia money dey make dem do wiked tins
and na bad-bad tins dem dey always tink about.
Evritin wey dem dey do and tok,
na only about wiked tins and as dem dey proud,
evritin wey dem wont, na to kill oda pipol.
Dem dey boast like sey dem dey stay heaven
and dey bihave like sey na dem get di world,
so even God pipol dey bilive evritin
wey dis wiked pipol dey tok.
Dem dey ask, “How God won take know wetin wi dey do?
Di Most High even know wetin dey happen so o-o?”
Si dis wiked pipol dey enjoy life,
bikos dia money dey plenty.
So I konklude for my heart sey, “I just get klean heart for nor-tin!
I just dey innocent and nor dey do bad tins for no rizin!
Na only trobol I dey always get
and evry morning dey kause pain for mi.”
If to sey I don tok dis tins wey I dey tink,
I for don betray doz wey dey obey Yu.
So, even wen I try to undastand while wiked pipol dey prosper,
e dey konfuse mi di more!
Den I enter inside di temple go ask my God
and E show mi en plans for wiked pipol.
True-true, God put dem for di road wey dem go for fall
kon make di groun for di hill wey go distroy dem, draw dem fall.
Na wons God go take distroy
and trowey dem down with fear.
So my God, wen Yu raiz-up, Yu go laf dia yeye plan;
wey bi like dream wey dey vanish wen day break.
Yes, my heart dey bitter
and I dey feel pain for inside my body.
I bin dey do like fool wey sturbon.
I know sey for yor present,
I bin look like animal wey nor get sense.
Yet, I still bilong to Yu
and Yu hold my rite hand.
Yu dey guide and advise mi
as Yu dey lead mi enter where glory dey.
Na who I get for heaven escept Yu?
I wont Yu more dan anytin for dis eart.
My body fit fail and my spirit fit weak,
but na God dey make my heart strong;
na-im bi my own forever.
So doz wey nor dey fear am go die,
bikos E dey distroy doz wey turn from am.
But for mi, si as e good to dey near God!
I don make di God wey get pawa my guide
and I go tell evribody about di wonderful tins wey E don do.
Prayer To Diliver
Asaf Song
My God, wetin make Yu rijet us forever?
Wetin make Yu dey vex for yor own sheep wey dey yor field?
Make Yu remember sey na wi bi di pipol wey Yu choose since Yu kreate di world;
di tribe wey Yu take as yor own!
Make Yu still remember Jerusalem where Yu dey stay.
Make Yu waka round di town wey dem skata;
den Yu go si as di enemies distroy yor temple.
Na for der yor enemies dey shaut and sing sey, “Dem don win.”
Na der dem for stand dia war flag.
Dem dey use dia axe
like doz wey dey kut wood for bush.
Dem use axe and knife take skata evritin
wey dem karve
kon burn yor temple rish groun.
Yes, dem distroy di place wey dey ansa yor name.
Den dem kon dey boast dey sey,
“Make wi distroy evritin!”
So dem burn evriwhere wey wi for dey woship God.
Naw, wi nor dey si yor mirakles again.
All di profets don die and nobody fit tell us
wen dis wahala go end.
So God, na how long e go take
before Yu go stop awa enemies wey dey curse us?
Yu go let dem take yor name make yeye forever?
Wetin make Yu nor won use yor strong rite hand against dem?
Make Yu kom distroy dem finish.
But Yu God don bi my King since my grand-grand papa dem time
and Yu dey save us for dis world.
Yu divide di sea with yor pawa
kon kill di monsta wey dey der.
Yu skata di wota juju head
kon allow animals for desert chop am.
Just as Yu get pawa to make wota and sea flow,
na so too, Yu fit dry river wey nor suppose dry.
Na Yu get both day and nite;
na Yu still make di moon and di sun.
Yu measure where di eart go rish
kon make both dry and rainin sizin.
My God, si as di enemies dey curse Yu.
Pipol wey nor get sense nor dey respet yor name.
Make Yu nor let dis wiked animal distroy yor pipol.
Yor pipol wey dey sofa, make Yu nor forget dem forever.
Make Yu remember yor kovenant,
bikos na darkness and trobol full di land!
Make Yu nor let dem disgrace pipol wey dey sofa.
Instead, make Yu let poor pipol and doz wey dem dey opress,
praiz yor name.
My God, make Yu raiz-up kon fight for mi.
Make Yu remember as dis fools dey curse Yu evriday.
Make Yu nor forget evritin wey yor enemies tok
or how dem dey shaut anyhow.
Na God Bi Judge
Asaf Song For Di Kwayamasta
My God, wi tank Yu!
Wi dey tank Yu bikos Yu dey near us
and pipol for evriwhere dey tok
about di wonderful tins wey Yu dey do.
God sey, “Wen di time wey I choose don rish,
I go judge pipol.
Di eart go shake and evribody go fear,
bikos na mi make di foundashon.
I don warn proud pipol sey, ‘Make dem stop to dey make mout!’
kon tell wiked pipol sey, ‘Make una nor dey happy sey una don win!
Make una nor tink sey una don win di fight
or karry body up wen una dey tok.’ ”
Viktory nor dey kom from east or west
or from di wildaness,
bikos na God dey judge!
E dey bring one pesin down and karry anoda pesin up.
One cup wey full with wine wey dem mix with spice,
dey for God hand and E pour am for di world.
True-true, all di wiked pipol for di world
go drink from am till e finish.
But for mi, I go always dey tok about wetin Yu don do;
I go sing and praiz Jakob God!
God sey, “I go distroy wiked pipol with dia pawa
kon give viktory to pipol wey dey fear mi.”
Asaf Song For Di Kwayamasta
God don show ensef to Judah pipol.
En name dey great among Israel pipol.
Na Jerusalem E dey stay
and na Mount Zion bi en house.
Na der E for break di enemies wiked arrow, dia guide,
swod and all di tins wey dem take dey fight.
En glory and majesty dey shine as E dey
kom from di mountin where E for kill en enemies.
Awa strong enemies don skata.
Dem don sleep kon die go like dat,
so nobody go fit fight us again.
My Oga wey bi Jakob God, wen Yu breath,
all yor enemies horse and shariot dey fall die.
No wonder dem dey fear Yu well-well!
Na who fit stand for yor front wen Yu dey vex?
Na from heaven Yu dey judge yor enemies;
di eart dey shake and dem dey kwayet for yor present.
My God, Yu dey judge di pipol wey dey do wiked tins
kon save doz wey dem dey opress for dis world.
True-true, di way Yu dey vex judge human being, go make dem praiz Yu.
Yu really dey show as Yu dey vex rish.
So, wen una vow give di Oga una God, make una keep una promise.
Make evribody bring gift kon give di Holy One!
E dey honbol prince and kings for dis eart,
dey fear am.
Help For Trobol Time
Asaf Song For Di kwayamasta
I shaut and kry to my God;
yes I shaut and E hear mi!
Wen I dey trobol, I look for God.
Thru-out di nite, I pray and lift my hand go heaven,
but nor-tin fit konfort my soul.
Wen ever I tink of God,
na kry I always dey kry make E kom help mi.
Yu nor dey let mi sleep
and I too dey weak to pray!
I bin dey tink of di good days before-before,
wen betta song with joy full my nite.
But naw, I dey look my life kon dey tink
and si how e dey difren.
So God don rijet mi forever?
E nor go ever show mi en love again?
En love wey nor dey fail don go forever?
E promise don fail finish?
God don forget to dey sorry for pesin?
E don klose di door to pipol wey dey kom meet am for help?
So I kon sey, “Na mi kause am!
Na mi let God turn en hand against mi”
But my Oga God, I remember evritin wey Yu don do.
I remember all di wonderful tins wey Yu do before.
Dem always dey my mind and I nor fit stop
to dey tink about di mighty tins wey Yu do.
My God, yor ways dey holy.
E get any god wey get pawa like Yu?
Na Yu bi God wey dey do great wonders!
Yu dey show yor great pawa among di nashons.
With yor hand,
Yu save yor pipol wey bi Jakob and Josef shidren-shidren.
My God, wen di Red Sea si Yu,
di wota kon dey fear and di sea shake rish bottom.
Rain fall kom down from di kloud and tonda nois full di sky,
den yor arrow with lite kon dey shine.
Dem hear yor vois like tonda from di strong wind,
di lite make di world dey shine
and di world kon dey shake with fear.
Yu waka on-top di sea go diliver yor pipol kon strol pass di great river,
but nobody fit si yor footstep bikos e nor show at-all.
Den Yu use Moses and Aaron take lead
and guide yor pipol like many sheep.
God And En Pipol
Asaf Song
My pipol, make una listin to wetin I dey tok.
Make una open una ear, so dat una go hear wetin I dey tell una,
bikos na parabol I go take tok to una.
I go tish una about some tins
wey don happen before;
story wey awa grand-grand papa
dem tell us.
Wi nor go hide dis trut from awa shidren;
wi go tell di next generashon about di good-good tins wey God do,
en pawa and di wonderful tins wey dey sopraiz us.
E give law to Jakob shidren kon tell en pipol Israel,
wetin dem go do.
E still kommand awa grand-grand papa
sey make dem tish di laws to dia shidren,
so dat di next generashon go know;
even di shidren wey dem neva born
and dis ones too go tish dia own shidren.
So evry generashon go get hope and trust God
and dem nor go forget en great mirakles,
but dem go obey en kommand.
Dem nor go bi like dia grand-grand papa wey sturbon;
pipol wey nor gri obey, listin or give dia heart to God.
Efraim sojas, even doh dem get bow and arrow,
wen war start, dem go run,
bikos dem nor gri keep God kovenant
or obey en kommandment.
Dem forget wetin E don do,
di great wonders wey E show dem,
di mirakles wey E do for dia grand-grand papa
for Zoan wey dey for Egypt.
For der, E divide di sea
kon take dem pass as di wota stand up like wall!
E dey lead dem with kloud for day
and pila wey get fire for nite.
E tear rock open
kon give dem wota drink for wildaness!
E make wota kom out from di rock
and e kon dey flow like river!
Yet dem still dey sin against am;
dey disobey di Most High for di desert.
Dem dey test God with sturbones for dia heart
kon dey tok di kind food wey dem won chop.
Dem even tok against God ensef wen dem sey,
“God nor fit give us food for di wildaness.
Yes! E fit nak rock make wota kom out,
but E nor fit give en pipol bread and meat.”
Wen God hear dem, E vex well-well.
Di fire from en vexnashon kon dey against en pipol.
Yes! En vexnashon kon strong well-well,
bikos dem nor gri bilive God
or trust sey E go kare for dem.
But E kommand di sky make e open,
den E open di doors for heaven.
E send manna kom down so dat en pipol go si food chop;
E give dem bread from heaven.
Dem chop food wey angels dey chop
and God give dem enough to chop.
God release di east wind for heaven
kon guide di sout wind with en pawa.
E send meat like dust go give dem
kon still give dem birds wey plenty like san-san wey dey wotaside!
E make di birds dey fall
for evriwhere for dia kamp
and for dia house
and di pipol chop beleful.
E give dem wetin dem ask for.
But before dem even beleful,
as di meat still dey dia mout,
God kon dey vex for dem and E kill all dia strong-strong men.
E kill Israel yong men wey fine pass.
But even as all dis tins dey happen, di pipol still dey sin.
With all dis mirakles, dem nor gri trust am.
So E kon make dem die with disgrace
and dia years kon end with shame.
Wen God dey kill dem, dem kon dey beg make E sorry for dem.
Dem turn to God kon take am sirious.
Den dem remember sey na God bi dia rock;
sey na di Most High God save dem.
But dem dey lie give God
kon dey tok anyhow.
Dia heart nor dey loyal to God
and dem nor gri keep en kovenant.
Yet, God sorry for dem kon forgive dem dia sins and E nor distroy all of dem.
So, E nor dey too vex for dem or show en vexnashon,
bikos E remember sey na ordinary human being dem bi.
Dem go just die go like breeze wey nor dey kom back again.
Dem sin against am many times for di wildaness
kon make am vex for dat dry dirty land.
Dem always dey test and shalenge God.
Dem dey make di Holy One for Israel dey vex.
Dem nor remember en pawa
and how E save dem from dia enemies.
Dem nor remember all di mirakles wey E do for Egypt;
di wonders wey E do for Zoan field,
bikos E turn Egypt river to blood,
so dat nobody go fit drink di wota.
E send many fly kon attack dem
and many frog skata dia land.
E allow katapiller chop dia plants
and lokust chop all dia seed.
E distroy dia grape vine with big-big stones
kon skata dia sykamore-fig tree.
E kill and distroy dia animals with big-big stone
and strong tonda.
E show dem en great vexnashon and anga.
E send angels wey dey distroy tins go meet dem.
E turn en vexnashon face dem.
E nor sorry for Egypt pipol life,
but E use strong wahala take distroy dem.
E kill all di first sons for Egypt family;
all di first sons wey Egypt pipol born.
But E lead en own pipol kom out like many sheep
kon guide dem pass di wildaness.
E guide and keep dem as dem dey go;
but di sea kill dia enemies.
E bring dem kom di borda for en holy land;
di hill lands wey E don win for dem.
E porshu di nashons wey dey before dem
kon divide dia propaty give en pipol.
E make Israel pipol relax for dia house.
But Israel pipol still dey test and sin against di Most High God
and dem nor gri obey en laws.
Dem turn back and dem nor kon get faith like dia papa and mama.
Yu nor fit put hope on dem, bikos dem bi like bow wey don spoil.
Dem dey make God vex as dem dey build shrine for oda gods;
dem really make God jealous with dia juju.
Wen God hear dem,
E kon dey vex and E really rijet Israel pipol.
Den E leave en place for Shiloh,
di Tabanako where E bin dey stay with en pipol.
E allow enemies karry en Kovenant Box
kon give dem en glory.
E give en pipol to enemies make dem kill dem with swod,
bikos E dey vex well-well with di pipol wey E love well-well.
Na fire kill dia yong men
and dia yong wimen die even before dem sing dia wedding song.
Dem kill dia priests and wimen wey dia husband don die,
nor fit mourn for dem.
Den God raiz-up like sey E just dey wake from sleep;
like strong soja wey en eye just klear from drink.
E skata en enemies kon disgrace dem forever.
But E rijet Josef shidren-shidren
and E nor gri support Efraim tribe again.
Instead, E choose Judah tribe and Mount Zion wey E love.
E build temple wey high like heaven
kon strong like di eart, den E put am for der.
E choose David en savant,
wen E koll am from where e for dey kare for sheep.
E take David from where e for dey kare for animals
kon make am leader among Jakob shidren-shidren,
wey bi Israel God own.
E kare for dem with betta mind
kon save dem with en strong hand.
Prayer For Di Nashon
Asaf Song
My God, strenjas don take di land wey Yu choose as yor own.
Dem don spoil yor holy temple kon turn Jerusalem
to where dem dey pour dirty put.
Dem don kill yor savants kon leave dia body for groun make bird chop dem.
Doz wey dey fear Yu, dia flesh don turn food for wild animals.
Blood dey flow like wota for evriwhere for Jerusalem
and nobody remain wey go beri doz wey dem kill.
Awa neighbours dey laf us; pipol wey dey around us,
dey take us make yeye.
My God, na how long Yu go dey vex with us?
Na forever? Na how long yor vexnashon go dey burn like fire?
Make Yu pour yor vexnashon for di nashons wey nor dey respet Yu;
di kingdoms wey nor dey koll yor name,
bikos dem don finish yor pipol Israel
kon turn di land to dirty and empty wildaness.
Make Yu nor kount awa grand-grand papa dem sin against us
and bikos Yu dey sorry for pipol,
make Yu kwik-kwik kom ansa us,
bikos e remain small make wi die finish.
My God wey dey save us, make Yu kom help us!
Make Yu forgive us, bikos of di glory wey dey yor name.
Wetin make Yu allow wiked pipol even get mout to ask sey,
“Where dia God dey?” Make Yu revensh dis pipol,
bikos dem don kill yor savants finish.
Make Yu listin to di prisonas kry.
Make Yu show yor great pawa
kon save doz wey pipol sey dem must die.
My God, make Yu pay awa neighbours seven times for di mout
wey dem don take boast for Yu.
Den, wi yor pipol, di sheep for yor field, go tank Yu forever
kon dey praiz yor name from one generashon go rish anoda.
Prayer For Di Nashon
Asaf Song For Di Kwayamasta
Di Shepad for Israel, make Yu listin to us.
Yu wey dey kare for Josef shidren-shidren,
just as shepad dey kare for en sheep.
My God wey high pass di angels,
make Yu show yor glory wey dey shine
to Efraim, Benjamin and Manasseh pipol.
Make Yu show yor mighty pawa,
den kom save us!
My God, make Yu bring us back to yorsef again.
Make yor face shine upon us again
and na only den wi go get rest of mind.
My Oga wey bi God for Heaven Sojas,
na how long Yu go dey vex for awa prayers?
Yu don make us dey chop sorrow like food
kon drink tears wey full bucket.
Yu don give oda pipol rizin to dey laf us and naw,
awa enemies don take us dey do yeye.
My Oga wey bi God for Heaven Sojas,
make Yu bring us back to yorsef again.
Make yor face shine upon us again
and na only den wi go get rest of mind.
Yu take us from Egypt like grape fruit,
den Yu porshu di wiked nashons kon give us dia land.
Yu klear di groun for us and wi stay der
kon many for di land.
Awa shadow dey kover di mountins;
awa branches dey kover di mighty cedars.
Before-before,
wi spread go west for Mediterranean Sea and Eufrates River.
But naw, wetin make Yu break awa walls
so dat evribody wey dey pass go fit tif awa fruit?
Even wild animals from bush
dey kom chop dem too.
Awa God, di Warrior wey nobody dey si,
wi dey beg make Yu kom back.
Make Yu from heaven look
kon si di wahala wey wi dey face.
Make Yu kare for dis grape tree
wey Yu plant by yorsef;
bikos na Yu raiz dis pikin up by yorsef.
Make awa enemies nor chop
and burn us finish.
Make dem die,
bikos Yu nor dey happy with dem.
Make Yu support di ones wey Yu choose;
di ones wey Yu raiz for yorsef!
Den wi nor go turn from Yu.
Make Yu bring us back and wi go pray to Yu!
Awa God, di warrior wey nobody dey si, make Yu give us life again!
Make Yu just smile for us and wi go dey save!
Feast Song
Asaf Song For Di Kwayamasta
Make wi sing praiz God wey bi awa strent.
Make wi sing praiz Jakob God.
Make una sing and play sheke-sheke.
Make una use jita and harp play sweet music.
Make una blow ram horn
wons new moon or full moon festival start!
Bikos dis na wetin dem rite for Israel law
and na wetin Jakob God kommand.
E make dis law for Israel pipol wen E attack Egypt land just to free us.
Den I hear one vois wey I nor know dey sey,
“Si, I don take di load komot from una shoulder;
I don free una from di heavy work wey una dey do.
Una kry to mi for help wen una dey trobol and I save una;
I ansa with strong tonda
kon test una faith wen wota nor dey to drink for Meribah.
My pipol make una listin to mi as I dey warn una!
Israel pipol, make una obey mi!
Una must nor serve anoda god;
una must nor bow before any oda god.
Bikos na mi wey bi una Oga God, save una from Egypt land.
Make una open una mout wide and I go pak good tins full am.
But my pipol nor gri listin.
Israel pipol nor wont make I dey with dem.
So I let dem do di tins wey dey hongry dem to do
kon live dia life di way dem wont am.
How I wish my pipol go gri listin to mi!
How I wish sey Israel pipol go follow mi kon do as I tell dem!
Den I for fit kwik distroy dia enemies!
My hand for kwik tosh doz wey dey worry dem!
Make pipol wey hate God, fear as dem si am;
make disgrace follow dem forever.
But I go give Israel pipol betta food chop;
I go make una beleful with betta honey
wey dey flow kom out from di rock.”
Na God Dey Judge
Asaf Song
God stand for where en pipol gada put
and E from der dey judge di oda gods
sey, “Na how long una go dey judge like dis
kon dey favor wiked pipol?
Poor pipol and doz wey nor get papa, make una judge dia kase well!
Make una free poor pipol and doz wey dem dey opress.
Poor pipol and doz wey nor get help,
make una save dem from wiked pipol!
But doz wey dey opress oda pipol,
nor know anytin at-all.
Dem bi fools! Dem dey waka anyhow for darkness,
while all di foundashon for di eart dey skata.
I bin sey, ‘Una bi gods;
bikos una bi di Most High God shidren.’
But naw, una go die like ordinary human being
kon fall like evry oda leader.”
So my God, make Yu raiz-up kon judge di world,
bikos na Yu get all di nashons.
Prayer To Win Israel Enemies
Asaf Song
My God, make Yu nor kwayet just like dat!
Make Yu nor rijet us!
Nor just do like sey e nor koncern Yu!
Yu nor si di nois wey yor enemies dey make?
Yu nor dey si sey yor sturbon enemies dey make mout anyhow?
Dem dey plan against yor pipol
and dem won wound di ones wey Yu love.
Dem dey sey, “Make una kom make wi kill evribody for Israel finish
and nobody go remember dem again.”
All of dem gada togeda
and dem dey plan against Yu.
Dem wey gada so na:
Edom and Ishmael pipol,
Moab and Hagrit pipol;
Gebal, Ammon and Amalek pipol
with doz from Filistia and Tyre.
Assyria pipol don join dem
too with Lot shidren-shidren.
So, make Yu do dem wetin Yu do Midian pipol and just as Yu do Sisera and Jabin for Kishon River,
na so too Yu go do dem.
Dem die for Endor and dia body
kon make di grass grow well.
Make di mighty ones among dem die like Oreb and Zeeb.
Make all di prince die like Zebah and Zalmunna
wey bin sey,
“Make wi take dis land
wey bi God own!”
My God, make Yu skata dem like leaf
and san-san wey breeze dey blow!
As fire dey burn forest
and smoke dey make mountin burn,
na so too Yu go take porshu dem
with yor strong tonda
kon make dem fear.
My God, make Yu disgrace dem finish
until dem bigin praiz yor name.
Make shame and fear follow dem forever
and make dem die with disgrace.
Den dem go know sey na only Yu bi God,
di Pesin wey get pawa pass for di whole world.
God House
Korah Shidren Song For Di Kwayamasta
My Oga God wey dey rule ova evritin,
make Yu si as di place where Yu dey stay, fine rish!
I really love to dey di kourt wey dey God temple.
My heart and my whole body dey shaut for joy,
bikos of God wey dey alive.
Even birds get house for der and sparo bird still build dia nest
for where dem go fit protet dia shidren near yor altar.
My Oga wey dey rule ova evritin,
my king and my God.
Pipol wey dey stay and always praiz God for en temple,
make una si as dia blessing big rish!
Pipol wey get pawa thru Yu, si as dia blessing big rish too.
Dem like to always go yor temple!
As dem dey pass thru Baka Valley, Yu dey provide wota for dem,
bikos Yu make rain fall full der.
Yu dey provide for dem as dem dey travel go di temple
and each of dem dey kom meet Yu for Zion.
My Oga! Di God wey get pawa!
Make Yu hear my prayers!
Jakob God, make Yu listin to mi!
My God, make Yu favor di king wey dey guide us!
Make Yu favor di one wey Yu anoint.
Only one day for yor house betta pass one tazon years for anoda place!
E betta make I bi gateman for God house
dan to dey enjoy life for wiked pipol house.
Oga God na awa sun and naim dey protet us.
God dey give us grace and glory
and E go always dey good to doz wey dey do good.
My Oga wey bi God for Heaven Sojas,
make Yu si di blessing wey dey follow doz wey trust Yu.
Prayer For Di Nashon
Korah Shidren Song For Di Kwayamasta
My God, Yu don pour blessing and favor put for yor land
and give Israel en glory back.
Yu forgive yor pipol dia sins.
Yes! Yu kover all dia sins.
Yu nor dey vex for dem again
and Yu nor show dem yor vexnashon.
My God wey dey diliver us, make Yu save us again!
Make Yu nor dey vex for us!
Abi Yu go dey vex for us forever?
Yu go just dey vex even for awa shidren-shidren?
Yu nor go revive us again
so dat yor pipol go happy bikos of Yu?
My God, make Yu show us yor loyal love!
Pour yor salvashon for awa head!
I go listin to wetin Oga God tok,
bikos E go make peace with en pipol;
doz wey dey obey am,
so-far dem nor go-go back to dia wiked and yeye ways.
True-true, time dey kom wen pipol wey dey follow am well,
go si en salvashon; den en glory go appear for di land again.
Love wey nor dey fail and trut, don join togeda.
Raitiousness and peace don kiss each oda.
Trut dey kom out from di world and raitiousness dey smile
kom down from heaven.
Yes, God dey pour en blessings kom down,
so awa land go produce betta-betta food again.
Raitiousness dey go for God front
go prepare di way wey E go pass.
Prayer For Help
David Prayer
My God, make Yu hear my prayer;
make Yu ansa and help mi, bikos pipol dey opress mi.
Make Yu protet and save mi,
bikos na only Yu I dey serve and trust and na Yu bi my God.
Make Yu sorry for mi, my Oga God,
bikos I dey always koll yor name.
My God, make Yu make mi happy,
bikos I don give mysef to Yu.
Yu dey good and ready to forgive awa sins
and pipol wey kom meet Yu for help,
Yu dey show dem yor love wey nor dey fail.
So my God, make Yu listin well-well to my prayers;
make Yu kwik-kwik hear mi as I dey kry for help.
I go koll Yu wen ever I dey trobol and Yu go ansa mi.
My God, no oda god bi like Yu.
No one fit do wetin Yu dey do!
Oga God, all di nashons wey Yu make,
go kom bow down for Yu
and dem go praiz yor holy name,
bikos Yu big well-well
and dey do wonderful tins.
Na only Yu bi God,
so make Yu tish mi yor ways, so dat I go live my life as Yu wont am!
Make Yu give mi pure heart, so dat I go always dey honor Yu.
My Oga and God, I go praiz Yu with all my heart,
I go give glory to yor name forever,
bikos di love wey Yu get for mi,
big well-well and Yu don save mi from deat.
My God, wiked pipol dey raiz against mi; sturbon pipol dey won kill mi.
Yu nor mean anytin to dem!
But Yu, my Oga, Yu bi God wey dey sorry and pity for pipol;
Yu nor dey kwik vex and Yu dey show yor faithfulnes
and great love wey nor dey fail.
Make Yu turn face mi kon sorry for mi!
Make Yu give yor pawa to yor savant,
den diliver pipol wey dey obey Yu.
Make Yu show mi sign sey Yu go favor mi.
Den shame go katch di pipol wey hate mi,
bikos Yu wey bi my God,
don help and konfort mi.
Jerusalem Song
Korah Shidren Song
Di town wey God build by ensef,
dey for di holy mountin.
God love Jerusalem
pass any oda town for Israel.
Si as pipol dey tok good tins about yu Jerusalem
wey bi God town!
I go kount Egypt and Babilon
join di towns wey know mi.
I go still kount Filistia and Tyre
plus Ethiopia town join dem.
All of dem dey sey
dem born dem for Jerusalem!
But for Jerusalem real pipol, odas go sey,
“Una dey enjoy o-o, bikos una bi Jerusalem pipol.”
And di Most High God go bless di town by ensef.
Wen God dey kount and rite en pipol name for en book, E go sey,
“Dem born dis ones sef for Jerusalem.”
So di pipol go blow trumpet kon sing sey,
“Na Jerusalem bi di hope wey wi get!”
Cry For help
Korah Shidren Song For Di Kwayamasta
My Oga God wey dey save mi.
For day time, I dey kry give Yu
and I still dey pray to Yu for nite.
Abeg, make Yu hear my prayer;
make Yu listin to mi as I dey kry,
bikos na so-so trobol full my life
and deat don near mi well-well.
I don already bi like pesin wey don die;
like strong man wey nor get pawa again.
I bi like who dey among dead body and I sleep like sey I dey grave.
Yu don forget mi and Yu nor kare for mi again.
Yu don trow mi enter deep pit
kon keep mi for di place wey dark well-well.

and yor waves don kover mi.
Yu don porshu my friends kon fool mi for dia front and naw,
I dey for trap wey I nor go fit run komot.
My own tears don blind my eyes.
My God, evriday I dey beg make Yu kom help mi;
I lift my hand to Yu make Yu sorry for mi.
All di wonderful tins wey Yu dey do
nor mean anytin to pipol wey don die.
Abi dead body go fit raiz-up kon praiz Yu?
Pipol wey dey grave go fit tok about yor love wey nor dey fail?
For where dem dey naw, dem go fit tok about how Yu good rish?
Darkness go fit tok about di wonderful tins wey Yu do?
Dead body go fit tok about di good-good tins wey Yu dey do?
My God, I dey kry give Yu
and I go kontinue to beg Yu evriday by day.
So, my God, wetin make Yu rijet mi?
Wetin make Yu turn yor face from mi?
Na since wen I dey small Yu allow pipol dey opress mi
and I don nearly die.
Yu don ponish mi well-well and naw,
na pains full my life.
Di way Yu dey vex, dey make mi sopraiz.
Yes! Yor vexnashon don distroy mi finish.
Evriday, pipol gada round mi like wota
kon join togeda dey opress mi.
Yu don allow pipol wey I love and doz wey love mi,
dey run from mi.
