“Den di manaja tell ensef, ‘Wetin I go do naw? My oga won sak mi and I nor strong rish to dig and na shame for mi to go beg.
I know wetin I go do, so dat wen my oga sak mi, I go get friends wey go welkom mi for dia house.’
“So e gada all di pipol wey dey hold en oga money. E kon ask di first one, ‘How mush yu dey whole my oga?’
“Di man ansa, ‘One hundred gallon olive oil.’ Di manaja kon sey, ‘Take dis paper, sidan kwik-kwik make yu rite fifty.’
“Den e ask anoda one, ‘How mush yu dey whole?’
“Di sekond man sey, ‘1,000 basket for wheat.’
“Di manaja tell am, ‘Take dis paper, make yu rite eight hundred.’
“Di oga praiz di wayo manaja, bikos of di wayo sense wey e use. Bikos dis world pipol sabi use dia wayo sense for business pass pipol wey dey for lite.
So I tell una true word, make una use una money well, so dat una go make friends for unasef and wen di money finish, God go welkom una for en kingdom wey go dey forever.
“Anybody wey fit handle small tins, go fit handle big tins too and anybody wey do wayo for small tins, go still do wayo for big ones too.
If pipol nor trust yu with money for dis world, God nor go fit give yu en rishis for heaven.
And if pipol nor fit trust yu with dia propaty, na who go give yu yor own?
“No savant go fit serve two oga, bikos e must hate one kon love di oda one, or e go serve one with all en body dan di oda one. So, yu nor go fit serve God and money for di same time.”
Wen di Farisee pipol (wey like money) hear dis one, dem kon dey take Jesus make yeye.
But Jesus tell dem, “Na una dey make unasef good for pipol eye, but God know una heart. Bikos wetin human being value well-well, naim God nor like.
“Moses Law and di tins wey di profets rite, naim pipol dey follow, before John di Baptist kom. But since e kom, dem don dey prish di Good News about God Kingdom and evribody won force ensef enter.
E betta make heaven and eart vanish, dan make even di small-small laws dey yuzles.
“Any man wey drive en wife, den marry anoda woman, don kommit adultery and di man wey marry woman wey leave en husband, don kommit adultery too.”
“E get one rish man wey dey wear dear-dear klot and e dey enjoy life evriday.
But for en gate, one poor man wey en name bi Lazarus and sore full en body, liedan for der,
e dey wait to chop wetin fall from di rish man tabol. Dogs sef dey kom lick di sore for en body.
“Di poor man kon die and angels karry am go where Abraham dey. Di rish man still die too and dem beri am.
As di rish man dey for hell-fire dey sofa, e kon look up si Abraham for far with Lazarus for en korna.
Naim e shaut, ‘Papa Abraham, make yu sorry for mi, abeg send Lazarus make e put en finger for wota kon tosh my mout, bikos I dey sofa inside dis fire.’
“But Abraham ansa, ‘My pikin, remember sey wen yu dey alive, yu dey enjoy good tins, but Lazarus nor enjoy at-all. But naw, e dey enjoy for here and yu dey sofa for der.
Nor bi only dat one sef, but dem block di centre, so dat pipol wey won cross from here go meet una, nor go fit and nobody go fit from una side cross kom meet us.’
“So di rish man kon sey, ‘Abeg yu papa, make yu send Lazarus go my papa house for di world,
(bikos I get five brodas), so dat e go warn dem, make dem nor for kom sofa for dis place.’
“But Abraham ansa, ‘Moses and di profets dey with yor brodas for di world, so make dem listin to dia word.’
“Di rish man kon sey, ‘No, sir! But if pesin wey don die go meet dem, dem go turn from sin kom meet God.’
“Abraham ansa am, ‘If dem nor gri listin to Moses and di profets, dem nor go still listin, even if pesin wey don die go back go meet dem.’ ”
Jesus tell en disciples, “Tins wey go make pipol kommit sin must happen, but e go bad well-well for di pesin wey go make dem happen!
E betta make dem tie big stone for di pesin neck, trow am for river, dan sey e make any of dis small-small wons kommit sin.
Make yu shine yor eye!
“If yor broda sin, make yu tell am. If e turn from sin kom meet God, den, make yu forgi-am.
Even if e sin against yu seven times for one day and e kon tell yu seven times sey, ‘I don shange’, yu must forgi-am.”
Di disciples kon tell Jesus, “Wi beg! Make yu make awa faith strong.”
Jesus ansa, “Even if una faith small like mustard seed, una go fit tell dis big tree sey, ‘Make yu komot from here go enter river’ and e go obey una.
“Wish of una go tell en savant wen e kom from farm afta e don feed di sheep and melu finish sey, ‘Kom sidan, make yu follow mi chop’?
No! Instead una go tell am, ‘Prepare my evening food and serve mi, make I chop and drink. Wen I don finish, yu fit go chop yor own.’
Di oga nor go tank di savant sey e do wetin e send am, abi e go do so?
Na so too e go bi with una. Wen una don do all wetin dem send una, make una sey, ‘Na savant wi bi, wi nor rish make dem praiz us, bikos wi just do wetin wi suppose to do.’ ”
As Jesus dey go Jerusalem, e kon pass di place wey divide Samaria and Galilee.
As e dey enter one village, ten men wey get leprosy meet am for road. Dem stand for far,
kon dey shaut, “Oga God Jesus! Wi beg, make yu sorry for us.”
Wen Jesus si dem e kon sey, “Make una go show unasef to di priests.” And as dem dey go for road, dia body kon well.
Wen one of dem si sey e don well, e kon turn back dey shaut dey praiz God.
E fall face groun for Jesus front kon dey tank am. (Di man na from Samaria.)
Den Jesus ask, “Nor bi ten pipol I heal? Where di oda Nine?
Na only dis man wey bi strenja fit kom back kon praiz God?”
Den Jesus tell di man, “Get up make yu dey go. Yor faith don make yu well.”
One day, di Farisee pipol kon ask Jesus wen God Kingdom go kom. Jesus ansa, “God Kingdom nor go kom with sign wen pipol go si
and nobody go fit sey, ‘Si am for here!’ Or ‘Si am for der!’ Bikos true-true, God Kingdom don already dey with una.”
Den Jesus tell en disciples, “Di time dey kom wen una go won si Man Pikin, but una nor go si am.
Dat time, pipol go tell una, ‘Si am for der!’ or ‘Si am for here!’ Make una nor follow dem.
Bikos as tonda lite dey flash from one side go anoda for sky, na so Man Pikin go kom for en time.
But e must first sofa many tins and di pipol for dis generashon go rijet am.
“As e bi for Noah time, na so e go still bi for Man Pikin time.
Dat time, pipol dey chop and drink, even for di day wen Noah enter di ark, men and wimen still dey marry, until wota kon distroy all of dem.
“Na so e still bi for Lot time, pipol dey chop and drink, dey buy and sell, dey plant and build house;
but di day wen Lot komot from Sodom, fire and sulfur fall like rain from heaven kon kill all of dem.
“Na so e go bi for di day wen Man Pikin go show ensef.
Dat day, anybody wey dey on-top rut for en house, make e nor go inside house go karry anytin and anybody wey dey farm, make e nor go back to en house.
Make una remember wetin happen to Lot wife!
Anybody wey won keep en life, go luz am and anybody wey luz en life, go save am.
I tell una true word, dat nite, two pipol go dey one bed, God go take one kon leave di oda one.
Two wimen go dey grind pepper togeda; God go take one kon leave di oda one.
Two pipol go dey farm dey work; God go take one kon leave di oda one.”
Den di disciples ask Jesus, “Oga God, for where dis tins go for happen?”
Jesus ansa, “Yu si, na where dead body dey, na der vultures dey gada put.”
Den Jesus tell dem one parabol to show sey, e good make pipol dey always pray.
E sey, “One judge dey for one town wey nor dey fear God and e nor dey respet anybody.
For dat town, e get one woman wey en husband don die. E kon go meet di judge kon beg am, ‘Make yu help mi, bikos some pipol dey shit mi.’
“Di judge nor first listin to am, but afta, e tok for en mind sey, ‘Aldo I nor dey fear God and respet anybody,
but bikos dis woman dey disturb mi, I go make sure sey e get wetin e suppose get, oda-wise e nor go let mi rest with dis en beggy-beggy wey nor dey finish.’ ”
Jesus sey, “If di wiked judge tok like dis,
una nor tink sey God go help en pipol wey dey kry to am both day and nite? Abi, God go wait tey before E help dem?
I tell una true word, God go help dem kwik-kwik. But wen Man Pikin kom back, e go si pipol wey get faith?”
Jesus kon tell dis parabol to some pipol wey bilive and feel sey, na dem holy pass and nobody good rish dem.
“Two men go inside Temple go pray. One na Farisee and di oda one na tax kollector.
Di Farisee kon stand dey pray about ensef sey: ‘God, I tank yu sey I nor bi like oda pipol wey dey play wayo, dey sin, pipol wey dey kommit adultery or even like dis tax kollector.
I dey fast two times a week and I dey pay one out of evry ten tins wey I get, give yu.’
“But di tax kollector stand for far place and e nor even look heaven, but kon nak en chest dey sey, ‘God, make yu sorry for mi, bikos I bi sina!’
“I tell una true word, na di tax kollector God go forgive, nor bi di Farisee. Bikos anybody wey karry ensef go up, God go bring am down, but di pesin wey put ensef down, God go karry am up.”
Some pipol kon bring dia pikin make Jesus tosh dem. But wen di disciples si dem, dem kon bigin shaut for di pipol wey bring di shidren.
But Jesus koll di shidren kon sey, “Make una allow di small-small shidren kom meet mi, nor stop dem, bikos na pipol like dem get God Kingdom.
I tell una true word, anybody wey nor receive God Kingdom like small pikin, nor go enter inside.”
One day, one Jew oga ask Jesus, “Good tisha, wetin I go do to get life wey nor dey end?”
Jesus kon tell am, “Why yu dey koll mi good? Nobody good escept God.
Yu know di kommandment dem wey sey, ‘Make yu nor sleep with pesin wey nor bi yor husband or wife, nor kill pesin, nor tif, respet yor papa and mama.’ ”
Di man ansa Jesus, “I dey obey all dis law with all my heart since I bi small boy.”

Wen Jesus hear wetin di man tok, e kon tell am, “E still get one tin wey yu neva do, make yu sell evritin wey yu get, give di money to poor pipol, den yu go get betta propaty for heaven. Afta dat, make yu kom follow mi.”
Wen di man hear dis one, e kon dey vex, bikos e rish well-well.
Wen Jesus know sey di man dey vex, e kon tell di pipol wey dey with am, “E go hard well-well for pesin wey rish well-well to enter God Kingdom!
E dey eazy for kamel to pass nidol whole dan for pesin wey rish well-well to enter God Kingdom.”
Pipol wey hear dis word kon sey, “Den who God go save?”
Jesus ansa, “Wetin nor possibol for human being, dey possibol with God.”
Den Pita sey, “Oga God, wi don leave evritin wey wi get kon follow yu!”
Jesus kon tell dem, “I tell una di trut, anybody wey leave en house, wife, brodas, papa, mama or pikin bikos of God Kingdom,
God go bless am with wetin pass all di tins wey e leave, both for dis world and for di life wey dey kom.”
Jesus koll di twelf disciples go korna kon tell dem, “Si, wi dey go Jerusalem and evritin wey di profets rite about Man Pikin go happen for der.
Bikos dem go gi-am to Gentile pipol and dem go laf, curse and spit for en body.
Dem go flog am well-well and dem go kon kill-am. But for di third day, e go wake-up.”
But di twelf disciples nor undastand wetin Jesus tok, bikos God hide wetin e mean from dem.
As Jesus near Jeriko, one man wey blind sidan for di road korna dey beg.
Wen e hear plenty pipol dey pass, e kon ask wetin dey happen.
Dem kon tell am sey Jesus wey kom from Nazaret dey pass.
So di man kon dey shaut, “Jesus, David pikin, make yu sorry for mi o-o!”
So di pipol wey dey en front kon dey shaut for am make e kwayet, but e kon dey shaut more-more, “David pikin, make yu sorry for mi o-o!”
So Jesus stop kon sey make dem bring di beggar kom meet am. Wen di man kom, Jesus ask am,
“Wetin yu wont make I do for yu?”
Di man sey, “Oga God, I won si again.”
Jesus kon tell am, “Make yu si naw, yor faith don heal yu.”
At wons, di man bigin si and e kon follow Jesus, dey praiz God. Wen di pipol si wetin happen, dem kon bigin praiz God.
Jesus enter Jeriko kon waka go inside di town.
For der, e get one man wey en name bi Zakius. E get money well-well, bikos e bi tax kollectors oga. E don tey wey e
dey won si Jesus, but e nor fit si am, bikos e bi short man and pipol too plenty.
So e run go klimb one sikamore tree make e for fit si am, bikos Jesus go pass dat road.
Wen Jesus rish dat place, e look up kon sey, “Zakius, kom down kwik-kwik, bikos I must stay for yor house today.”
So Zakius kom down kon welkom Jesus with happiness.
Wen di pipol si wetin happen, dem kon dey komplain dey sey, “Jesus don go visit dat man wey bi sina.”
But Zakius stop kon tell Jesus, “Oga God si, I go give half of wetin I get to poor pipol and evribody wey I don shit before, I go pay am back four times!”
Den Jesus sey, “Salvashon don kom dis house today, bikos dis man na Abraham pikin too.
Man Pikin kom find and save pipol wey lost before.”
As Jesus dey waka near Jerusalem, e kon tell di pipol one parabol to show sey God Kingdom nor go just kom like dat.
Jesus kon sey, “One big man travel go one far kountry where dem for won make am king and afta, e kom back.
Before e go, e koll ten of en savant kon give each one money sey, ‘Make una take dis money trade and make profit till I kom back.’
“But e own pipol nor like am, so dem kon send message follow am sey, ‘Wi nor wont dis man to bi awa king!’
“Wen e kom back afta e don get di kingdom, e kon koll en savants wey e give money make e for know how mush dem don gain.
“So di first one stand for en front sey, ‘Oga God, I don gain ten koins join di ones wey yu give mi.’
“Di oga kon tell am, ‘Yu do well, yu bi good savant! Bikos yu dey faithful with small tin, I go make yu oga ova ten towns.’
“Den di sekond one sey, ‘Oga God, I don gain five koins join di ones wey yu give mi.’
“So di oga tell am, ‘Yu go bi oga for five towns.’
“Den anoda savant kon sey, ‘Oga God, si di money wey yu give mi. I keep am inside klot.
Bikos I dey fear and know sey yu hash well-well. Yu dey chop food wey nor bi yor own and yu dey plok fruit wey yu nor plant!’
“Di oga kon tell am, ‘Na yor word I go take judge yu, yu wiked savant! So yu know sey, I bi hash man; dey chop food wey nor bi my own and I dey plok fruit wey I nor plant?
Den why yu nor put my money for bank, so dat wen I kom, I go kollect am with intrest wey go dey on-top?’
“Den di oga tell di oda savants, ‘Make una take di money from am, gi-am to di savant wey get ten.’
“Dem ansa, ‘Oga God, di man don already get ten!’
“Di oga kon sey, ‘I tell una, anybody wey get, God go gi-am more, but di pesin wey nor get, even di small one wey e get, God go take am from am.
But doz my enemy wey nor wont make I bi dia king, make una go bring and kill dem for my front!’ ”
Afta Jesus tok dis word, e kon go Jerusalem.
Wen e rish Betpage and Betany, for di place wey dem dey koll Mount Olives, e kon send two of en disciples sey,
“Make una go di village wey dey front. Wen una enter, una go si one small donkey wey nobody don sidan put before, wey dem tie for der. Make una luz am kom give mi.
If anybody ask una, ‘Why una dey luz am?’ Make una ansa, ‘Di oga nid am.’ ”
So di pipol wey dem send go, kon rish di place wey Jesus tell dem.
As dem dey luz di donkey, di owner kon ask dem, “Why una dey luz am?”
Dem ansa, “Di oga nid am.”
Dem take di donkey kon put dia klot on-top am, den Jesus sidan put.
As Jesus dey ride dey go, pipol kon spread dia klot for road.
As e dey enter di road wey go Mount Olives, all di disciples kon dey happy, dey praiz God with loud vois for all di mirakles wey dem si.
“God don bless di king wey dey kom with en name!
Make peace dey for heaven and make all di glory bi God own!”
But some Farisee pipol wey dey among di pipol kon tell Jesus, “Tisha, make yu tell yor disciples make dem kwayet.”
Jesus ansa, “I tell una true word, if dem kwayet, even stones go start to dey shaut!”
Wen Jesus near Jerusalem, e look di town kon dey kry,
den e sey, “I wish sey una know wetin go give una peace today! But naw, God don hide am from una.
Time go kom wen una enemies go surround una for evry korna kon block una road.
Dem go distroy una and una shidren and dem nor go leave one block on-top anoda, bikos di time wen God kom visit una, una nor know.”
Jesus enter di temple kon drive all di pipol wey dey sell tins for der,
e kon sey, “God word sey, ‘My house na prayer house’, but una don turn am to house where tif dey hide put!”
Jesus kon dey tish evriday for di temple. Di priest oga dem, di law tishas with di big leaders among di pipol kon dey find how dem go take kill Jesus.
But dem nor get any shance, bikos pipol dey listin to wetin Jesus dey tish.
One day wen Jesus dey tish pipol for di temple, di priest oga dem and di law tishas kon meet am,
dey sey, “Make yu tell us, na wish pawa yu take dey do dis tins? Na who give yu di pawa sef?”
Jesus ansa dem, “Make I still ask una one kweshon and make una ansa mi.
John baptizim kom from heaven, abi na from pipol?”
Dem kon dey tok with each oda sey, “If wi sey na from heaven, e go sey, ‘Den why una nor bilive am?’
But if wi sey, ‘Na from pipol’, dis pipol go stone us, bikos dem bilive sey, John na profet.”
So dem kon tell Jesus sey dem nor know where di baptizim from kom.
Den Jesus tell dem, “Mi too nor go tell una who give mi di pawa to do all dis tins.”
Jesus kon tell di pipol one parabol: “One man rent en grape farm give tenants, den e travel.
Wen harvest time rish, e kon send one savant go meet di tenants make dem gi-am en share from di harvest. But di tenants beat di savant kon send am go back with empty hand.
So e send anoda savant and dem still beat and do am anyhow, den dem kon send am back with empty hand.
Di man kon send di third savant go, but di tenants wound am kon trow am outside too.
“So di grape farm owner kon sey, ‘Wetin I go do naw? I go send di only pikin wey I get, may bi dem go respet am.’
“But wen di tenant si di pikin, dem kon sey, ‘Na di owner pikin dey kom so, make wi kill-am, so dat all di propaty go bi awa own!’
Dem karry di pikin go outside, kon kill-am. So, wetin una tink sey di owner go do di tenants?
E go kom distroy all dis tenant, den give di grape farm to new tenants.”
Wen di pipol hear dis, dem kon sey, “Make dis tin nor happen o-o!”
But Jesus look dem for face kon ask, “Wetin God word mean wen e sey:
“ ‘Di stone wey di builders rijet,
don turn to di main stone?’
Anybody wey fall for dis stone, go break into pieces and di pesin wey di stone fall press, go die.”
Den di Farisee pipol and di law tishas won kon arrest Jesus for dat place, bikos dem know sey Jesus dey tok against dem. But dem dey fear di pipol.

Den di Farisee pipol and di law tishas kon dey wosh Jesus well-well. Dem send some pipol go pritend like sey dem dey follow Jesus, so dat dem go fit use en word against am, kon ripot am to di Roman Govnor.
So dem ask am, “Tisha, wi know sey wetin yu dey tok korrect and yu nor dey do wayo, bikos yu dey tish di trut about God.
Make yu tell us, ‘E good make wi pay tax give Caesar?’ ”
But Jesus know sey na trap, so e kon tell dem,
“Make una show mi di money. Wish pesin face and name dey?” Dem ansa, “Na Caesar own.”
So Jesus tell dem, “Den make una give Caesar wetin bi Caesar own and make una give God wetin bi God own.”
So dem nor fit get am with en word for di pipol present. Dem sopraiz for di ansa wey e give and dem nor fit tok again.
Den some Sadusi pipol (wey nor bilive sey pipol go wake-up from deat) kom meet Jesus,
dey sey, “Tisha, Moses Law sey, ‘If pesin die leave en wife and di woman nor born for am, en broda must marry di woman wey en husband don die, so dat e go born shidren for di broda wey don die.’
E get one family wey get seven brodas. Di first one marry, but dem nor born before di man die.
Den di sekond one kon marry di woman,
den di third one, until nomba seven die too, but di woman nor still born for any of dem.
At last, di woman kon die too.
For di day wey pipol go wake-up from deat, wish pesin wife di woman go bi, since all di seven brodas marry am?”
So Jesus ansa dem, “Pipol for di word naw dey marry.
But di pipol wey God go wake-up from deat karry go heaven, nor go marry.
Dem go bi like angels and dem nor go die again. Dem go bi God shidren, bikos dem don wake-up from deat.
But even Moses tok sey pipol wey don die go wake-up. Moses tok like dis wen e rite about how e koll God, ‘Abraham, Isaak and Jakob God’, wen e dey di bush wey dey burn.
Awa God nor bi God for dead pipol, but na God wey dey alive, bikos for God eye, evribody dey alive.”
Den some law tishas ansa, “Tisha, yu don tok well!”
So dem nor dare ask Jesus kweshon again.
Jesus kon tell dem, “Wetin make dem sey Mezaya na David pikin?
Bikos David ensef tok for Psalms Book sey,
“ ‘God tell my oga sey,
“Sidan for my rite hand,
until I go put yor enemies
under yor leg.” ’
If David koll am ‘Oga God,’ how e kon take bi David pikin?”
As all di pipol dey listin, Jesus kon tell en disciples,
“Make una guide unasef from di law tishas. Dem like to dey waka with long klot make pipol dey shaut dia name for market and chairs wey betta pass for sinagog, na der dem dey like to sidan.
Dem dey sofa wimen wey dia husband don die and kollect dia tins kon dey pray long prayer make pipol for si dem. So na dia ponishment go big pass.”
For inside di temple, Jesus kon si rish pipol dey put dia money for ofrin box.
E still si one poor woman wey en husband don die dey put two koins inside di box.
Jesus kon sey, “I tell una true word, di money wey dis poor widow put so, big pass all di oda pipol own;
bikos di rish pipol give dia ofrin from di plenty money wey dem get, but as dis woman poor rish, e put evritin wey e get.”
As some pipol dey tok about how di temple fine rish, bikos of di stones wey dem take build am and di ofrin wey pipol dey give, Jesus kon sey,
“Di day dey kom wen all di stones wey una dey si so, go skata and one nor go dey on-top anoda again.”
So, dem kon ask am, “Tisha, wen dis tins go happen? And wetin go bi di sign sey di time for dis tins to happen don rish?”
Jesus ansa, “Make una shine una eye, so dat nobody go deceive una. Bikos many pipol go kom prish with my name sey, ‘Na mi bi Jesus’ or ‘Di time don near.’ Make una nor follow dem!
And wen una hear rumor about war and wahala, make una nor fear. Bikos all dis tins go first happen, but dat nor mean sey di end don rish.”
Den Jesus tell dem, “Kountry go fight kountry, kingdom go fight kingdom.
Strong eartkweke, honga and sickness go dey evriwhere; difren-difren tins and bad signs go dey happen and fear go katch evribody.

“But before dem go happen, dem go arrest and ponish una for wetin una nor do, den go karry una go judge for inside sinagog, den dem go trow una inside prison. Dem go karry una go meet kings and govnors, bikos of my name.
Dis na di time for una to spread di Good News.
So make una ready una mind before di time rish. Make una nor tink how una go take defend unasef,
bikos I go give una di word wey una go tok and wisdom wey una enemy nor go fit oppoz.
Una papa, mama, brodas, rilashons and friends go sey dem nor know una and dem go even kill some of una.
Evribody go hate una bikos of my name.
But God eye go always dey wosh una.
So, if una stand rish di end, God go save una.”
“But wen una si sey sojas don surround Jerusalem, make una know sey di time wey dem go distroy Jerusalem, don near.
So, make di pipol wey dey Judea run go mountin and doz wey dey inside town must komot der. Make doz wey dey outside, nor enter di town again,
bikos na dat time God go judge di world, since evritin wey dem rite for God word, must happen.
Dat time, e go bad well-well for wimen wey get belle or get small pikin for hand! Strong wahala go kom for dis land and God ponishment go fall for pipol head.
Dem go use swod kill some, karry some as prisona go anoda kountry and di Gentile pipol go distroy Jerusalem, until di time wey God sey Israel must sofa, go end.

“Difren-difren signs go show for sun, moon and star. For inside dis world, pipol for difren kountries go dey worry and fear, bikos of di way rivers go dey move and wota go dey rush from sea enter land.
Pipol go dey faint and fear go dey katch some, bikos of wetin dey happen for di world and difren pawas inside di sky, go shake komot for where dem dey.
Den, dem go si Man Pikin dey kom inside kloud with pawa and glory.
So, wen dis tins dey happen, make una stand and dey ready, bikos una salvashon don near.”
Den, Jesus kon tell dem dis parabol: “Make una tink about di fig tree and all di oda trees.
Wen dia leaf start to fall komot, make una know sey dry sizin don near.
Na so una go still know too, wen una si all dis tins dey happen, una go know sey God Kingdom don near.
“I tell una true word, di pipol for dis world naw nor go die finish before all dis tins go happen.
Heaven and eart go vanish komot, but my word go dey forever.
“So, make una shine una eye! Nor let party and wahala for dis life full una mind, if not, dat Day go kom wen una nor espect,
bikos dat Day go sopraiz evribody wey dey for dis world.
But make una dey shine una eye evritime, dey pray make God give una pawa take pass all dis test wey go happen, so dat una go fit stand for Man Pikin front.”
So, Jesus kon dey tish for di temple evriday, but wen nite rish, e go-go Mount Olives.
And for early morning, all di pipol dey go listin to am inside di temple.
Time kon rish for Bread (wey nor get yist) Feast, wey dem dey koll Passova.
Di priest oga dem and di law tishas dey fine how dem go take kill Jesus, but dem dey fear di pipol.
So, Satan enter inside Judas Iskariot, one of Jesus twelf disciples.
E kon go tell di offisa wey dey guide di temple sey e go sell Jesus give dem.
Dem happy well-well kon promise am sey dem go gi-am money.
Judas gri and e kon bigin find sekret way to sell Jesus give dem, so dat pipol nor go know.
Di day for di Bread (wey nor get yist) Feast, wen dem dey kill sheep for sakrifice, kon rish.
Jesus tell Pita and John, “Make una go prepare di Passova food wey wi go chop.”
Dem kon ask, “Na for where yu wont make wi prepare am?”
Jesus ansa dem, “Listin, wen una enter di town, una go meet one man wey karry wota pot, make una follow am enter di house wey e go enter,
make una tell di pesin wey get di house sey, Di Tisha sey make wi ask yu, ‘Where di room wey mi and my disciples go for chop di Passova food?’
E go show una one big room where tabol and chair dey for upstair. Make una prepare evritin for der.”
Wen dem go, dem kon si evritin as Jesus tell dem sey e go bi, so dem prepare di Passova food for der.
Wen di time rish, Jesus sidan for where dem dey chop and en disciples kon join am.
Jesus tell dem, “I really won chop dis Passova food with una before I go sofa.
Bikos I tell una, I nor go chop am again, until evritin don komplete for God Kingdom.”
Den Jesus take one cup wey get wine, afta e tank God, e kon sey, “Make una take dis cup and divide am among unasef.
Bikos I tell una, from naw go, I nor go drink dis wine again, until God Kingdom go kom.”
Den Jesus take bread, afta e tank God, e divide am kon gi-am to dem sey, “Na my body bi dis, wey God don give una. Make una dey always do dis tin to take remember mi.”
Like dat, Jesus still take di cup afta dem don chop finish kon sey, “Dis cup wey God give una, na di new agriment with my blood.”
“I wont make una know sey, di pesin wey go sell mi give my enemy dey chop with mi for dis tabol.
Bikos Man Pikin go die as God plan am, but curse dey for di pesin head wey go sell am!”
So di disciples kon bigin ask each oda wish of dem go sell Jesus.
Dem kon dey kworel among diasef sey wish of dem big pass.
So Jesus tell dem, “Gentile kings dey give dia pipol orda, yet di pipol still dey koll dem, ‘Pipol Friends.’
But una nor suppose to bi like dat; di pesin wey big among una, must do like sey naim small pass and di leader, go bi like savant.
Na who big pass? Na di pesin wey sidan for tabol dey chop or di pesin wey dey serve am? Nor bi di one wey sidan for tabol? But I dey do like savant among una.
Na una stay with mi wen I dey pass thru wahala.
So, I give una pawa to rule, just as my Papa don give mi.
For my kingdom, una go sidan chop and drink for my tabol and una go sidan for difren thrones dey judge di twelf tribes for Israel.
“Simon! Simon! Make yu listin! God don allow Satan make e test all of una, so dat God go fit separate bad pipol from di good ones.
But Simon, I don pray for yu make yor faith nor for fail. Wen yu don turn back kom meet God, make yu help yor brodas too.”
Pita tell am, “Oga God, I dey ready to follow yu go prison and even die with yu.”
But Jesus sey, “Pita, make I tell yu di trut, fawol nor go do ‘Kukuruku’ dis nite until yu don tok three times sey yu nor know mi.”
Den Jesus tell dem, “Wen I send una go out, without money, bag or sandals, e get anytin wey una nid wey una nor get?”
Dem ansa, “No!”
E kon tell dem, “But naw, pesin wey get money or traveling bag must karry am. And pesin wey nor get swod must sell en klot kon use di money by one.
Bikos I tell una, wetin dem rite for God word about mi must happen sey, ‘Dem kount am join criminals.’ Bikos wetin God rite about mi dey happen naw.”
Di disciples kon sey, “Oga God, si two swod for here.”
Jesus ansa, “E don do.”
Den Jesus komot, kon waka as e dey always do, go Mount Olives and en disciples follow am.
Wen dem rish der, Jesus kon tell dem, “Make una pray so dat una nor go fall enter temptashon.”
Den e leave dem, waka go far small, kon knee down dey pray,
“Papa, if yu like to do am, make yu let dis sofa cup pass mi. But make e bi as yu wont, nor bi as I wont am.”
One angel appear from heaven kon give Jesus pawa.
Bikos Jesus dey struggol well-well for mind, e pray sotey en sweat kon bi like blood.
Wen e pray finish, e go meet en disciples kon si sey dem dey sleep, bikos dem don taya well-well.
So Jesus tell dem, “Why una dey sleep? Make una get up pray, so dat una nor go fall enter temptashon!”
As Jesus still dey tok, at wons, some pipol waka kom and na Judas lead dem. E waka go meet Jesus kon kiss am for face.
So Jesus ask am, “Judas, na kiss yu take sell Man Pikin?”
Wen doz wey dey near Jesus si wetin won happen, dem ask am, “Oga God, make wi use awa swod?”
Den one among dem attack di priest savant kon kut en rite ear komot.
But Jesus shaut for am make e stop, den tosh di man ear kon heal am.
Den Jesus ask di priest oga dem, di ofisas wey dey guide di temple and di eldas wey kom meet am sey, “Una karry swod and wood like sey una dey kom arrest tif?
Since wen I dey with una for di temple una nor arrest mi. But na una time bi dis, di time wey darkness pawa go rule.”
Den dem arrest Jesus, karry am go di High Priest house. But Pita dey follow dem for back-back.
Wen dem don make fire for di kompond centre kon sidan togeda, Pita sidan with di pipol too.
One savant girl si Pita sidan near di fire, e look am for eye kon sey, “Dis man bin dey with Jesus too o-o.”
But Pita sey, “Woman! Nor bi mi, I nor know am.”
Afta sometaim, anoda pesin si am kon sey, “Yu dey with dem, nor bi so?”
But Pita sey, “My friend! I nor dey with dem o-o.”
Wen one hour don pass, anoda pesin kon sey, “I sey dis man dey with dem, bikos en too kom from Galilee.”
But Pita sey, “Oga God! I nor know wetin yu dey tok.” At wons, as e still dey tok, naim one fawol do, “Kukuruku!”
Den Jesus turn look Pita for eye and Pita kon remember di word wey Jesus tell am, “Before fawol go do ‘Kukuruku!’ dis nite, yu go don tok three times sey yu nor know mi.”
Den Pita go outside, bigin kry.
Di guards bigin laf Jesus kon dey beat am anyhow.
Dem tie en eye kon dey ask am, “Oya profesai! Na who nak yu so?”
Dem still curse am with difren words.
Wen morning rish, di eldas with di priest oga dem and di law tishas kon gada. Den dem take Jesus go dia kansol
kon tell am sey, “If yu know sey na yu bi Christ, make yu tell us.”
But Jesus ansa, “If I tell una, una nor go bilive mi
and if I ask una kweshon, una nor go gri ansa.
But from naw go, Man Pikin go sidan for God rite hand where pawa dey.”
All of dem kon ask, “So, yu bi God Pikin?”
Jesus ansa, “Na una tok am o-o.”
Den dem kon sey, “Why wi nid anoda witness? E don tok evritin by ensef!”
Den di Farisee pipol and di oda pipol take Jesus go meet Pilate,
dey akuiz am sey, “Wi hear dis man wen e dey deceive and tell awa pipol sey make dem nor pay tax give Caesar and e dey tok sey naim bi Christ, wey bi king.”
Pilate kon ask Jesus, “Na yu bi di Jew pipol king?”
Jesus ansa, “Na as yu tok.”
Den Pilate tell di priest oga dem and di pipol, “I nor si anytin wey go make mi kondemn dis man.”
But dem still sey, “E dey kause wahala with wetin e dey tish pipol for Judea. E start am for Galilee and naw e don kom here!”
Wen Pilate hear dis one, e kon ask weda Jesus na Galilee pesin.
Wen e hear sey Jesus kom from Jerusalem, where Herod dey rule for dat time, e kon sey make dem take Jesus go meet am.
Wen Herod si Jesus, e happy well-well, bikos e don tey wen e won si am since e hear about am. E dey hope sey Jesus go do mirakle for en present.
Herod kon ask Jesus many kweshon, but Jesus nor ansa am at-all.
Di priest oga dem and di law tishas dey akuiz Jesus with vexnashon.
Herod with en sojas too dey take Jesus make yeye and dey laf am. Den Herod sey make dem wear fine klot for Jesus body, den make dem take am go back go meet Pilate.
Dat day, Herod and Pilate kon bi friends, bikos before dis time dem bi strong enemy.
Den Pilate koll di priest oga dem, di eldas and di pipol for dat place
kon tell dem, “Una bring dis man kom meet mi sey e dey deceive pipol. Wen I ask am kweshon for una present, I nor si any bad tin wey una sey e do.
Even Herod nor still si anytin too, so e sey make dem bring am kom meet us. Dis man nor do anytin wey go make am die.
So I go give orda make dem flog am, den I go free am.”
(Na dia tradishon sey Pilate must release one prisona anytime wen dem dey do Passova Feast.)
But all of dem kon dey shaut, “Take dis man komot! Na Barabas wi wont!”
(Barabas na pesin wey dem put for prison bikos e kause wahala and kill pesin for di town.)
Pilate kon tok to dem again, bikos e won free Jesus.
But dem still dey shaut, “Kill-am trowey, Kill-am trowey!”
Again Pilate ask dem, “Why? Wish bad tin e do? I nor si any bad tin wey e do wey go make am die, so I go give orda make dem flog am, den I go free am.”
But dem shaut more-more dey sey, “Kill-am trowey.” Dem shaut sotey Pilate kon do wetin dem wont.
So Pilate orda en sojas sey make dem give Jesus to di pipol make dem go kill-am.
E kon free Barabas, wey di pipol wont, wey dem bin put for prison, bikos e kause wahala and kill pesin for di town.
As dem dey take Jesus komot, dem kon katch one man wey dey kom from Sirene and en name na Simon. Dem put di cross for en back make e karry am follow Jesus.
Many pipol follow Jesus and di wimen among dem kon dey kry.
But Jesus turn look dem sey, “Jerusalem wimen, make una nor kry bikos of mi, but make una kry for unasef and for una shidren.
Bikos true-true, di time dey kom wen pipol go sey, ‘E good well-well for wimen wey nor born or feed pikin at-all!’
Den,
“dem go tell di mountins, ‘Make yu fall on-top us!’
And tell di hills, ‘Make yu kover us!’
But if dem do dis kind tin for wood wen e still fresh, wetin go happen wen di wood don dry?”
Dem still take two oda men wey bi tif, wey dem wont kill, follow Jesus.
Wen dem rish di place wey dem dey koll, “Di Skull,” dem kon nail Jesus for cross with di two tif, one for en left and di oda for en rite side.
(Den Jesus kon sey, “Papa, make yu forgive dem, bikos dem nor know wetin dem dey do.”) So, di sojas kon gambol to know who go take Jesus klot.
Di pipol still stand der dey look, but dia leaders dey laf Jesus sey, “E save oda pipol. Make e save ensef if e bi di Mezaya wey God choose!”
Di sojas still dey laf Jesus and dem kon gi-am wine wey don sawa make e drink,
den sey, “If yu bi di Jew pipol king, make yu save yorsef!”
Dem kon rite on-top en cross sey,
One of di tif dey shaut for Jesus, “Nor bi yu bi di Mezaya? Make yu save yorsef and us naw!”
But di oda tif kon shaut for di first tif, “Yu nor dey fear God as e bi sey na di same ponishment wi dey sofa?
Na dis ponishment fit us, bikos na wetin wi do naim make dem dey ponish us so. But dis man nor do any bad tin.”
Den e tell Jesus, “Wen yu rish yor kingdom, make yu remember mi!”
Jesus ansa am, “I tell yu di trut, today yu go dey with mi for paradise.”
By naw, twelf oklok don nearly rish for aftanoon and darkness kover di whole kountry until three oklok for dat aftanoon,
bikos sun stop to shine. Di Temple curtain kon tear into two.
So, Jesus shaut, “Papa, I put my spirit for yor hand!” Afta e tok finish, e kon die.
Wen di soja oga si wetin happen, e kon praiz God sey, “True-true, dis man na good pesin!”
So wen all di pipol wey gada dey look si wetin happen, dem kon dey kry go dia house.
And evribody wey know Jesus before, stand for far and di wimen wey follow Jesus kom from Galilee, si di tins wey happen.
E get one man for di kansol, wey bi Josef and e kom from Arimatea wey dey Judea. E bi betta pesin wey dey do wetin God like and e dey wait for di time wen God Kingdom go kom.
(E nor gri with di oda kansol membas with dia plan and for wetin dem do so.)
E go meet Pilate kon ask for Jesus dead body.
Den e karry di body from di cross, wrap am with linen klot kon put am for di grave wey e dig inside rock, where dem neva beri anybody put before.
Dat day na Friday wen dem dey ready for Sabat Day serimony.
Di wimen wey follow Jesus from Galilee kon follow Josef go si di grave. So dem put Jesus body inside.
Den di wimen go house go prepare betta perfume. But for Sabat Day, dem kon rest as Moses Law tok.
For early morning for di first day for di week, di wimen karry di perfume wey dem prepare go di grave where dem beri Jesus put.
Dem kon si sey dem don roll di stone komot from di grave mout,
but wen dem enter inside, dem nor si Jesus body for der.
As dem dey konfuse bikos of dis tin, dem kon si two men wey dia klot dey shine like lite and dem stand for korna.
Fear katch di wimen and dem kon face groun. But di men tell dem, “Why una dey find pesin wey dey alive for where dead body dey?
E nor dey here again, God don wake am! Una remember wetin e tell una wen e dey Galilee sey,
‘Dem must sell Man Pikin give wiked pipol and dem go kill-am trowey and for di third day, e go wake-up.’ ”
Den di wimen kon remember wetin Jesus tell dem,
so dem komot from di grave kon go tell di eleven apostles and di rest pipol wetin happen.
Na Mary Magdalin, Joanna, Mary wey bi James mama and di oda wimen wey dey with dem, na dem tell di apostles all dis tins.
But dia word nor mean anytin to di apostles, so dem nor bilive di wimen.
But Pita kon get up, run go di grave. E ben-down look inside and e si only di klot, den e kon go house dey wonder wetin happen.
Dat day, two men among Jesus disciples dey waka go one village wey dem dey koll Emmaus, wey nor too far from Jerusalem.
Dem dey tok to each oda about di tins wey happen.
As dem dey tok, Jesus kon bigin waka with dem,
(but Jesus nor let dem know who e bi.)
Den Jesus kon ask dem, “Na wetin make una dey tok like dis for road?”
Dem kon stand for one place, dey sopraiz for am.
Den one among dem, wey en name bi Kleopas, kon tell am, “Na only yu bi strenja for Jerusalem wey nor know di tins wey dey happen since?”
Jesus ask dem, “Wish tins?”
Dem ansa, “Di tins about Jesus wey kom from Nazaret, one man wey wetin e dey tok and do show sey en na God profet
and how awa priest oga dem and di pipol wey dey rule us kill-am trowey.
But wi bin hope sey naim go free Israel and dis tins don happen for three days naw.
Some wimen wey dey with us kon even sopraiz us. Dem go where dem beri am put dis morning
and dem nor si en body for der. Dem kom back dey tok sey dem si angels wey tell dem sey Jesus dey alive.
Den some pipol wey dey with us kon go di grave and dem si evritin as di wimen tok, but dem nor si Jesus.”
So Jesus tell dem, “Una nor get sense and una nor dey kwik bilive wetin all di profets tok.
Dem nor tok sey di Mezaya go must sofa all dis tins and den e go enter en glory?”
Den e kon use wetin Moses and all di profets rite take tell dem wetin God tok about am for en word.
As dem near di village wey dem dey go, Jesus do like sey e won waka go front,
but dem tell am, “Make yu stay with us, bikos evening don nearly rish and day go soon dark.” So Jesus enter di village kon follow dem stay.
E sidan for where dem dey chop; e take bread, bless am kon divide am give dem.
At wons dia eye open and dem kon know am. Den e vanish from dia front.
Dem kon tell each oda, “No wonder e bi like sey fire dey burn inside awa heart wen e dey tok with us for road about God!”
So dem get up at wons go back to Jerusalem. Dem si di eleven apostles and di oda pipol wey dey with dem
kon tell dem, “Jesus don really wake-up and e don appear to Simon!”
Den dem tok wetin happen for road and how dem take know Jesus wen e divide di bread.
As dem still dey tok, Jesus kon stand with dem, tell dem, “Make peace dey with una.”
But dem shok kon bigin fear, bikos dem tink sey na spirit dem dey si.
Den Jesus kon sey, “Why una dey fear and nor bilive?
Make una look my hand and leg and make una tosh mi: spirit nor get flesh and bone as una si sey I get.”
Wen Jesus don tok dis one, e kon show dem en hand and leg.
And as dem neva still bilive (bikos of dia happiness) and still dey sopraiz, Jesus ask dem, “Una get anytin to chop for here?”
So dem kon gi-am fish wey dem don kook,
e kon take am chop for dia front.
Den Jesus tell dem, “Na di word wey I tell una wen I still dey with una bi dis, evritin wey dem rite about mi for Moses Law, di profets book and Psalms, must happen.”
Den e open dia mind so dat dem go fit undastand God word
kon tell dem, “Na wetin dem rite bi dis, ‘Di Mezaya go sofa and e go wake-up from deat for di third day
and dem go use en name prish give pipol make dem for turn from dia sin kom meet God and di prishin go start from Jerusalem.’
Una bi witness for dis tins.
I dey send wetin my Papa promise kom meet una. So make una stay for dis town until pawa go kom from heaven kon kover una.”
Den Jesus take dem go Betany kon lift en hand and bless dem.
As e dey bless dem, God kon karry am go heaven.
So, dem woship am kon go back to Jerusalem dey happy well-well
and dem dey go di temple evritime, dey praiz God.
John: Since wen di time start naim di Word dey and di Word dey with God and na God ensef bi di Word.
Di Word dey with God from wen time bigin.
Na God make evritin and if to sey E nor make dem, dem nor for dey dis world at-all.
Na inside am life dey and na dat life bi di lite wey pipol get.
Di lite dey shine inside darkness, but darkness nor gri with am.
E get one man wey en name bi John, wey God send kom dis world.
E kom bear witness for di lite, make evribody for fit get di shance to bilive wetin God tok thru en word.
Nor bi John ensef bi di lite, but e kom tell pipol about Jesus wey bi di lite.
Na Jesus bi di true lite wey go shine for evribody for dis world.
E kom inside di world wey e make my ensef, but di pipol nor know am.
E kom meet en own pipol, but dem nor wont am.
But evribody wey receive and bilive en name, e go give dem di rite to bi God pikin.
Dem go bi God shidren, nor bi as dia papa and mama take born dem from belle, or bikos somebody make dem so, but bikos God ensef make dem en own shidren.
Den di Word kon shange to pesin and e stay with us for dis world. Wi si en glory wey show sey, naim bi di only pikin wey get korrect favor and trut, wey God send kom meet us.
John kon bigin shaut sey, “Dis na di pesin wey I tell una about sey, ‘Di pesin wey go kom afta mi, big pass mi, bikos e dey before mi.’ ”
Evribody for dis world don receive plenty good tins from am.
Na thru Moses God give us di law, but God give us favor and trut, thru Jesus Christ.
Nobody don fit si God face before. But Jesus, wey bi God ensef, wey en and en Papa bi tait friend, na-im kom show us how God bi.
Di Jew oga dem send priests and Levi pipol make dem go ask John sey, “Who yu bi sef?”
E ansa dem, “I nor dey lie, bikos nor bi mi bi di Christ.”
Den dem ask am, “So, na who yu bi? Abi yu bi Elijah?”
E kon sey, “No, I nor bi Elijah.”
Dem ask am again, “Yu bi di profet?”
E ansa, “No o-o!”
Again, dem ask am, “Who yu bi sef? Make yu tell us, so dat wi go know wetin to tell di pipol wey send us. Who yu sey yu bi?”
John kon sey, “Na mi bi dat vois wey dey shaut inside wildaness sey, ‘Make una make di road wey pipol go pass go meet God strait well-well’, as Profet Isaya tok before.”
(Na di Farisee pipol send dis pipol go meet John).
Dem kon ask John sey, “Why yu dey baptize pipol, if yu nor bi di Christ or Elijah or di Profet?”
John ansa dem, “I dey baptize pipol with wota, but among una, one pesin dey wey una nor know.
E go kom afta mi. I nor rish to luz di rope wey dey en shoe.”
All dis tins happen for Betany where pipol dey cross Jordan River kom meet John, make e baptize dem.
Wen day break, John si Jesus dey waka kom meet am, den John sey, “Make una look! Dis na di Sheep wey God send kom die, so dat God go forgive us awa sins.”
Na dis pesin I tell una sey, “Afta mi, one man wey big pass mi go kom, bikos e dey before mi.
Misef nor know am before, but I dey baptize pipol with wota, so dat God go show Israel pipol who Jesus bi.”
Den John bear witness sey, “I si God Spirit wey kom down like dove from heaven kon stay for Jesus head.
I nor know am before, but di pesin wey send mi kom baptize with wota tell mi sey, ‘Di pesin wey yu go si God Spirit kom stay on-top en head, na-im go baptize pipol with Holy Spirit.’
I don si am and I bear witness sey, ‘Dis man na di pesin wey God choose.’ ”
Wen day break, John with en two disciple stand for outside.
Dem kon dey look Jesus wen e dey waka pass, den John kon sey, “Make una look! Na dat pesin bi God Sheep.”
Wen John two disciples hear wetin e tok, dem kon follow Jesus.
Jesus look back kon si di disciples dey follow am. Den e ask dem, “Wetin una wont?”
Dem ansa am, “Oga God, (wey mean Tisha) where yu dey stay?”
Jesus ansa dem, “Make una kom si am.”
So dem go si di place wey e dey stay kon stay with am dat day. Dat time na about for oklok for aftanoon.
Andru, Simon Pita broda, na one for di disciples wey hear wetin John tok kon follow Jesus.
E first go find en broda Simon kon tell am, “Wi don si di Mezaya”, (wey mean Christ).
Andru kon bring Simon kom meet Jesus.
Wen Jesus si am, e tell am, “Yu bi Simon, John pikin, na Cefas (wey mean Pita) pipol go dey koll yu from today go.”
Wen day break, Jesus kon plan to go Galilee. Wen e si Filip, e tell am, “Make yu follow mi.”
Filip na from Betsaida, wey bi Andru and Pita home-town.
Wen Filip si Netanel, e tell am, “Wi don si di pesin wey Moses and di profets rite about for dia book sey, ‘En name na Jesus, wey en home-town bi Nazaret and na Josef pikin e bi.’ ”
Netanel kon sey, “Betta tin go fit kom out from Nazaret?”
Filip ansa am, “Make yu kom si.”
Wen Jesus si Netanel dey waka kom meet am, e kon sey, “Make una look! Dis na betta pesin wey kom from Israel, wayo nor dey en belle.”
Netanel ask am, “How yu take know mi.”
Jesus ansa, “Before Filip koll yu wen yu dey under di tree, I don si yu.”
Netanel sey, “Tisha, true-true, yu bi God Pikin and na yu bi Israel king.”
Jesus tell am, “Bikos I tell yu sey I si yu under di fig tree, yu bilive wetin I tok? Bikos yu bilive, yu go si wetin big pass dis one.”
Den e kon sey, “Wetin I dey tell una na true word, una go si heaven open and God angels go dey waka up-and-down on-top God Pikin.”
Wen three days don pass, Mary, wey bi Jesus mama, go one marriage for Kana, wey dey for Galilee.
Dem invite Jesus and en disciple for di marriage too.
Wen wine finish, Jesus mama kon tell am, “Dia wine don finish.”
Jesus ansa am, “Mama, why yu dey tell mi? My time neva rish.”
So en mama kon tell di savants sey, “Anytin wey e tell una, make una do am.”
For dat place, six big wota pot dey and only one fit kontain about twenty to thirty gallon for wota, wey di Jew pipol dey use wosh leg as dia tradishon tok.
Jesus tell di savants, “Make una full di pots with wota.” So dem kon full all di pot with wota.
Jesus tell dem, “Make una take some wota from di pot go give di chairman for di party.”
So, dem do as e tok.
Wen di chairman taste di wota wey don turn to wine, bikos e nor know how e happen (but di savants wey draw di wota know), e koll di man wey dey marry kon tell am sey,
“Wen pesin dey do party, na betta wine e dey first serve pipol, den wen di pipol don drink taya, naim e dey serve cheap wine. But yu kon keep di good wine until di party don one finish.”
Dis na di first mirakle wey Jesus do and e happen for Kana wey dey Galilee. Dis na how e show en honor, so en disciples kon bilive am.
Den Jesus with en mama, brodas and en disciples kon go Kapanaum. Dem kon stay der for some days.
By dis time, di Jew Passova Feast don near well-well, so Jesus kon go Jerusalem.
E si di pipol dey sell melu, sheep and dove inside di temple yard and e still si pipol wey dey shange money, sidan near dia tabol.
So e use koboko wey e make, take drive dem with dia sheep and melu komot from di temple yard. E trowey di tabol wey di pipol dey take shange money and dia money kon skata.
E kon tell di pipol wey dey sell dove, “Make una karry all dis tins komot for here. Make una nor turn my Papa house to market.”
Den en disciples kon remember as den rite for Psalms Book sey, “Di love wey e get for en Papa house dey burn for en heart like fire.”
Di Jew oga dem kon ask am, “As yu dey do all dis tins, na wish sign yu go show us make wi for fit bilive yu?”
Jesus ansa dem, “Even if una distroy dis Temple, for three days time, I go build am again.”
Den di Jew oga dem tell am, “Na forty-six years dem take build dis Temple and yu dey sey yu go fit build am for three days?”
But na di temple for Jesus body naim e dey tok about.
So wen Jesus don wake-up from deat, en disciples kon remember sey, e tok so before. Den dem kon bilive wetin dem rite for God word and wetin Jesus tell dem.
Jesus dey for Jerusalem by di time wey dem dey do di Passova Feast. For der, many pipol kon bilive am, bikos dem si di mirakles wey e do.
But Jesus nor gri open en mind give di pipol, bikos e know dem well-well.
E nor nid anybody to tok about am, bikos e know wetin dey inside pipol belle, so e nor fit trust dem.
E get one man wey bi Farisee, en name na Nikodimos and e bi memba for di kansol wey dey rule Jew pipol.
E hide go meet Jesus for nite kon tell am, “Tisha, wi know sey yu bi di pesin wey God send kom meet us, bikos nobody fit do di mirakles wey yu dey do, unless God dey with am.”
Jesus tell am, “Make I tell yu true word, unless dem born pesin di sekond time, e nor go fit si God kingdom.”
Den Nikodimos ask am, “How dem go fit take born pesin wey don old for di sekond time? Abi di pesin go enter en mama belle make di mama born am again? E fit happen like dat?”
Jesus ansa am, “I tell yu di trut, unless God born pesin with wota and en Spirit, di pesin nor go fit enter God kingdom.
Wetin flesh born, na flesh e bi, but wetin God Spirit born, na spirit e bi.
So, make yu nor konfuse bikos I tok sey, ‘God go born yu for di sekond time.’
Wen breeze dey blow, e dey go anywhere e wont, yu dey hear di sound wey e dey make, but yu nor fit know where e dey kom from or where e dey go. Na so e bi with evribody wey God Spirit born.”
Nikodimos kon ask am, “How dis tins go fit happen?”
Jesus ansa, “Yu bi tisha for Israel, yet yu nor fit undastand dis tins?
Make I tell yu di trut, wi dey tok wetin wi sabi and dey bear witness for wetin wi don si with awa eyes, but una nor gri asept wetin wi tok.
Naw, if I dey tell una about di tins wey dey for dis world and una nor fit bilive wetin I tok, how una go fit take bilive mi, if I bigin dey tell una about di tins wey dey for heaven?
Nobody don go heaven before, escept Man Pikin wey kom down from heaven and e go-go back der.
Yu si, as Moses karry di snake go up wen dem dey inside desert, na so too dem go karry Man Pikin up,
so dat anybody wey bilive am, go get life wey nor dey end.
“God love di pipol wey dey dis world well-well, so E kon send di only pikin wey E get to us, so dat anybody wey bilive am, nor go die, but e go get life wey nor dey end.
God nor send en pikin kom kondemn di pipol wey dey inside di world, but make e kom save dem.
Anybody wey bilive am, God nor go kondemn am. But di pesin wey nor bilive am, God don kondemn am already, bikos di pesin nor bilive God Pikin name.
Na dis bi di rizin why God go judge di world, bikos lite don kom inside di world, but pipol like to stay for darkness instead of lite, bikos dem dey do tins wey nor good.
Yu si, evribody wey dey do bad tins dey hate lite and dem nor go gri kom out for where lite dey, make pipol nor for si di bad tins wey dem dey do.
But di pesin wey dey do good tins, dey kom out for lite, so dat pipol go si di tins wey e dey do, bikos na as God wont naim e dey do.”
Leta, Jesus and en disciples go Judea aria and dem kon stay der for sometaim dey baptize pipol.
John dey baptize for Aenon, one town wey near Salim, bikos plenty wota dey der and pipol dey kom meet am make e baptize dem.
(For dis time, dem neva put John for prison).
Den one Jew man kon dey argue with John disciples about how dem suppose to wosh dia body as dia tradishon tok.
Some among dem go meet John kon tell am, “Oga God, di pesin wey dey with yu for di oda side for Jordan River, wey yu tok about before, en too, dey baptize pipol and evribody dey rush go meet am.”
John ansa dem, “Nobody go fit get anytin unless God wey dey heaven, gi-am.
Unasef go fit bear witness sey, I tok sey I nor bi di Christ, but God send mi kom, before Christ go kom.

Di pesin wey won marry new wife naim bi di bridegroom. En friend, wey bi di best man, dey listin to am. E go dey happy well-well wen e hear di bridegroom dey tok. Na dis dey make mi happy and my joy don full.
Pipol must know Christ pass as dem know mi.
“Di pesin wey kom from heaven betta pass evribody wey dey for dis world. And who dey dis world, dey tok about di tins wey dey inside di world.
But di pesin wey kom from heaven dey tok about wetin e si and hear for heaven, but pipol nor gri listin to am.
But pesin wey bilive wetin e tok about God, bilive sey wetin God tok, na true.
Di pesin wey God send dey tok about God word, bikos God dey give en Spirit to pipol.
God love en pikin well-well and E gi-am pawa to kontrol evritin.
Pesin wey bilive di only pikin wey God get, go get life wey nor dey end. But pesin wey nor bilive Man Pikin, nor go get life at-all. God go always dey vex with dat kind pesin.”
Jesus kon know sey di Farisee pipol don hear sey e dey baptize plenty pipol pass John and di pipol dey follow am,
(aldo nor bi Jesus ensef dey baptize pipol, but na en disciples dey do am).
Jesus komot for Judea dey go Galilee.
For am to rish der, e go must pass thru Samaria.
E kon rish one town for Samaria wey dem dey koll Saikar, wey near di land wey Jakob give Josef, wey bi en pikin.
Jakob well dey der too. Dat aftanoon, bikos Jesus don taya to waka, e kon sidan near di well.
So one woman for di town kom draw wota for di well. Jesus tell am, “Abeg give mi wota make I drink.”
By dis time, en disciples don go inside di town go buy food.
Den di woman kon tell Jesus, “How yu wey bi Jew kon dey ask mi wey bi Samaria pesin, sey, ‘Make I give yu wota drink?’ ” (E tok dis one bikos Jew and Samaria pipol nor dey gri at-all.)
Jesus ansa am, “If yu know wetin God gift bi and di pesin wey dey ask yu for wota so, yu for ask am and e go give yu di wota wey dey make pesin live forever.”
Di woman ask am, “Oga God, yu nor get bucket and di well deep well-well, where yu go fit get dat kind wota?
Yu big pass awa grand-grand papa Jakob wey give us dis well, where en family and animals dey drink from?”
Jesus ansa, “Pesin wey drink from dis wota go always dey hongry for wota.

But anybody wey go drink from di wota wey I go gi-am, nor go hongry for wota again, bikos di wota wey I go gi-am, go turn to river wey nor dey dry inside en belle and di wota go gi-am life wey nor dey end.”
Di woman kon tell am, “Oga God, give mi dis wota, so dat I nor go hongry for wota or kom here kon draw wota again.”
Jesus tell am, “Go koll yor husband, make two of una kom meet mi.”
Di woman ansa, “I nor get husband.”
Den Jesus kon tell am, “Yu tok true wen yu sey ‘I nor get husband.’
Bikos yu don marry five husband before and di man wey yu dey stay with naw, nor bi yor real husband. Na true yu tok.”
Di woman kon tell am, “Oga God, I si sey yu bi profet wey dey tok wetin go happen.
Awa papa dem serve God for dis mountin, but una kon tok sey, di place wey pipol suppose to woship God, na Jerusalem e dey.”
Jesus kon sey, “Woman, make yu bilive mi, di time dey kom, wen pipol go woship God for anywhere wey dem dey, nor bi only for dis mountin or for Jerusalem.
Una dey serve wetin una nor know, but wi dey serve wetin wi know, bikos na Jew pipol, naim God first koll to ensef.
But di time dey kom and e don even rish, wen di pipol wey won really serve God, go serve am for di true way, wey God Spirit go show dem.
God na Spirit and di pipol wey won serve am, must serve am for di true way wey God Spirit go show dem.”
Di woman ansa, “I know sey di Mezaya (di one wey dem dey koll Christ), wey go save evribody, go kom and anytime wen e kom, e go tell us evritin.”
Jesus kon tell am, “Na mi wey dey tok to yu so, bi di Mezaya.”
Wen Jesus dey tok to di woman, en disciples kon kom back. Dem sopraiz sey e dey tok with one woman, but dem nor fit ask am, “Wetin e wont?” or “Why e dey tok to di woman?”
By dis time, di woman don leave en pot wey e take kom draw wota kon run go inside di town go tell pipol sey,
“Make una kom si one man wey tell mi all di tins wey I don do. Dis man nor bi di Mezaya so?”
So di pipol kom out for di town go meet Jesus.
By dis time, di disciples kon beg am, “Tisha, make yu chop sometin naw.”
But e tell dem, “I get food wey I go chop wey una nor know about.”
Di disciples kon dey ask demsef, “Abi somebody don bring sometin for am to chop wen wi nor dey here?”
Jesus kon tell dem, “My food na to do wetin my Papa tok and make I finish di work wey E send mi.
Nor bi una dey tok sey, ‘Na for monts remain before dem go plok fruit wey dem plant for farm?’ Make una look round and una go si sey fruit don ripe rish to plok.
God go reward di pesin wey plok plenty fruit from wetin odas plant and e go get life wey nor dey end. So, di pesin wey plant and di pesin wey plok wetin dem plant, go happy togeda.
Dis one show sey, di tin wey pipol dey tok sey, ‘One pesin plant and anoda pesin plok di fruit’, na true word.
I send una go plok wetin una nor plant. Oda pipol don sofa plant dem, but una kon enjoy wetin dem sofa for.”
By dis time, many pipol from Samaria town kon bilive am, bikos of di tins wey di woman tok, “E tell mi all di tins wey I don do.”
Wen Samaria pipol kom meet am, dem kon dey beg am sey, make e stay with dem. So e kon stay der for two days,
and bikos of wetin e tok, many pipol kon bilive am.
Den dem kon tell di woman, “Nor bi wetin yu tell us make us bilive, but bikos wi don take awa own ear hear and wi don know sey, dis pesin true-true, na-im go save all di pipol wey dey dis world.”
Wen two days pass, Jesus komot from der go Galilee.
(Bikos Jesus don tok am sey, “Pesin wey bi profet nor dey get respet for en home-town”).
Wen e rish Galilee, di pipol wey dey der kon welkom am, bikos dem don si all di tins wey e do for Jerusalem for di time wen dem dey do Passova Feast.
Again, e go Kana wey dey Galilee, for where e first turn wota to wine. For Kapanaum, one soja-man wey dey work for di king palis dey der and en pikin wey nor well.
Wen e hear sey Jesus don kom back to Galilee, e go meet am kon beg am sey make e kom heal en pikin wey won die.
So Jesus ask am, “If una nor si signs and wonders una nor go bilive mi?”
Di man ansa, “Oga God, abeg make yu kom before my pikin go die.”
Jesus kon tell am, “Make yu go house, yor pikin nor go die.”
Di man bilive wetin Jesus tell am, so e kon komot go en house.
Wen e don near house, en savants kon meet, tell am sey, “Yor pikin don well, e nor die.”
So, e ask dem di time wen di pikin bigin dey betta. Dem kon tell am, “Na yestiday for one oklok for aftanoon naim e well.”
Bikos of wetin dem tok, di pikin papa kon remember sey dat na di time wen Jesus tell am sey, “Yor pikin nor go die.” Bikos of dis, di man and evribody wey dey en house kon bilive Jesus.
Dis na di sekond mirakle wey Jesus do for Galilee, afta e kom back from Judea.
Jesus kon go one feast wey dem dey do for Jerusalem.
One pool dey der wey near di Sheep Gate, di name na Betsaida for Aramaik language. Na five roads pipol take dey enter inside.
Pipol wey nor well, wey blind and doz wey nor fit waka dey liedan for di difren roads.
From time to time, one angel dey kom shake di wota and anybody wey first enter di wota afta di angel don shake am, go well.
One man dey der wey nor fit waka for thirty-eight years.
Wen Jesus si am liedan for der, e kon know sey di man neva fit waka for long time. So, Jesus kon ask am, “Yu won waka?”
Di man ansa am, “Oga God, I nor get anybody wey go put mi inside di pool wen di wota dey shake. Anytime I dey try to enter di wota, anoda pesin go kwik enter before I rish der.”
Jesus tell am, “Make yu get up! Karry yor mat make yu bigin waka.”
At wons, di man get up, karry en mat kon bigin waka. (Dat day na Sabat).
Den di Jew oga dem kon tell di man wey dey waka naw sey, “Today na Sabat, yu nor suppose to karry yor mat dey waka.”
Naim e ansa dem, “Di man wey make mi well, tell mi sey, ‘Make I karry my mat and make I bigin waka.’ ”
Dem kon ask am, “Who bi di man wey sey, ‘Make yu karry yor mat, make yu dey waka?’ ”
But di man nor know who e bi, bikos Jesus don komot der and plenty pipol dey for dat place.
Afta dis, Jesus kon si di man inside di temple. So e kon tell am, “Look, yu don well naw, make yu nor kommit sin again, oda-wise, di tin wey bad pass wetin do yu before, go happen to yu.”
Di man kon go tell di Jew oga dem sey, “Na Jesus bi di pesin wey make mi well.”
Bikos Jesus dey do all dis tins for Sabat Day, di Jew oga dem kon dey make trobol with am.
So e tell dem, “My Papa dey work evritime and na so mi too dey work.”
Bikos of dis, di Jew oga dem kon dey try to kill-am, bikos dem sey e dey break di Sabat law and e dey koll God en papa, like sey en and God na mate.
Naim Jesus ansa dem, “Make I tell una true word, di Pikin nor fit do anytin with en own mind, escept di tins wey e si en Papa dey do. And na anytin wey e si en Papa dey do, naim e dey do too.
Bikos di Papa get strong love for en pikin, e dey always show am evritin wey e dey do and e go show am plenty tins wey pass dis one and una go sopraiz.
As di Papa get pawa to take wake pesin wey don die, na so too di pikin get pawa to give life to anybody wey en won give.
Di Papa nor dey judge anybody, but e don give en pikin pawa to judge evribody,
so dat evribody go bow down for di pikin as dem dey bow down for di Papa. If anybody nor bow show respet for di pikin, e nor go get di mind to respet di Papa wey send di pikin kom.
“I tell una true word, di pesin wey take wetin I tok and bilive sey na di Papa send mi, go get life wey nor dey end and e nor go enter hell-fire, but e go get life wey nor dey end.
I tell una true word, di time dey kom and e don even rish groun naw, wen doz wey don die go hear Man Pikin vois and wen dem hear am, dem go wake-up and dem nor go die again.
Bikos as di Papa get life for inside am, na so e give en pikin life too.
Di Papa don give en pikin di pawa to judge pipol.
“So, make dis word nor sopraiz una, bikos di time dey kom, wen all doz wey dey inside grave go hear di pikin vois,
and di angels go kon separate di pipol wey do good tins, so dat dem go enter life wey nor dey end, but God go kondemn di pipol wey dey do bad tins.

I nor go fit do anytin with my own pawa, but na wetin I dey hear from my Papa, naim I dey use take judge. Any judgement wey I give, na true one, bikos I nor dey do my own tin, but I only dey do as my Papa send mi.
“If I tok about mysef, e fit bi sey wetin I tok nor bi true”,
bikos anoda pesin dey wey go tok about mi and I know sey wetin e tok about mi, na true.
“Una don send message go meet John and e don tell una true word.
(I nor dey trust wetin pipol tok, but I dey tell una dis word make God for save una.)
John lite shine well-well for small time and una happy wen una si en lite.”
But I get pesin wey go bear witness about mi wey big pass John, bikos di work wey my Papa give mi make I do, naim I dey do so; so di work dey bear witness sey, na my Papa send mi.
And my Papa wey send mi, en ensef don bear witness about mi. Una neva hear my Papa vois or si am before.
En word neva still dey inside una, bikos una nor bilive sey na-im send mi.
Una dey read God word well-well, bikos una bilive sey na wetin una read, go give una life wey nor dey end and na dis same word dey tok about mi,
but una nor ready to kom meet mi, so dat una go get life wey nor dey end.
“I nor like make pipol dey praiz mi,
bikos I know sey, una nor love God for inside una heart.
I kom with my Papa name and una nor gri asept mi, but if anoda pesin kom with en own name, una go asept am.
How una go fit bilive wen una dey praiz each oda and una nor kare for di praiz wey only God fit give.
“Make una nor tink sey I go akuiz una before my Papa. Di tin wey go stand against una na di law wey Moses rite, wey una dey put hope for.
If una bilive wetin Moses rite for di law, una suppose to bilive mi too, bikos na mi e rite about.
But if una nor bilive wetin Moses rite, how una go take bilive wetin I dey tell una naw?”
Wen Jesus don tok finish, e kon cross go Tiberias wey dey di oda side for Galilee wotaside.
Plenty pipol follow am, bikos dem si wen e heal pipol wey nor well.
Jesus komot for der go di mountin side kon sidan der with en disciples.
(Dat time, Passova Feast don rish.)
Wen Jesus look up, e si plenty pipol dey kom meet am. Den e ask Filip, “Na where wi go fit si bread buy wey all dis pipol go chop?”
Jesus tok dis one make e for si wetin Filip go do, bikos en ensef know wetin e won do.
Filip ansa, “Even if wi buy bread wey rish two hundred silva koins and if dem share am small-small, e nor go rish evribody chop.”
Anoda disciple wey en name bi Andru, wey bi Simon Pita broda kon tell Jesus sey,
“One boy dey here wey get five bread and two fish, but dis one nor go rish dis plenty pipol chop at-all!”
Jesus ansa, “Tell all di pipol make dem sidan” (as plenty grass dey di place wey dem go fit sidan put). Di men wey sidan, rish 5,000.
Jesus take di bread kon tank God. Den e divide am give di pipol wey sidan. E do di same tin with di fish. All of dem chop as dem wont kon beleful well-well.
Wen evribody don beleful, Jesus kon tell en disciples, “Make una gada wetin remain, make anytin nor waste.”
Wen dem gada wetin dem chop remain for di five bread, e full twelf basket.
So wen di pipol si di mirakle wey Jesus do, dem kon dey tok among demsef sey, “True-true, dis man na di profet wey God send kom dis world.”
Since Jesus know sey dem go won take am by force go make am dia king, only en kon komot go on-top di mountin alone.
Wen evening rish, en disciples kon go wotaside go wait am,
dem enter one kenu, cross go Kapanaum (by dis time, evriwhere don dey dark and Jesus neva kom meet dem.)
Den strong breeze bigin blow and di river kon dey rof well-well.
Wen dem don padol di kenu go rish about three or for mile, dem si Jesus dey waka on-top di wota dey kom near dem. Fear kon katch dem well-well.
Jesus tell dem, “Na mi, make una nor fear.”
As dem dey try make e enter inside di kenu, dem kon si sey di kenu don rish where dem dey go.
Wen day don break, di pipol wey dey di oda side for di river know sey na only one small kenu dey der. Dem still know sey Jesus enter di kenu with dem.
So some kenu wey kom from Tiberias kon rish di wotaside near di place wey dem for chop bread, afta Jesus don pray.
So wen di pipol si sey Jesus and en disciples nor dey der, dem enter di kenu kon go look for Jesus for anoda town wey dem dey koll Kapanaum.
Wen dem si Jesus for di oda side for di river, dem ask am, “Tisha, wish time yu kom here?”
Jesus ansa dem, “Make I tell una true word, na bikos of di bread wey una chop naim make una dey find mi, nor bi bikos of di mirakles wey una si.
Make una nor work for food wey nor dey last, but for food wey go give una life wey nor dey end and dat kind food, na only Man Pikin go fit give una, bikos na-im God send kom.”
Dem kon ask am, “Wetin wi go do to make God happy with us?”
Jesus ansa, “God wont sey make una bilive di pesin wey E send.”
Dem still ask Jesus, “Wish kind mirakle yu go do make wi si, make wi for bilive yu?
Awa grand-grand papa dem chop manna for wildaness as dem rite for God word sey, ‘God give dem bread from heaven to chop.’ ”
Den Jesus tell dem, “Make I tell una true word, nor bi Moses give una bread from heaven, but God, wey bi my Papa, na-im give una di true bread from heaven.
God bread na di pesin wey kom down from heaven kon give betta life to di pipol wey dey dis world.”
So dem tell am, “Oga God, from naw go, make yu give us dis bread.”
Jesus kon tell dem, “Na mi bi di bread wey dey give life. Pesin wey kom meet mi nor go hongry lie-lie and di pesin wey bilive mi, nor go hongry for wota again.
As I don tell una, una dey si mi, but una nor bilive.
Anybody wey my Papa give mi, go kom meet mi and wen e kom, I nor go ever drive am.
Nor bi to do wetin I wont make mi kom down from heaven, but na to do wetin my Papa wont.
Wetin my Papa wey send mi wont, na make I nor luz anybody wey e give mi, but make I for take dem go up for di last day.
Wetin my Papa wont bi sey, anybody wey bilive en pikin, go get life wey nor dey end and I go wake am up for di last day.”
Den di Jew pipol bigin vex and komplain about Jesus, bikos e tok sey, “Na mi bi di bread wey kom down from heaven.”
Den dem sey, “Dis Jesus sef nor bi Josef pikin, wey wi know en papa and mama? Na how e kon dey tok sey, ‘I kom down from heaven?’ ”
Jesus ansa, “Make una nor komplain about mi give each oda.
Nobody go fit kom meet mi with en own pawa, unless my Papa wey send mi draw am kom meet mi and I go take am go up for di last day.
Na so di profets rite sey, ‘God go tish evribody.’ Anybody wey hear wetin my Papa tok, go kom meet mi.
(Nor bi sey anybody don si di Papa before, escept mi wey kom from heaven).
I dey tell una true word, anybody wey bilive mi, don get life wey nor dey end.
Na mi bi di bread wey dey give pesin life.
Una grand-grand papa dem chop manna for wildaness, but dem still die.
Dis na di bread wey kom from heaven, so dat anybody wey chop am, go get life wey nor dey end.
Na mi bi di bread wey kom down from heaven. Anybody wey chop dis bread go live forever. Na my flesh bi di bread wey I go give di pipol wey dey for dis world.”
Den di Jew pipol wey dey vex with Jesus kon bigin dey argue with one anoda dey sey, “How dis man go give us en flesh make wi chop?”
Jesus tell dem, “I dey tell una true word, unless una chop Man Pikin flesh and drink en blood, una nor go get life for inside una.
Di pesin wey go chop my flesh and drink my blood, don get life wey nor dey end and I go take am up for di last day.
My flesh na di real food and my blood na di korrect drink.
Di pesin wey chop my flesh and drink my blood, go stay inside mi and I go dey inside am too.
Na my Papa wey dey for heaven send mi and as I dey for dis life bikos of am, na so di pesin wey chop my flesh go get life, bikos of mi.
Dis na di bread wey kom down from heaven, e nor bi like di bread wey una grand-grand papa dem chop and afta, dem still die. Di pesin wey go chop dis bread nor go ever die, but e go live forever.”
Jesus tok dis tins wen e dey tish dem for inside di temple for Kapanaum.
Wen Jesus many disciples hear wetin e tok, dem kon sey, “Dis tin wey Jesus dey tok so hard well-well o-o! Na who go fit undastand dem?”
Wen Jesus know sey en disciples dey komplain about wetin e tok, e kon ask dem, “Wetin I tok so dey make una vex too?
Wetin go happen if una si Man Pikin go back to heaven where e dey before?
Na di Spirit go fit give pesin life; human being pawa nor fit do am. All dis word wey I dey tell una so, dem bi Spirit and dem dey give pesin life.
But some of una nor bilive.” (From biginnin, Jesus don know di pipol wey nor go bilive and di pesin wey go sell am give en enemy.)
So Jesus kon sey, “Na bikos of dis I tell una sey, nobody go fit kom meet mi with en own pawa, unless my Papa let am kom.”
Afta dis, Jesus many disciples kon stop to follow am.
Den Jesus ask en twelf disciples, “Una won go too?”
Den Simon Pita ansa am, “Oga God, na who wi go kon go meet? Na yu get di word wey dey give pipol di life wey nor dey end.
Wi don bilive and know sey, ‘Na yu bi di Holy One wey God send kom meet us.’ ”
Jesus ansa, “Nor bi twelf of una I choose? But one pesin among una na devil pikin.”
(E tok dis one about Judas, wey bi Simon Iskariot pikin, bikos na dis Judas, wey bi one among en twelf disciples, naim go sell am give en enemy.)
Afta, Jesus kon travel go evriwhere for Galilee. Den e komot for Judea, bikos di Jew oga dem won kill-am.
Di time kon rish wen Jew pipol dey do dia feast wey dem dey koll Tabanako Feast.
Jesus brodas kon dey tell am, “Komot for here go Judea, make yor disciples si di mirakles wey yu dey do.
Bikos anybody wey wont make pipol sabi who e bi, nor go do anytin for korna. Since yu dey do dis tins, e good sey make yu show yorsef to evribody.”
(Even en brodas nor bilive wetin Jesus dey do.)
Jesus ansa dem, “Time neva rish for mi to go, but una fit go anytime una like.
Pipol like una, but dem nor like mi, bikos I dey tell dem sey wetin dem dey do nor good.
Make una go di feast, I nor go-go, bikos my time neva rish.”
Afta e don tok finish, e kon stay for Galilee.
But wen en brodas don go di feast, Jesus kon go der too, but e nor let anybody know sey e dey der.
Di Jew oga dem kon dey ask pipol, “Where e dey?”
Dem kon dey tok among demsef. Some sey, “Jesus na good pesin”, but odas sey, “E dey play pipol wayo.”
But nobody fit tok out, bikos dem dey fear di Jew oga dem.
Wen di feast don rish half, Jesus enter di temple kon dey tish.
Di Jew oga dem sopraiz and dem kon dey sey, “How e take know dis tins wey e dey tish so, as e bi sey e nor go skool at-all?”
Jesus ansa dem, “Wetin I dey tish nor bi my own, but na di Pesin wey send mi, na-im give mi.
Anybody wey ready to do wetin God wont, di pesin go know weda wetin I dey tish na from God or na my own.
Anybody wey dey tok with en own pawa, go wont make pipol praiz am, but di pesin wey won honor who send am, naim dey do wetin korrect and sin nor dey inside am.
Moses nor give una di law? But una nor gri obey am. Why e bi sey una won kill misef?”
Di pipol ansa Jesus, “Demon don enter yor body! Who won kill yu?”
Den Jesus ansa, “Na one mirakle wey I do so, make una dey sopraiz?
Na true sey Moses tell una to sekonsaiz una son, (nor bi Moses start am, na from Abraham time e start) and una dey sekonsaiz una son for Sabat Day.
Since una dey sekonsaiz for Sabat Day so dat una nor go break Moses Law, why una dey vex with mi, bikos I heal dis sick man for Sabat Day?
Make una nor dey judge pesin, bikos of wetin una si with una eye, but make una give korrect judgement as e suppose to bi.”
Some pipol wey dey stay for Jerusalem kon dey sey, “Dis nor bi di man wey dem won kill?
Naim dey here dey tok for publik so and dem nor fit tell am anytin. Abi di oga dem don gri sey naim bi di Christ?
Wisef know di place where dis man from kom and wi know sey anytime wey Christ go kom, nobody go fit know where e go kom from.”
As Jesus dey tish for di temple, e kon shaut sey, “Una know mi and di place wey I from kom, nor bi my pawa I take kom, na God wey send mi naim bi di korrect Pesin. But una nor know am.
But I know am well-well, bikos na from am, I kom and naim send mi.”
Dem kon try to katch Jesus, but nobody fit tosh am, bikos en time neva rish.
Many pipol for der bilive am kon sey, “Anytime di pesin wey bi di Christ kom, e go fit do mirakle wey pass wetin dis one dey do so?”
Wen di Farisee pipol hear pipol dey tok about Jesus, dia oga and di priests kon send sojas go arrest am.
Jesus kon tell dem, “I go only stay with una for small time and afta, I go-go meet di Pesin wey send mi.
Una go dey look for mi, but una nor go si mi and una nor go fit kom meet mi for where I dey.”
Den di Jew oga dem kon dey ask each oda, “Where e won go wey wi nor go fit si am, abi e won go tish Jew pipol wey dey stay with Greek pipol?
Wetin e mean wen e tok sey, ‘Una go look for mi, but una nor go si mi and where I dey, una nor go fit kom der?’ ”
For di last day for di feast, wey bi di biggest day, Jesus stand kon shaut, “If wota dey hongry anybody, make e kom meet mi.
Di pesin wey bilive mi and wetin I tok, make e kom drink, just as God word sey, ‘Plenty wota wey dey give life, go flow from inside en belle.’ ”
(E tok dis tin about di Spirit wey di pipol wey bilive am go get, bikos by dis time, God neva give en Spirit to pipol, bikos E neva honor Jesus Christ.)
Wen pipol hear wetin e tok, some for dem kon sey, “True-true, dis man naim bi di Profet!”
Some still sey, “Na-im bi di Christ”, but odas sey, “Na lie, Christ nor fit kom from Galilee.
Abi God word nor sey, ‘Christ go kom from David family wey dey Betlehem, di village wey David from kom?’ ”
So di pipol kon divide bikos of Jesus.
Some of dem kon dey try to katch am, but nobody fit take hand tosh am.
Wen di sojas go back, di priest oga dem and Farisee pipol kon ask dem, “Why una nor katch Jesus kom?”
Di sojas ansa, “Wi neva si anybody wey tok like dis man before!”
Den di Farisee pipol kon ask di sojas, “Abi, e don deceive una too?
Abi any of us wey bi Farisee pipol or priests don bilive Jesus?
Curse dey dis pipol head, bikos dem nor know di law.”
Den one man wey en name bi Nikodimos, wey don first go meet Jesus and wey bi one of di big oga dem kon sey,
“Awa law nor dey kondemn pesin unless wi don hear wetin di pesin tok or si wetin e dey do, abi nor bi so?”
Dem kon ask am, “Abi na Galilee yu too from kom? If yu look well, yu go si sey know profet go fit kom from Galilee.”
Afta dis, evribody bigin go en house.
Den Jesus waka enter Mount Olives.
For early morning, e enter di temple. Plenty pipol gada for der and e kon sidan dey tish dem.
Di pipol wey sabi di law and di Farisee pipol kon bring one woman wey dem katch sey e sleep with man wey nor bi en husband. Dem kon make am stand for dia front,
den dem tell Jesus, “Tisha, wi katch dis woman wen e dey sleep with one man wey nor bi en husband.
Moses Law sey, ‘Make dem stone dis kind woman die.’ Wetin yu get to tok for dis matter?”
(Dem ask am dis kweshon to set trap for am, make dem for fit katch am).
But Jesus bend down kon take en finger dey rite sometin for groun.
Wen dem kontinue to dey worry am, e kon get up tell dem, “Any of una wey neva kommit sin before, make e bi di first pesin to stone dis woman.”
E kon bend down again bigin rite for groun.
Wen dem hear wetin e tok, dem kon dey komot for der one-by-one. Na di old pipol first start to komot, till e remain only Jesus and di woman wey stand for en front.
Den Jesus stand up ask am, “Madam, where di pipol wey bring yu? Nobody remain to kondemn yu?”
Di woman ansa, “Oga God, nobody remain.”
Den Jesus tell am, “Mi too nor go kondemn yu. But from naw go, make yu nor sin again.”
Den Jesus sey, “Na mi bi di lite wey dey di world, anybody wey follow mi, nor go waka for darkness lie-lie, but e go get di lite wey go gi-am life.”
Di Farisee pipol kon dey argue with am sey, “Yu dey tok about yorsef and wetin yu tok, nor bi true.”
Jesus ansa dem, “Even if I dey tok about mysef, wetin I dey tok na true, bikos I know where I from kom and where I dey go. But una nor know where I from kom or where I dey go.
Una dey judge pesin with wetin una si with una eye, but I nor dey judge pipol like dat.
But, if I sey pesin do bad, di tins wey I si and tok about, na true, as e bi sey nor bi only mi dey tok am. Na mi and my Papa wey send mi, dey tok am togeda.
God word sey, ‘Wetin two pipol bear witness about, na true.’
I dey bear witness about mysef and my Papa wey send mi, dey bear witness about mi too.”
Dem kon bigin kweshon am, “Who bi yor Papa sef?”
