Bikos even if 10,000 pipol kon tish una about Christ, na only one papa una go still get. Bikos una don turn to my pikin, wen una receive di message about Christ from mi.
So, I dey enkourage una sey, make una bi like mi.
Na to enkourage una make mi send Timoti, my son wey I like and wey love Christ kom meet una. E go tell una how I dey follow Christ and di tins wey I dey prish about Christ for evry church.
Some among una don dey karry body up, bikos una tink sey I nor go kom back again.
But if God allow mi, I go soon kom meet una. Den I go know if pipol wey dey boast, really get pawa.
Bikos God kingdom matter, nor bi about ordinary tok, but na about pawa.
Wish one una wont? Make I karry kane kom meet una, or make I kon show una di love wey di Spirit dey give pesin?
I don dey hear bad-bad tins about some of una. And una own even worse pass wetin doz wey nor know God dey do. Sotey man dey sleep with en papa wife.
And shame nor even dey katch una! Una suppose to feel bad kon drive di pesin wey do dis kind tin.
I know sey I nor dey der with una naw, but I dey with una for spirit. And I don already judge di pesin, just as I go do if I dey der.
Wen una gada togeda for awa Oga God Jesus Christ name, I dey with una for spirit and Christ pawa dey with una too.
So make una give dat pesin to Satan make e ponish am, so dat en sin go komot for en body and Christ go save am for di last day.
E nor good make una dey boast! Una nor know sey, small yist wey dem put for bread, na-im dey make di whole bread raiz?
Make una remove di old yist, den una go bi like fresh bread wey nor get yist and dat na wetin una bi. Bikos awa Passova lamb, na Christ wey dem don already sakrifice.
So wen wi dey celebrate Passova, make wi nor do am with di old yist wey bi wikedness and bad belle, but make wi do am with di fresh bread wey nor get yist, wey bi trut and betta mind.
For di leta wey I first rite give una, I sey make una nor make friend with bad pipol.
But I nor dey tok about pipol wey bad, wiked, dey serve juju and get long-trot for dis world. If to sey na dem I dey tok about, den una nid to komot for dis world.
But naw, I dey rite to una sey, pipol wey sey dem bi Christians and dem dey do bad tins, make una nor follow dem make friend. Make una nor even chop with dat kind pesin.
Wetin go make mi judge pipol wey nor dey di church? Nor bi doz wey dey inside wi suppose to judge?
Na God go judge doz wey dey outside, bikos en word sey, “Doz wey dey do wiked tins among una, make una drive dem komot from di church.”
Wen pesin nor dey gri with anoda pesin, una dey take una kase go kourt where sinnas go judge di matter, abi una dey take am go meet God pipol?
Una nor know sey na God pipol go judge di world? And if na una go judge di world, una nor fit setol small-small matter among unasef?
Una nor know sey wi go judge angels? Since na so, den wi suppose to judge di tins wey dey dis world!
So, na wetin make us dey take awa kase go give judge wey nor know God?
I dey tok like dis, so dat una go shame! So una nor get wise pesin among una wey fit judge between una wey bi Christians?
Wetin dey make una karry unasef go meet judge wey nor know God?
Wen una take unasef go kourt, dat mean sey all of una don luz.
Instead, una dey play wayo among unasef!
Una nor know sey wiked pipol nor go enter God kingdom? So make una nor fool unasef! Pipol wey dey sleep with who dem nor marry; doz wey dey serve juju; men wey dey sleep with oda men;
tif; long-trot; drunkard; doz wey dey curse pipol and doz wey dey play wayo; non of dem go enter God kingdom.
Na so some among una bi before, but naw, God don wosh una klean thru Jesus Christ name and en Spirit pawa, don make una klean for en eye.
Some among una sey, “Wi fit do anytin wey wi wont.” But I dey tell una naw sey, nor bi evritin dey good for us. So I nor go gri make anytin kontrol mi.
Una still dey sey, “Food dey good for awa body and awa body nid food.” But I dey tell una, “God go distroy di two of dem.” So make wi nor use awa body take do yeye tins.
God go raiz us from deat with di same pawa wey E use take raiz Jesus.
Una nor know sey una body na part for Christ body? So e dey good make wi put awa body for ashawo work? God forbid!
Una nor know sey, pesin wey dey sleep anyhow with oda pipol, don bi part for di pipol body?
So anybody wey join Christ, don get one spirit with am.
Make una nor live ashawo life. Evry oda sin wey man dey kommit na for outside en body, but di pesin wey dey do ashawo, dey sin against en own body.
Abi una nor know sey una body na di temple wey di Holy Spirit dey stay? So, nor bi una get unasef.
God don pay betta prize for una, so make una honor am with una body.
Naw I go ansa di kweshon wey una ask for una leta. Una ask sey, “E dey good make pesin nor marry?”
But make una nor for dey do ashawo, e betta make una marry.
Make husband and wife do di rite tin wey dem suppose do for one anoda.
Nor bi di wife get en own body, but na di husband get am and na so too di wife get en husband body.
Make una nor refuse each oda, escept una gri sey una go dey like dat for sometaim, so dat una go fit pray. Den Satan nor go fit tempt una, bikos una go fit kontrol una body.
Na advise I dey give una, nor bi kommand.
How I wish sey all of una bi like mi. But di gift wey God give us nor bi di same.
Dis na di advise wey I go tell di pesin wey neva marry and doz wey dia husband or wife don die; make una dey as una dey, just as I bi.
But if dem nor fit kontrol demsef, make dem marry, bikos e betta make pesin marry, dan make e dey tink bad tin for en mind.
Na doz wey don marry I won give dis kommand to (Nor bi mi, but na God): Make wife nor leave en husband,
but if e leave am, make e nor marry again or make e go back go setol with di man. And make husband nor leave en wife too.

Even doh I dey tok on my own, I nor tink sey God go tok anytin difren from wetin I dey tell una about marriage. Di only tin wey I fit do na to give una my advise. If yor wife nor dey follow Christ, but e sey e go follow yu stay, make yu nor drive am.
If yor husband nor dey follow Christ, but e sey e go follow yu stay, make yu nor run leave am.
Bikos di husband wey nor bilive, God go save am, bikos of en wife wey bilive and di wife wey nor bilive, God go save am, bikos of en husband wey bilive.
But if di one wey nor bilive komot from di marriage, make e bi like dat. For dis kind kase, di broda or sista wey bilive, don dey free; bikos God wont make wi enjoy peace.
Yu wife! How yu take know sey yu nor go fit save yor husband? Yu husband! How yu take know sey yu nor go fit save yor wife?
For evry church, I dey tell di pipol sey make dem remain as dem bi wen Oga God Jesus choose and koll dem to bi en own. Naw, na di same tin I dey tell una so.
If yu don already sekonsaiz, make yu dey like dat. If dem neva sekonsaiz yu, make yu nor sekonsaiz.
Weda dem sekonsaiz yu or not, nor mean anytin. Wetin dey important, na to obey God law.
So make una nor try to shange as una bi wen God choose una.
If God koll yu wen yu bi slave, make yu nor let am worry yu. But if yu fit get yor freedom, make yu get am.
Slave wey God choose make e follow Jesus, don bikom free man thru Jesus Christ. So free man wey God choose make e follow Jesus, don turn to Christ savant.
God pay big prize for una, so make una nor bi slave to any oda pesin.
Make una stay as una bi wen God choose and koll una.
Koncerning pipol wey neva marry before, I nor get any kommand from Christ to give una, but I go advise una as pesin wey una fit trust, bikos God dey show mi mesi.
Dis time wey wi dey nor eazy at-all and wetin I tink bi sey, e go good make una stay as una bi naw.
If yu don marry, nor leave yor marriage. If yu neva marry, make yu nor worry yorsef about am.
If pesin wey neva marry before kon marry, e nor sin. But, pipol wey don marry go face plenty wahala and I dey try to help una, so dat una nor go face dat kind wahala.
My friends, wetin I mean bi sey Christ go soon kom and e nor matter if yu don marry or not.
If yu dey kry or laf; dey buy sometin or yu nor get money, all na di same tin.
E nor go make any difrence even if yu get all di tins for dis world or sey yu like di world well-well, bikos as wi know, di world go soon vanish komot.
And I nor wont make anytin trobol una. Man wey neva marry, make e dey do tins wey go make Christ happy for am.
But man wey don marry get plenty tins to worry about. E go must worry about tins for dis world, bikos e go wont make belle dey sweet en wife,

so e go dey tink about difren tins. Woman wey neva marry dey only tink of how to make belle sweet Christ. Dat time, dia body and mind dey pure. But woman wey don marry dey worry about dis world tins, bikos e wont make belle sweet en husband.
Wetin I dey tok na for una own good, nor bi to make una slave. I wont help una to dey live betta life and to love Christ pass any oda tin.
But if yu get patina and yu nor fit kontrol yorsef, den make yu go marry. Nor-tin dey bad for dat one.
But e betta, if yu fit kontrol yor body sey yu nor won marry naw.
E dey rite and okay to marry, but e betta sey yu nor marry at-all.
Wife suppose to stay with en husband until di man die. Den e fit go marry again, but di new husband must bi pesin wey dey follow Christ.
But I bilive sey, I dey obey God Spirit wen I sey make di woman nor marry, so dat e go dey happy well-well.
For di leta wey una rite, una ask mi about juju food. And all of us know sometin koncerning dis matter. But if wetin wi know, dey make us dey proud, den bikos of love, wi suppose help one anoda.
Di man wey tink sey e know sometin, neva still know as e suppose know.
But God know di pesin wey love am.
So, even if pipol dey offa food give juju, all of us know sey di juju dem nor get life, bikos na only one God dey.
Dem dey koll many tins for heaven and eart, “gods and mastas,” but non of dem really bi god or masta.

But wi (wey bi Christian), na only one God wi get and naim bi awa Papa. Na-im kreate evritin and wi dey live for am. Na Jesus Christ bi awa only Oga God. Na-im make evritin and na thru am wi get life.
Nor bi evribody know dis tins. Some pipol don grow with di bilive sey juju dey alive. So wen dem dey chop meat wey dem give juju, dem go dey fear.
But wi know sey food nor fit bring us klose to God. Wi nor go luz anytin if wi nor chop or sey wi gain anytin if wi chop.
But make una dey kareful, so dat weak pesin among una nor go fall bikos una don dey free to chop anytin.
Bikos if weak pesin si yu wey know di word dey chop juju food, e go fit join yu chop di food wey dem sakrifice give juju.
Den wetin yu know don distroy pesin wey Christ die for.
If yu sin against yor brodas or sistas wey nor get strong heart and faith, yu don sin against Christ.
So, if food wey I dey chop go wound pesin wey dey follow Christ, I nor go ever chop meat again, so dat my brodas and sistas nor go sin.
I nor dey free? I nor bi apostle? Abi I neva si awa Oga God Jesus? Nor bi una dey show di work wey I don do?
If I nor bi apostle to oda pipol, at least I bi apostle to una, bikos na una bi di sign wey show sey I bi Jesus Christ apostle.
Wen pipol ask mi kweshon, I dey tell dem sey,
mi and Banabas fit chop and drink wetin wi like,
abi wi nor get rite to marry biliver for Christ?
Na only wi must work before wi go chop?
E get any soja wey dey pay ensef salari? Abi who plant vegitabol, nor dey chop for inside? Or who dey keep sheep nor dey drink from dia milk?
Una tink sey na only kommon sense I take dey tok all dis tins? Abi una don forget sey di law tok like dis too?
Moses sey, “Make una allow animal wey grind korn chop from wetin e dey grind.” So, una tink sey na di melu God dey worry for?
No! Na wi God dey tok about. Dem rite all dis tins for di law, so dat evribody wey work, go fit chop for harvest time.
So if wi don plant spiritual seed among una, e go dey too mush if wi ask for ordinary food and drink from una?
If odas dey do like dis, dat mean sey wi even get betta rite to do like dat too. But, wi dey bear evritin, so dat wi nor go kause trobol for Christ message.
Una nor know sey doz wey dey work for di temple dey chop food wey pipol bring kon give God for der? Abi una nor know sey pesin wey dey serve for altar na from der e for dey chop?
Na so too God kommand sey, doz wey dey prish di gospel, go chop thru di gospel wey dem dey prish.
But I nor dey use all dis rite and I nor dey rite dis tins so dat pesin go give mi sometin. E betta make I die, dan make anybody kon make mi stop to dey tok like dis.
Bikos if I dey prish di gospel, I nor get any rizin to boast, bikos I nor fit do any oda tin dan to dey prish di gospel! Na wahala for mi, if I nor prish di gospel!
If I prish bikos I wont prish, dem go pay mi, but even if I nor wont prish, di prishin na wetin God send mi kom do.
Wetin kon bi my gain? Na to prish di gospel without pay or na to use di rite wey I get, bikos I dey prish di gospel?
I nor bi anybody savant. But I don turn savant to evribody, so dat I go fit win many pipol for Christ.

Wen I dey with Jew pipol, I dey live like dem, so dat I go win dem for Christ. Na Moses Law dem dey follow, but I nor dey follow dat one. But I dey live as di law tok, so dat I go win souls kom meet Christ.
And wen I dey with pipol wey nor dey live by di law, I nor dey use di law for dem, so dat I go fit win dem. But dat nor mean sey, I go forget God law, bikos na Christ law dey rule mi.
Wen I dey with pipol wey get weak faith, I dey live as dem dey live, so dat I go fit win dem. I dey do evritin wey I fit do, so dat I go fit win evribody wey I fit win, kom meet Christ.
Na di gospel make mi dey do all dis tins, so dat I go fit share for di blessings.
Una nor know sey, wen pipol dey run, na only one pesin go win di race and di prize? So make una run, so dat una go fit win!
Pipol wey dey run, dey train well-well, so dat dem go win crown wey nor dey last, but wi dey run for crown wey go last forever.
So I nor dey run for nor-tin and I nor dey follow breeze fight.
Instead, I dey kontrol my body kon make am my slave, so dat afta I don prish di Good News give odas, God nor go rijet mi.
My brodas, I wont make una remember wetin happen to awa papa dem wey follow Moses. God kloud protet dem as dem dey waka pass di Red Sea.
Na der dem for baptize dem wen dem dey follow Moses wey bi God savant.
All of dem chop and drink di same spiritual
bread and milk. Dem drink from di spiritual Rock wey follow dem go and dat Rock, na Jesus Christ.
But den, God nor dey happy with some among dem, so many of dem kon die for inside wildaness.
Naw, all dis na ezample for us, so dat wi nor go do bad tins as dem do,
or woship juju like some among dem. Just as God word sey, “Di pipol sidan to chop and drink, den dem kon start to play.”
Make wi nor follow ashawo life like some among dem, wey make 23,000 pipol die for one day.
So make wi nor tempt Christ as some among dem dey do before snake kon distroy dem.
Make una nor komplain like di way some for dem do before distroshon angel kon distroy dem.
Dem rite dis tins wey happen to dem to tish us lesin and na ezample for doz wey go dey wen di world go end.
So pesin wey tink sey e stand, make e take kare, if not, e go fall.
E nor get anytin wey dey happen to una naw, wey neva happen to odas before, but God dey keep en promise and E nor go allow una pass thru wetin una nor go fit bear.
So my brodas, make una run from bad tins.
I dey tok to pipol wey get sense. Make una tink about wetin I dey tok.
Wen wi drink from di Oga God Supper cup, dat mean sey wi dey share from Christ blood. Wen wi chop from di bread wey wi divide, dat mean sey wi dey share for Christ body.
Bikos wi dey chop from one bread, all of us don bi one body, even doh wi many.
Israel pipol dey chop juju food, but dem still dey share for Christ altar.
I nor dey sey juju food or di one wey dem sakrifice mean anytin.
But wetin I mean bi sey, wetin bad pipol dey sakrifice, na for demon, nor bi for God.
Yu nor fit drink from God cup and demon cup for di same time.
Abi wi dey try to make Christ vex? Wi strong pass God?
Pipol sey, wi fit do evritin. Dat na true, but nor bi evritin dey good. Wi fit do evritin, but nor bi evritin dey good for di body.
Make pesin nor dey tink for ensef alone, but for oda pipol too.
Make una mind dey okay as una dey chop any meat wey dem dey sell for market.
Bikos God word sey, “Di eart and evritin wey dey inside, na di Oga God own.”
If pesin wey nor know God invite yu kom chop for en house, make yu chop wetin e give yu, nor ask kweshon, bikos of wetin dey yor mind.
But if di pesin tell yu sey, “Dem sakrifice dis food give juju,” make yu nor chop am bikos of di pesin wey tell yu and en konscience.
I nor mean yor konscience, but di oda pesin own. So bikos of wetin anoda pesin dey tink, I nor go fit do wetin I wont do?
If I tank God for my food, wetin go make anybody fight mi bikos of di food wey I tank God for?
But anytin wey una dey do, weda una dey chop or drink, make una do am to honor God.
Live yor life so dat yu nor go kause trobol for Jew or Greek pipol or for pipol wey dey God church.
Make una dey do as I dey do; bikos I dey always try to please evribody instead of mysef, bikos I wont make God save dem.
Make una follow mi as I dey follow Christ.
I dey praiz una, bikos una always dey do di tins wey I tell una,
but I wont make una undastand sey as Christ bi evribody head, na so too husband bi head for en house and na God bi Christ head.
So any man wey dey pray or prish God message kon kover en head dey woship God, dey disgrace Christ.
And any woman wey dey pray or prish God message and e nor kover en head, dey disgrace en head, wey bi en husband; e for betta sey di woman shave en head.
If di woman nor one kover en hair, den make e go shave am.
Man nor nid to kover en head, bikos e dey show as God glory bi. But woman dey show as man glory bi;
bikos God nor kreate di man from woman, but E kreate di woman from man.
God nor kreate man bikos of woman, but E kreate woman, bikos of man.
Bikos of di angels, di woman must kover en head to show sey na en husband dey protet am.
As wi dey serve Christ, di woman and di man, dey togeda for Christ body.
Aldo God make woman from man, but na woman dey born evribody, even doh na God kreate evribody.
Make una judge by unasef weda e dey good for woman to dey prish God word wen e nor kover en head.
Wetin make pipol for di world dey sey, na disgrace for man to karry long hair?
But long hair dey make woman fine well-well. God give di woman di long hair, so dat di hair go kover di woman head.
Dis na how dem dey do tins for God church, so nobody go fit follow mi kworel for wetin I dey tok.
Di way una dey woship God, dey kause wahala pass di good wey E dey do for una. Bikos of dis, I nor go fit praiz una.
Bikos I hear sey wen una gada dey woship God for church, na so-so kworel una dey kworel and I bilive sey some for wetin I hear, na true.
Bikos if una nor kworel, wi nor go know di good ones among una.
Wen una dey togeda, nor bi di Oga God Supper una dey chop?
But before evribody go rish di meetin, some pipol among una don start to chop and drink, wen odas dey hongry.
Una nor get house wey una go for chop and drink? Abi una hate God church? Una won disgrace pipol wey nor get anytin to chop? Wetin I go fit tell una naw? I nor go fit praiz una at-all.
I don already tell una wetin awa Oga God Jesus do for di nite wen dem sell am. And na Christ tok am by ensef. E take some bread for en hand
and afta e don tank God, e divide am kon sey, “Dis na my body wey I dey give una. Make una always dey chop am to remember mi.”
Afta dem chop finish, Jesus take di cup kon sey, “Dis na my blood wey God take make new kovenant with una. Make una always dey drink am to remember mi.”
Jesus mean sey, wen una chop di bread kon drink from di cup, una dey tell odas about Christ deat until e go kom back.
Bikos of dis, anybody wey chop di bread or drink di wine anyhow wey e like, dat pesin don sin against Christ body and en blood.
So make evribody shek ensef, before e chop di bread and drink from di cup.
But if una nor undastand sey na una bi Christ body, una don already kondemn unasef with di way wey una dey chop and drink from di cup.
Na dis make many of una wey nor well, weak and some among una don even die.
But if wi judge awasef, God nor go ponish us.
But wen God judge and ponish us, E dey do am, so dat E nor go kondemn us with dis world.
My brodas and sistas, make una dey wait for evribody, before una go start to chop di Oga God Supper.
But if anybody really dey hongry, make e chop kom from en house. Den wen una dey togeda, una nor go kondemn unasef. So wen I kom, I go tell una oda tins wey una suppose know.
My friends, una bin ask mi about spiritual gifts.
I won make una remember sey, before una bigin follow Christ; na juju una dey serve.
Naw, I wont make una know sey, anybody wey God Spirit dey lead, go sey, Jesus naim bi Oga God and e nor go ever curse am.
Na many spiritual gifts God dey give pipol, but all of dem na from di same Spirit.
And wi get difren ways to serve God
and each of us dey do difren tins. But na di same God dey work for awa life and E dey help us do evritin.
Each of us get difren gift wey di Spirit give us and wi dey use am do good.
Some among us dey fit speak with wisdom and odas with knowledge, but na di same Spirit dey give us all dis gifts.
To oda pipol, di Spirit dey give dem faith or di pawa to heal sick pipol.

Di Spirit dey give odas di pawa to do mirakle and e make some pipol profets and some dey fit know wen God Spirit dey among us. Odas dey tok with difren-difren language and some among us go tell una wetin di tins wey dem dey tok, mean.
But na di same Spirit dey do all dis tins and e dey choose di kind gift wey e wont give each pesin.
Christ body get difren part like evry oda body.
Some pipol among us na Jew and odas na Gentile. Some na slave and odas dey free. But God Spirit baptize us kon make us part for Jesus Christ body. Naw, all of us dey drink from dat same Spirit.
Nor bi only one part awa body get, but dem many.
If di leg for awa body sey, “I nor bi hand, so I nor bi part for di body.” Nor bi di body di leg still dey?
And if di ear sey, “I nor bi eye, so I nor bi part for di body.” Nor bi di body di ear still dey?
If to sey di whole body na eye, wi nor for fit hear anytin and if to sey all di body na ear, wi nor for fit smell anytin.
But God don put evry part for awa body, just as E wont am.
If na only one part dey di body, den di body nor go bi as e suppose bi again.
But as e bi so, na many parts dey make one body.
So, di eye nor go fit tell di hand sey, “I nor nid yu” and di head nor go fit tell di leg sey, “I nor nid yu too.”
So, wi nor go fit do anytin with awa body without di part wey wi feel sey, e dey weak.
Di part wey wi tink sey dey important, wi dey trit dem with respet and di part wey nor really dey outside, wi dey trit dem well.
But awa body nor nid all dis treatment. Bikos na God make awa body, so di part wey wi fit sey nor dey important, dey important well-well.
God do am like dis, so dat all di parts for di body go dey work togeda and each part go dey kare for oda part.
If one part dey sofa, di oda parts dey sofa too. But if dem praiz one part, di oda parts go dey happy.
All of una dey Christ body. And each of una, na part for di body.

So for di church, God first choose apostles, before profets and tishas. E still choose some wey dey do mirakle, odas wey dey heal sick pipol, some wey bi leaders and odas wey dey tok with difren-difren language.
Nor bi evribody bi apostle. Nor bi evribody bi tisha. Nor bi evribody fit do mirakle.
Nor bi evribody fit heal sick pipol. Nor bi evribody fit tok wetin dis language mean.
But I wont make una ask for di gift wey betta pass, so dat I go show una di way wey betta pass all dis tins.
If I dey tok di language wey human being and angels dey tok;
if I dey profesai and fit undastand evry sekret and knowledge or if I get faith wey fit move mountins and I nor love oda pipol, I go bi nor-tin.
If I give pipol evritin wey I get kon sey make dem burn mi alive, but I nor love odas, I nor go gain anytin.
Love dey kind and patient, e nor dey jealous or boast
or dey proud. Love nor get long-trot or dey vex. E nor dey remember di bad tins wey odas do.
E nor dey happy with wiked pipol, but e dey happy with di trut.
Love dey bear evritin and e get faith, hope and patient.
Love nor dey fail and e go dey forever. Pipol nor go profesai forever and doz wey dey tok with difren-difren language, go stop. For dat time, wi go forget evritin wey wi know.
Naw, wi nor know evritin and awa profesy nor komplete.
But one day, wetin dey pafet go kom and wetin nor dey pafet, go vanish.
Wen wi neva know Christ, wi dey tink and tok like small shidren. But naw wen wi don know am, wi nor dey do like small shidren again.
Evritin wey wi dey si naw bi like ordinary image for mirror; but for dat time, wi go si am, face-to-face. Naw wi nor know evritin, but den wi go know, just as God really know us.
And naw wi get faith, hope and love. But di one wey big pass for di three, na love.
Na love suppose guide una. So make una dey fight to get di gift wey di Holy Spirit dey give, especially di gift to profesai.

Bikos if una dey tok with difren-difren language wey odas nor undastand, God go undastand wetin una dey tok, aldo know oda pesin go know wetin e mean. Tins wey una go dey tok about, na only di Spirit go fit undastand dem.
But wen una profesai, pipol go undastand una and odas go help una. Dem go get konfort kon dey okay.
Pesin wey dey tok with difren language, dey help ensef. But di one wey dey profesai, dey help di church.

I for like make all of una dey tok with difren language, but I wont make una dey profesai. Bikos profesy go do una more good, dan sey una dey tok with difren language wey pipol nor fit undastand, unless somebody esplain di meaning give di pipol for di church.

My brodas and sistas, wetin una go gain if wen I kom, I dey tok with difren language wey una nor undastand and I nor esplain am? How I go fit help una den, unless I tell una wetin God tell mi or make una know wetin dem profesai and tish?
If all music instrument get di same sound, how una go take know di one wey bi trumpet or harp?
If trumpet make sound wey pipol nor undastand, who go dey ready to go fight war?
Na so e bi wen una dey tok with difren-difren language wey pipol nor undastand. If nobody fit undastand wetin una dey tok about, dat mean sey na breeze una dey follow tok.
Dis world get difren language and all of dem dey good.
But if odas nor undastand wetin una tok, den dem go bi like strenjas to una.
Na so e bi with una too. If una really wont di gift wey di Spirit dey give, make una choose di one wey di church go gain from.
So wen wi tok with difren-difren language wey odas nor undastand, make wi pray make God give us di pawa to esplain wetin e mean.
For ezample, if I pray with language wey nobody undastand, my spirit dey pray, but my mind nor undastand di tins wey I dey pray for.
So wetin I go do? Bikos e get time wey I go pray with my spirit and time wey I suppose pray with my mind. Sometaim, I suppose sing with my spirit and oda time, I go sing with my mind.
If some strenjas dey for where una for dey woship God for spirit and dem nor undastand una, how dem go take know wen to sey, “Amen”?
Una fit really dey woship God well-well, but nobody go gain from am, bikos dem nor undastand wetin una dey tok.
I tank God sey I dey tok with difren-difren language pass all of una.
But wen I dey church, e betta make I speak five betta words to tish odas, dan to speak 10,000 words wey pipol nor undastand.
My brodas and sistas, make una stop to tink like small shidren. Instead make una dey tink like mature pipol and dey innocent like pikin wey dem just born.
God word sey: “I go use strenjas wey dey speak wetin odas nor undastand, take tok to my pipol. Dem go tok to dem with strenj language, but my pipol nor go listin to mi.”
So, language wey odas nor undastand, fit mean sometin to pipol wey nor bilive, but nor bi to pipol wey bilive.
So if di whole church bigin tok with difren-difren language, den some pipol wey bi unbilivers or doz wey nor undastand kon waka enter di church, dem nor go tink sey all of una don dey kraze?
But if evribody dey profesai and unbilivers or pipol wi nor undastand enter di church, dem go know sey dem bi sinnas and dem go won turn from dia sin kom meet God, bikos of wetin una dey tok.
Den God go tell una di sekret wey dey dia heart. Den dem go knee down kon tell God sey, “Wi don really bilive sey yu dey with dis pipol.”
My friends, wen una gada to woship, una must do evritin to help one anoda. Na so e suppose bi wen somebody dey tish, sing, profesai, tok with difren-difren language or dey esplain wetin di pesin tok.

Wen una dey togeda, make e nor pass two or three pipol wey go tok with difren-difren language wey pipol nor undastand. One pesin go tok, before anoda and make pesin dey, wey go esplain give odas wetin di pesin dey tok.
If nobody dey wey go fit esplain wetin yu dey tok, make yu nor tok at-all for di meetin, but yu fit tok am between yu and God.
Two or three pesin fit profesai and evry oda pesin must listin well-well.
And if one among di pipol wey sidan receive message from God, di pesin wey dey tish must stop make di pesin for tok.
Make di pipol nor tok at wons, so dat all of una go learn sometin and una go dey okay.
Pesin wey bi profet must dey ready to stop, so dat anoda pesin go tok, bikos profet suppose to fit kontrol en own spirit,
bikos God wont make dem do evritin well.
Wen God pipol meet for church,
make wimen nor dey tok. Make dem kwayet dey listin, just as Moses Law tish.
If dem won know about sometin, dem fit ask dia husband wen dem rish house. Bikos na disgrace for woman to tok for church.
God message nor start with una and nor bi only una don hear am.
If una dey tink of unasef as profet or pesin wey di Spirit dey use, den una go know sey I dey rite only di tins wey God kommand mi.
So make una nor listin to anybody wey nor bilive wetin I dey rite.
My friends, make una dey try to profesai and make una nor stop anybody wey dey tok with difren-difren language even doh odas nor undastand wetin e dey tok.
But make una dey do tins as e suppose to bi.
My brodas and sistas, I wont make una remember di gospel wey I prish give una,
di one wey una asept and dey stand on. Na dis gospel go save una if una whole di message wey I prish give una well-well, unless una faith nor strong.
Bikos na wetin I receive, naim bi di first important tin wey I give una; sey Christ die for awa sins as dem rite for God word
and dem beri am, den God raiz am up afta three days as dem rite for God word.
Christ appear to Pita, den to di twelf apostles.
Den e appear to more dan five hundred bilivers. Some of dem still dey alive, but some don die.
Den e appear to James, den to all di apostles.
Finally, e appear to mi; even doh I bi like pikin wey dem born before di time rish,
bikos na mi small pass among all di apostles. But, I kause many wahala for God church, so dem nor suppose koll mi apostle.
But God kind! I bi wetin I bi and God mesi for mi, nor bi yeye tin. I dey work pass any oda apostle; aldo na God grace dey help mi.
But e nor mean anytin if I prish or dem prish, as long as all of una bilive di message wey wi dey prish.
Naw, if wi dey prish sey God raiz Jesus from deat, wetin make some pipol among una dey sey resureshon nor dey?
If resureshon nor dey, dat mean sey Christ nor raiz-up from grave.
And if Christ nor raiz-up, den awa prishin and una faith nor mean anytin.
So, if resureshon nor dey, dat mean sey, evritin wey wi don tok about God, na lie, bikos wi sey E raiz Jesus from deat wen E nor raiz am.
If resureshon nor dey, na-im bi sey Christ nor raiz-up from deat.
If God nor raiz Christ from deat, den una faith dey yuzles and una still dey inside una sin.
And doz wey bilive Christ before dem die, don lost bi dat.
Bikos if na only for dis life wi get hope for Christ, den awa kase worse pass any oda pesin own for dis world.
But God don raiz Christ from deat! And E make us dey sure sey, oda pipol go raiz-up from deat too.
Just as pipol go die bikos of Adam, na so too wi go raiz-up kom life, bikos of Christ.
Adam bring deat kom meet all of us, but Christ bring life kom.
But all of us must wait for awa turn. Na Christ God first raiz kom life and Christ go raiz en pipol wen e kom back.
Den afta Christ don distroy all pawas, di world go end and e go give di kingdom to God wey bi di Papa.
Christ go rule until e don put all en enemies under en pawa
and di last enemy wey e go distroy, na deat.
Wen God word sey, e go put evritin under en pawa, e nor mean sey, God dey among dem. Bikos na God put evritin under Jesus Christ pawa.
And wen evritin don dey under God pikin pawa, e go kon put ensef under God wey put evritin under en pikin pawa. Den God go kon bi evritin to evribody.
If resureshon nor dey, wetin make dem dey baptize pipol for Christ?
And wetin make us dey risk awa life
kon dey face deat evriday? Na di pride wey I get for una, bikos of awa Oga God Jesus Christ, naim make mi dey tok all dis tins.
If resureshon nor dey, wetin kon bi my gain, afta I don fight wiked animal for Efesus? Na bikos of pride make mi do am? If na so, e go good make wi dey chop and drink bikos tumoro wi go die.
Make una nor let anybody deceive una, “Bad friends dey spoil good karata.”
Make una get sense and stop to dey kommit sin. I still dey sopraiz sey some pipol among una nor know God.
Some among una dey ask sey, “How pipol wey don die go take kom dis world back? Wish kind body dem go get?”
Una bi fool! Wetin pesin plant nor dey grow, unless di seed first die.
Wetin una plant, na ordinary seed, but na di full plant dey grow kom out.
Dis na bikos God dey give dem di kind body wey E wont make di plant get.
Pipol, animals, birds and fish, na flesh God take make all of dem, but all of dem get difren flesh.
As evritin for heaven get body, na so too evritin for dis eart get body. But one body difren from di oda ones.
Di sun nor bi like di moon; di moon nor bi like di star and di stars difren from each oda.
Na so e go bi afta wi don raiz-up from deat. Dis body wey wi get naw, go die, but di body wey wi go take raiz from deat, go dey forever.
Wen dem beri dis body, e dey weak and go rotin, but wen God don raiz us up from deat, di body go kon dey fine and strong forever.
As Fisical body dey, na so too spiritual body dey. And awa Fisical body go shange to spiritual body.
Di first man na Adam and God word sey, “Dis Adam na pesin wey God kreate like us. But Jesus, wey bi di last Adam, na pesin wey dey give life to pipol.”
Wi si sey di one wey get spiritual body nor first kom. E kom afta di one wey get Fisical body.
Na san God take make di first man, but di sekond man kom from heaven.
Evribody body for eart, bi like di first man and evribody body for heaven, bi like di sekond man own.
Just as wi bi like di first man wey kom from eart, wi go bi like di sekond man wey kom from heaven.
My friends, I wont make una know sey awa body wey get blood go rotin. Dat mean sey dis kind body, nor go fit enter God kingdom wey go dey forever.
I won tell una one big sekret: Nor bi all of us go die, but all of us go shange.
Before wi klose awa eye open am, e go don happen. As dem dey blow di last trumpet, all doz wey don die go raiz. All of us go shange, so dat wi nor go die again.
Awa body wey don die and rotin go kon shange to body wey nor go ever die or rotin.
Di body wey wi get naw, dey weak and e go die. But God go shange am to body wey go dey forever. So wetin dem rite for God word go kon happen sey: “Deat nor fit win di fight!”
“Yu deat! Where yor pawa?
Yu deat! How yu go take shaut sey yu win?”
Na sin dey make deat win and na di law dey kause sin.
So, make wi tank God wey give us viktory thru awa Oga God Jesus Christ.
So my friends, make una dey strong and nor let anytin shake una. Make una always dey do God work, bikos una know sey, evritin wey una do for God, get gain.
Wen una kollect money from God pipol, I wont make una do as I tell di pipol wey dey di church for Galatia sey make dem do.
Evry Sunday, make each pesin dey keep some money for korna from di one wey e don work, as God help am rish, so dat una nor go nid to kollect money wen I kom.
Wen I kom, I go send pipol wey una choose kon give dem leta as dem dey karry una gifts go Jerusalem.
But if una sey make I go too, den, dem go follow mi go.
And afta I don finish for Masidonia, I hope to kom si
and stay with una for sometaim. May bi I fit stay till dry sizin finish, so dat una go fit help mi for anywhere wey I won go.
If God go let mi, I nor go one branch si una for small time naw, bikos I go like kom leta, so dat I go fit spend more time with una.
But I go stay for Efesus until Pentekost go finish,
bikos plenty work dey wait for mi for der, even doh di shalenge strong well-well.
Wen Timoti kom, make una nor make am fear at-all, bikos na God work wey I dey do, naim e dey do too.
So make evribody respet am, den make una send am kom meet mi with peace, bikos I dey espect am with di oda brodas.
I don try well-well make Apollos for fit follow oda bilivers kom visit una, e nor won kom naw, but e go kom leta.
Make una shine una eye and dey strong for una faith and stand with boldness.
For evritin wey una dey do, make una dey show love.
Una know sey na Stefanas and en family first bilive God for Akaia. Dem don do evritin wey dem fit do for God pipol. My friends, I wont make una
dey obey dis leaders and doz wey dey follow una do God work.
I dey happy sey Stefanas, Fortunatus and Akaikus don kom; dem kom ripresent una
and dem don let belle sweet mi, just as dem make belle sweet una. E good make wi dey tok about pipol like dem.
Pipol for di church wey dey Asia aria dey greet una; Akwila and Priscilla with di church pipol wey dey meet for dia house, dey greet una too.
All di brodas sey make I greet una.
Na mi Paul, rite dis leta with my own hand.
Anybody wey nor love Christ, curse dey en head!
Make awa Oga God Jesus Christ grace dey with una.
Make my love for Jesus Christ, dey with all of una too.
II Corinthians: Paul, wey bi Jesus Christ apostle, bikos na so God wont am, naim and Timoti awa broda, rite dis leta go give God pipol for di church wey dey Korint and to all di good brodas for Akaia.
Make God awa Papa and Oga God Jesus Christ give una grace and peace.
Make wi tank God wey bi awa Oga God Jesus Christ Papa, di God wey dey give mesi and konfort,
E dey help us wen wi dey trobol, so dat wi go fit help odas thru di help wey E help us.
Just as wi sofa with Christ, na so too wi go get help from God thru Christ.
If wi sofa, na for una good and salvashon; if wi dey okay, den una go fit bear di kind sofa wey wi bear.
So, wi get hope about una, bikos wi know sey as una dey follow us sofa, na so una go still follow us get konfort.
My brodas and sistas, wi wont make una know about di wahala wey wi face for Asia aria. Di trobol wey wi face, heavy well-well and life kon taya us.
True-true, wi tink sey wi go die. But dis happen so dat wi nor go just trust awasef, but wi go trust God wey dey wake pipol from deat.
E save us from deat and E go diliver us. Wi don put awa hope for en hand sey E go diliver us again.
As una don join dey pray for us, na so too God go ansa all di many prayers wey una dey pray for us, den E go bless us and many pipol go kon tank am, bikos of wetin E dey do for us.
Wi dey happy, bikos wi know sey di way wi dey live awa life for dis world and how wi dey bihave with una, dey show sey na God send us thru en pawa, nor bi human being own.
Bikos evritin wey I rite, na wetin una go fit read and undastand. But I hope sey una go undastand am well,
just as una don undastand us rish and na wi make una dey proud and na una go make us proud too, for di day wey Jesus go kom.
Na with dis mind I bi won take kom meet una before, so dat wi go bless una again.
Bikos I plan to visit una wen I dey go Masidonia and wen I dey kom back, so dat una go help mi wen I dey travel go Judea.
So, wen I dey plan dis tins, I nor tink before I do am? Wen I dey plan, I dey plan bikos of wetin I wont? Or na bikos I ready to sey, “Yes, yes” or “No, no” at wons?
But as God dey faithful, wetin wi dey prish give una nor bi make e for bi just “Yes” or “No.”
Bikos God Pikin, Jesus Christ, di One wey mi, Silas and Timoti dey prish give una, nor bi “Yes” and “No.” But from biginnin, na Jesus bi God “Yes.”
And evritin wey God promise us, na “Yes” thru Jesus Christ. Dat na why awa “Amen” thru Jesus Christ dey give God glory.
Na God make wi and una dey sure sey wi dey inside Christ. Na God choose us from odas
and E don mark us as en own kon put en Spirit for awa heart, so dat wi go dey sure of all di oda tins wey E sey E go give us.
Na God bi my witness, bikos E know my heart! Na bikos I nor won disturb una naim make mi nor go Korint again.
Wi nor dey try to force una to bilive us; wi know sey una faith strong well-well. But wi dey work with una so dat una go dey happy well-well.
So I sey I nor go kom visit una, so dat una nor go vex again.
Bikos if I make una vex, who go make mi dey happy apart from una wey dey vex for mi?
Na dis make mi rite dis tin give una, so dat wen I kom, I nor go kon dey vex for di pipol wey suppose make mi happy, bikos I know sey if I dey happy, una go dey happy too.
Na pain for my heart I take rite dis leta give una, nor bi to make una vex, but na to let una know di kind love wey I get for una.
Naw if anybody don make pesin vex, nor bi only mi e make vex, but na all of una. (I dey tok like dis bikos I nor won too vex for di pesin).
Di way wey una ponish dis pesin, don rish.
So make una forgive and help am, so dat e nor go luz hope and life nor go taya am.
So make una let am know sey una really love am.
I rite dis leta give una, so dat I go know weda una dey obey wetin I tell una.
Wen una forgive pesin for wetin e do, misef go forgi-am. Bikos wen I forgive (if I really nid to forgive), I do am for Christ present, bikos of una,
so dat Satan nor go deceive us, bikos wi know en wayo.
Wen I go prish di Good News for Troas, even doh Christ open door for mi,
my mind nor rest, bikos I nor si awa broda, Titus, for der. So I leave der kon go Masidonia.
But make wi tank God wey make us winners inside Christ. Bikos thru us, many pipol don know tins about Christ, like betta perfume wey dey smell for evriwhere.
Bikos wi bi like sweet smell wey Christ offa give God wey dey spread among doz wey dey save and doz wey don lost.
To doz wey don lost, e bi like sometin wey dey kill; but for doz wey Christ don save, e bi like smell wey dey give life. So, who go fit handle all dis tins?
Wi nor bi like odas wey dey do God word like sey na sometin wey dem fit sell; but bikos na God send us kom, wi dey tok di trut for en present, as Christ savant.
Wi don dey boast about awasef again? Wi nor nid una to rite sey, wi dey good, even doh odas dey wont am like dat!
Na una bi di leta wey Christ rite for awa heart, wey evribody know and dey read.
E klear sey na Christ rite dis leta by ensef kon send am thru us. Nor bi biro dem take rite am, but na di God wey dey alive Spirit dem take rite am, nor bi for paper, but na for awa heart.
Wi get dis kind mind for God, bikos of Jesus Christ.
Wi nor dey sey wi go fit do all dis tins by awasef, but na God give us di pawa wey wi take do dem.

Na God make us fit do dem, so dat wi go serve di new kovenant; dis nor bi di law wey dem rite, but na di one wey koncern God Spirit, bikos di law wey dem rite dey bring deat, but di Spirit dey give life.
Di ministry wey dem rite for slate bring deat kom and di glory wey follow am, nor let Israel pipol fit look Moses face. If di glory wey dey Moses face, fade bikos e dey under di law,
den how di Spirit ministry wey get glory, go kon bi, since e nor dey fade?
Bikos if glory dey for di law wey make God kondemn pipol, den di Spirit glory wey dey give life, na how E go betta rish?
Wetin get glory naw, nor get glory again, bikos di glory wey di Spirit wey dey kom afta am get, big well-well.
If Moses face get glory, den how di glory wey dey di Pesin face wey nor dey die, go bi?
Na dis hope wi get and naim dey make us tok without fear.
Wi nor bi like Moses wey take klot kover en face, so dat Israel pipol nor go si di glory wey go fade komot.
But dia mind dey klose. And till today, dia mind still block wen dem dey read di old kovenant. Dem neva remove am, bikos na for only Christ body, dem go fit take remove am.
So till today, anytime wey dem read wetin Moses rite, sometin dey kover dia mind,
but wen pesin turn kom meet God, dat tin go komot from en life.
Na God bi di Spirit and anywhere en Spirit dey, pipol go dey free.
All of us wey don bilive Christ, God glory dey show for awa face. So di Spirit dey help us shange, so dat wi go bi like Christ.
So as wi get dis ministry, just as God don show us mesi, awa hope don strong well-well.

But wi don stop to dey do wiked tins wey pipol dey hide dey do; wi nor dey do wayo or lie join God word, but with trut wey evribody fit si, wi dey make evribody know for dia mind sey, wetin wi dey do, dey good for God eye.
But even if dem use klot take kover di gospel wey wi dey prish, doz wey don lost, na only dem nor go si am,
bikos doz wey nor bilive, di gods for dis time don blind dia mind, so dem nor go si lite wey dey dis gospel wey get glory and dis gospel na Christ wey bi God image.
Wi nor dey tok about awasef, but wi dey prish sey, na Jesus Christ bi Oga God and wi bi una slave, bikos of am.
Bikos God wey sey, “Make lite shine from darkness,” Na-im dey shine inside awa heart, so dat E go give us di lite wey show us en glory wey dey Christ face.
But dis betta tin wey God give us, wi dey karry am for inside awa body wey go die like klay pot wey break and na God give us di pawa.
Wi dey face wahala for difren korna, but awa body nor skata; wi dey konfuse sometaim, but wi nor dey luz hope,
pipol dey ponish us, but God nor let us die; dem dey nak us for groun, but dem nor fit distroy us.
As wi dey waka, wi karry Christ deat for awa body, so dat pipol go si Jesus life for awa body too.
Dem always dey won kill wi wey dey alive bikos of Jesus Christ, so dat dem go si Jesus life for awa ordinary body.
Bikos of dis, deat dey work inside us, but life dey work inside una.
But as e bi sey wi get di same spirit wey dey give faith, just as dem rite sey, “I bilive; naim make mi dey tok.” So wisef bilive, naim make us dey tok too.
Wi do like dis, bikos wi know sey di Pesin wey raiz-up Jesus, go still raiz us up with Jesus and E go take wi and una enter en kingdom.
All dis tins na for una good, so dat God grace wey dey rish many pipol evriday, go make pipol dey tank God more-more and all di glory go bi en own.
So, make wi nor luz hope, bikos even if awa body dey die go small-small, di Pesin wey dey inside us, dey fresh evriday.
Bikos di small trobol wey wi dey face naw, go bring glory wey big well-well, wey go last forever and wey betta pass anytin for dis world.
Wi nor dey look for wetin eye fit si, but na wetin eye nor fit si. Bikos wetin eye fit si nor go last, but di tins wey eye nor fit si, dey last forever.
Wi know sey if dis awa house for eart, wey bi awa body skata, God get di one wey wi go stay, wey e bi sey nor bi human being hand build am and e go last forever for heaven.
Bikos for dis awa house for eart, wi dey struggol, bikos wi nor fit wait to wear awa new body for heaven.
Afta wi don wear awa new body for heaven, wi nor go dey naked again.
Wi dey struggol as wi dey dis awa body. Wi dey karry heavy load, bikos wi nor won remove di klot wey bi awa body, but wi won wear heaven own join am, so dat life go swallow dis awa body wey fit die.
Naw, di Pesin wey prepare us for dis tins, na God wey give us di Spirit, so dat wi go dey sure of all di oda tins wey E get for us.
So, wi dey always get mind and wi know sey, as long as wi dey alive for dis eart, wi nor dey where God dey,
bikos wi dey live awa life with faith, nor bi with wetin wi dey si.
So wi dey always get di mind sey wi go die komot from dis world, so dat wi go-go stay with Jesus Christ for where e dey.
So, weda wi dey alive or wi don die, wi dey do evritin wey wi fit do to make Christ happy.
Bikos all of us must stand for Christ front and e go judge us akordin to di tins wey wi do wen wi dey dis eart; weda dem good or bad.
So, bikos wi know wetin e mean to fear God, naim make us dey prish and beg pipol. But God know us well-well and I hope sey una know us well-well for una mind too.
Wi nor dey try to tok make una for sey wi dey good, but wi dey give una shance to boast, so dat una go fit ansa pipol wey dey boast with wetin eye fit si, but nor bi wetin dey dia mind.
If wi dey kraze, na bikos of God; but if wi nor dey kraze, na bikos of una.
Bikos na Christ love dey kontrol us since wi know sey, Christ die for evribody; so evribody don die.
And e die for evribody, so dat evribody wey dey live nor go live for diasef again, but for di Pesin wey die and wake-up afta three days.
So naw, wi nor dey look anybody like ordinary human being. Even doh wi bin know Christ like dat before, wi nor know am like dat again.
So, if any man dey inside Christ, e don dey new, Christ don klean di bad tins wey e do before and evritin don turn to new one!
All dis tins dey kom from God wey make us en friends bikos of Christ and E still give us di ministry wey go make pipol bi en friend.
So, bikos of Christ, God dey turn di world from en enemy, to en friend. E nor dey kount pipol sins against dem and E don give us di message wey go make pipol bi en friend.
Wi dey ripresent Christ, so dat God go tok to una, thru us. Wi dey beg una bikos of Christ sey, “Make una shange kon bi God friend!”
Di One wey nor dey sin, God make am awa sin, so dat inside am, wi go kon dey good for God eye.
Naw, bikos wi bi fellow workers, wi dey beg una make una nor waste God grace wey una don receive.
Bikos E sey, “I hear una for di rite time and wen di day for Mi to save una rish, I help una.” Si, na di rite time bi dis; na naw bi di day for salvashon!
Wi nor dey do anytin wey go make anybody vex, so dat nobody go si any fault for awa work.
But wi dey show sey wi bi God savant for evritin wey wi dey do. Wi dey sofa well-well and face trobol for dis time; even for wiked times;
for di time wey dem dey beat us and put us for prison; for di time wey dem dey fight; for wahala time; for nite wey wi nor fit sleep and for hongry time.
Wi dey do all dis tins with awa klean life, di tins wey wi know; di patient wey wi get; di good wey wi dey do for pipol; di Holy Spirit wey wi get; betta love wey wi show pipol;
thru di word wey wi dey tish with God pawa; with wetin wi take dey defend awa raitiousness both for awa rite and left hand;
for di time wey dem honor or disgrace us; for di time wen dem tok bad about us or praiz us; di time wey dem do us like sey wi dey tok lie, but wi dey tok trut.
Dat time, e bi like sey nobody know us, but evribody know us; e bi like sey wi don die, but wi dey alive; wi still dey alive like pipol wey dem dey ponish, but dem nor fit kill us;
wi dey like sey wi dey vex, but wi dey always happy; wi bi like poor pipol, but wi dey make many pipol rish; wi bi like who nor get anytin, but wi get evritin.
So, una wey bi Korint pipol, wi don open awa heart tell una evritin.
Wi nor dey whole awa love from una, but na una dey whole una love from us.
So make wi make am ekwol. I dey tok to una like sey una bi my shidren, so make una open una heart for us too.
Make una nor make friend with pipol wey nor bilive, bikos, na wish kind friend raitiousness and bad tin won bi, or na wetin lite and darkness get togeda?
And na wish kind agriment Christ and devil get? Wetin koncern pesin wey bilive and pesin wey nor bilive?
Wish kind business God Temple and juju get? Bikos wi bi God Temple, just as God sey, “I go stay inside dem and waka among dem, den, I go bi dia God and dem go bi my pipol.”
Christ still sey, “Make una kom out and separate unasef from dem,” and “Make una nor tosh anytin wey nor dey klean, den I go welkom una
kon bi una Papa and una go bi my shidren.” Na so God wey get all di pawa, tok.
So, as God don promise us all dis tins, make wi wosh awasef komot from evritin wey go fit make awa body or awa soul dirty, so dat wi go dey holy as wi dey respet God.
Make una allow di gospel enter una heart bikos wi nor do bad to anybody or fall anybody business or play anybody wayo.
I nor dey tok dis one to kondemn una, bikos I don tell una before sey, una dey awa mind and wi with una go die and live togeda with Christ.
For inside all dis sofa wey wi dey sofa, I still trust and dey boast well-well about una, bikos I get mind for una and my happiness full dey trowey.
Even wen wi enter Masidonia, wi nor rest at-all, but dem trobol us from difren korna; wahala for outside, fear for inside.
But God wey dey help pipol wey nor happy, naim kon help us wen Titus kom.
Wi kon dey happy, nor bi only sey Titus kom, but bikos of di advise wey una gi-am, bikos e tell us how una won si mi; how una dey vex and worry for mi and my happiness kon pass as e bi before.
Bikos even if I make una vex with my leta, e nor pain mi sey I rite am (even doh e pain mi as I know sey e make una vex, aldo una vexnashon nor tey).

Naw I dey happy, nor bi bikos una dey vex, but bikos una vexnashon make una turn from sin kom meet God. Na so God plan una vexnashon, so dat bad tins nor go happen to una bikos of dis vexnashon wey wi kause for una.
Bikos wen God make pipol sorry for di sin wey dem kommit, dem go turn kom meet am, den God go save dem and dem nor go regret again. But di vexnashon wey dis world dey bring, na deat dey end am.

Naw, make una si wetin dis vexnashon wey God plan don do for una: Si how una work for God bi naw; si how una won show sey una hand klean; si as una dey vex bikos of di bad tin wey happen; si how una dey sopraiz; si as una dey won si and worry about us; si how una ready to ponish anybody wey do bad! For evritin, una don show sey una hand klean for dis matter.
I nor rite dis leta give una bikos of di pesin wey do bad or di pesin wey dem do di bad to, but na to show una how una won work for God bikos of us.
So, Christ don make awa mind strong. Even as awa heart don strong rish, wi dey happy more-more for Titus wey kom, bikos all of una don let en mind rest.
I don boast gi-am about una and una nor let mi shame, but as evritin wey wi tell una na true, na so all di boast wey wi boast about una give Titus, na trut too.
And wen e remember how una obey and welkom am with respet and fear, di love wey e get for una, kon strong well-well.
Evritin dey make mi happy, bikos di trust wey I trust una, nor dey shake.
Awa brodas and sistas, wi don tell una about di grace wey God give di pipol for di church for Masidonia sey,
even wen dia sofa strong well-well; dem still dey happy and wen dem nor get money at-all; dem still dey fine money give us.
I bi witness sey dem dey give akordin to wetin dem get. Sometaim, dem dey give pass wetin dem get. Nobody dey force dem to do like dat, but dem dey do am from dia own mind
and dem dey beg us make wi let dem do am, so dat dem go get di blessing wey dey follow pipol wey dey give.
Dem dey do like dis, nor bi only as wi wont am, but na bikos dem don first give demsef to God, den dem kon give demsef to us as God wont.
Na dis make us beg Titus sey, as e don start, e good make e finish dis good work wey e dey do, bikos e love una.
But as una dey do well for evritin: For faith; for tok; for wetin una know and as una won do di work well, bikos una love us, make una make sure sey una dey do dis good with all una heart.
Nor bi sey I dey kommand una, but I won si weda una love na really won like di oda church pipol own.
Una know di grace wey awa Oga God Jesus Christ get; even doh e dey rish, e kon turn poor man bikos of una, so dat thru en poverty, una go dey rish.
Na wetin I tink for di matter bi dis: Una start well last year for how una dey give and how una dey won give,
so e betta make una just finish wetin una start, so dat di way wey una take start, na so too una go still take finish am as una pawa rish.
Bikos if e really dey una mind to do am, anytin wey una give akordin to wetin una get, God go asept am, but nor bi wetin una nor get.
I nor dey tok dis one, so dat wen una don give oda pipol, dem go kon get and una go kon dey sofa, but na to make sure sey tins dey ekwol.
As tins bi naw, di money wey una get go help dem as dem nor get, so dat one day, di money wey dem go get go still help una wen una nor get, dat time evritin go kon dey ekwol, bikos
dem rite for God word sey: “Di pesin wey gada plenty, nor go get plenty and di pesin wey gada small, go get di one wey go rish am.”
Wi tank God wey give Titus di kind mind wey I get to help una.
Bikos e nor only gri for wetin wi ask am, but e dey help una well-well and nobody force am kom meet una.
And di broda wey all di church dem dey praiz, bikos of how e dey prish di gospel, wi dey send am follow Titus too and

bikos of di work wey di broda dey do, di church don choose am as di pesin wey go dey follow us travel as wi dey give dis good gift, so dat all di glory go bi God own and dis go show sey wi dey ready to help.
Wi dey do like dis, so dat nobody go komplain as wi dey share dis gift.
Bikos wi dey try to do wetin dey rite, nor bi only for God eye, but for pipol eye too.
So wi dey send awa broda follow dem; awa broda wey wi don test plenty times kon si sey e get di mind to help and e ready to help naw, bikos e trust una well-well.

But for Titus, en na my patina and e dey follow mi work to help una. As for di oda brodas wey dey follow am, na all di church sey make dem kom meet una, so dat dem go tell una about di glory wey dey inside Christ.
So make una show dem sey, una love dem, so dat all di pipol for di church go know sey, di way wey wi dey boast about una, na true.
I nor nid to rite to una about how to help God pipol wey dey Jerusalem,

bikos I know sey una one help dem. I always dey boast give Masidonia pipol sey, una wey dey Akaia, dey always won help and una don ready to give money since last year. And di way wey una dey won help, don make some for dem won help too.
But I dey send dis brodas kom meet una to make sure sey una dey ready; as I don tell dem before sey, una don already kollect money. So make una nor let shame katch mi, as I dey boast about una.
But if anybody for Masidonia follow mi kom meet una, den e si sey una neva ready to give, shame go katch us, (I nor go tok too mush) bikos wi trust una.
Naim make mi beg dis brodas make dem go for my front before di time go rish and make dem help una arrange di money wey una promise, so dat una go do am with una mind and nobody go force una.
Na wetin I dey tok bi dis; Pesin wey plant small, go harvest small, but di pesin wey plant plenty, go harvest plenty.
Make each of una give as e plan for en mind; nor bi with regret or like sey dem force am, bikos God love pesin wey dey give with happiness.
God go provide evritin wey una nid. Den, una go always get evritin wey una nid and di one wey una go fit give odas.
Just as dem rite for God word, “E don skata for evriwhere, e don give to poor pipol and en raitiousness, go dey forever.”
Bikos na God dey give seed to farmer and provide bread wey pipol go chop. Like dis too, E go provide and di tins wey una nid, go plenty well-well and dem go last forever.
E go make una get enough money for evritin, so dat evritime, una go fit dey give well-well and di pipol wey una give money, go always dey tank God.
Bikos dis work wey una dey do so, nor just dey help only God pipol, but e dey always make pipol, tank God.
Bikos of una work, pipol go praiz God, bikos una dey obey Christ word wey una bilive and una dey share evritin wey una get with good mind.
So, bikos of God big grace wey E give una, pipol dey pray for una with strong love.
Na dis make us dey tank God for dis gift wey pesin mout nor fit tok.
Naw, mi Paul (I kwayet wen I dey with una, but my mout dey sharp naw wen I don leave una). Christ wey nor dey karry body up, wey dey gentol,
I take am beg una, so dat wen I kom, I nor go nid to tok with vexnashon about pipol wey si us like yeye pipol (bikos I dey fear sey na so e go bi).
Bikos even doh wi dey for dis world, wi nor dey fight as pipol wont am.
Di tins wey wi take dey fight, nor bi dis world own, but na God make am strong, so dat wi go fit skata all di strong place where wiked pipol dey. Wi dey skata trobol;
pipol wey dey karry body up; doz wey nor wont make odas know God and as wi dey do like dis, pipol dey obey Christ.
And wen una don show sey una dey fear God, wi go always dey ready to ponish doz wey dey disobey God.
Na only tins wey eye fit si, naim una know. If anybody dey sure sey e bilong to Christ, make e tink about am again: If e bilong to Christ, den wi na Christ own too.
Bikos if I boast small about di authority wey Jesus give us make wi take build, instead of to distroy una, I nor go shame to do am.
I nor wont make una dey fear, bikos of wetin I rite,
bikos some pipol dey sey, “En letas dey heavy and get pawa well-well, but if yu si am for groun, e nor get pawa and e nor even fit tok well.”
Make doz pipol know sey, “Wetin wi tok for leta wen wi nor dey with una, wi dey do am wen wi dey with una.”
Wi nor go kompare awasef with doz wey sey dem good well-well or kon put awasef for di same group. But wen dem dey measure and kompare demsef with demsef, e dey show sey dem nor get sense.
But wi nor go boast pass as wi suppose boast; wi go boast akordin to di work wey God give us and una dey inside dat work too.
Wi nor dey do awa work pass as wi suppose do am wen wi dey with una, bikos na wi bi first to bring Christ message kom meet una.
Wi nor dey boast anyhow about di work wey oda pipol do, but wi dey hope sey as una faith dey grow well-well, awa work among una go big, just as God share am give us,
so dat wi go fit prish di gospel for oda kountries wey far pass una own. So make wi nor boast about di work wey odas do for oda aria.
But pesin wey won boast, make e boast about di work wey Jesus do.
Bikos nor bi who praiz ensef dey rite, but na di pesin wey God like to praiz.
For wetin I won tok naw, make una bear with mi like sey I nor get sense!
I dey jealous for una with God jealousy, bikos I promise sey na one man una go marry. Like woman wey nor no man, na so I won give una to Christ.
But I dey fear sey, just as di snake deceive Eve with en wayo, una mind fit spoil komot for di true and di way wey una dey follow Christ.
So, if anybody kon prish anoda Christ wey wi nor prish for una and una receive anoda spirit wey una nor receive before, or anoda gospel wey una neva hear before, dat mean sey, una don asept dem well.
I nor tink sey doz “supper apostle” betta pass mi.
But even doh I nor know how to tok, I know book. True-true, wi don let una know dis tins wey happen.
As I honbol mysef dey do di work, na sin I kommit? I dey do am, so dat una go fit grow up and wen I prish give una, I nor kollect money.
I shit di oda church dem, bikos I dey kollect money from dem, so dat I go dey work with una for free!

Wen I nid anytin for di time wen I dey with una, I nor put my load for anybody head, bikos awa brodas wey Masidonia dey give mi evritin wey I nid. I nor allow mysef to bi problem for anybody and I nor go ever do am.
True-true, as Christ trut dey inside mi, nobody go fit stop mi for di way I dey boast for Akaia.
Why? Na bikos I nor love una? No! God know sey I love una!
And I go kontinue to do wetin I dey do, so dat doz apostles nor go get rizin to boast sey, dem dey do di same work with us.
Bikos dem bi fake apostles; pipol wey dey lie and pritend like sey dem bi Jesus Christ apostles.
E nor sopraiz us, bikos even Satan dey pritend sey en na angel wey get lite.
So e nor sopraiz us sey, en savants dey pritend too like sey dem bi savant wey dey do wetin good for God eye. For di end, dem go gain wetin fit di tins wey dem dey do.
I dey tell una again, make anybody nor tink sey I bi fool. But if una tink so, den make una asept mi as fool, so dat misef go boast small.
Wetin I dey boast about so, nor bi as Christ wont make I boast, instead, I dey tok like fool.
Since some pipol dey boast like dis world pipol, make mi mysef still boast.
Una sey una get sense well-well, yet una dey use happiness asept wetin fool dey tok.
Una like make pesin turn una to slave; use and shit una; take evritin wey una get, den beat and slap una anyhow.
(Na shame for mi, but I must tell una sey awa heart nor strong rish to do una doz kind tins!) But anytin wey anybody fit boast about (I dey tok like fool naw o-o), misef fit boast about dat tin too.
Na Hibru pipol dem bi? Misef na Hibru pesin too. Dem bi Israel pipol? Mi na Israel pesin too. Na Abraham bi dia grand-grand papa? Na dat same Abraham bi my grand-grand papa too.

Na Christ savants bi? (I don dey tok like sey I dey kraze again!) Misef na Christ savant wey betta pass dem! I don work hard pass dem, I don dey prison plenty times pass dem, dem don beat mi well-well pass dem, I don nearly die plenty times.
Na five times Jew pipol don flog mi thirty-nine times.
Rome pipol don beat mi three times. Dem stone mi wons until I nearly die. Sheep wey I dey inside, don spoil for wota three times. I don float wons for wota from morning go rish di next day.

I don travel many times wey I enter trobol for wota; for tif hand, even for my kountry pipol and Gentile pipol hand; both for inside town; for wildaness and from pipol wey dey pritend sey dem bi awa brodas.
I don do hard work; nor sleep for many nites; food and wota go dey hongry mi; many times, I nor get food to chop. I don dey for kold and I nor get klot to kover body.
Apart from dis tins, my mind dey heavy mi evriday as I dey tink of how I go take help all di pipol wey dey God church.
If pesin dey weak, misef dey weak too. If dem deceive pesin enter sin, e dey pain mi well-well.
If I go must boast, den I go boast about di tins wey show sey I dey weak.
God wey bi awa Oga God Jesus Christ Papa, wey dem go praiz forever, know sey nor bi lie I dey tok.
For Damaskus, King Aretas sey make di govnor put sojas for di town gate, so dat dem go arrest mi.
But awa pipol for der kon put mi for basket wey dem tie rope put kon drop mi small-small from di window and na so I take eskape from di man hand.
E good to dey boast, even doh gain nor dey inside. I go still dey tok about di vishon and revelashon wey Jesus Christ show mi.
Fourteen years ago, I know one man wey bi Christ savant. Weda na for vishon or Fisical, I nor know, but God know. God karry am go di heaven wey high pass.
And I know dis man (but na only God know weda e dey for en body or for spirit).
God karry am go paradise and e hear tins wey dey too holy to tok; tins wey God nor give human being pawa to tok.
Na dat pesin make mi dey boast and I nor go boast about mysef, escept di tins wey show sey, I nor dey strong.
Even if I won boast, I nor go bi fool, bikos na trut I go still tok, but I nor do am make anybody for tink sey na mi know pass, bikos e si and hear mi dey tok
about di betta tins wey I si for vishon. Make I for nor dey karry body up, God put sometin inside mi, wey bi Satan messenja, so dat e go dey trobol mi.
Na three times I ask Christ sey, make e take dis tin komot from my body.
But e tell mi, “Di grace wey I give yu strong rish, bikos my pawa dey show wen yu dey weak.” So, I go boast well-well about how I nor dey strong, so dat Christ pawa go dey show for my body.
I dey happy as I dey weak with all di curse, trobols, ponishment and wahala wey I dey sofa bikos of Christ, bikos anytime wey I dey weak, na dat time, I dey-dey strong.
I don turn to fool! Na una force mi, bikos una suppose to praiz mi. Even if I nor bi anytin, e nor get anytin wey doz una “supper apostles” take betta pass mi.
True-true for una present, wi do mirakles and wonders to show sey wi bi apostles too.
Bikos di way wey dem trit us worse pass di oda church, escept sey I nor dey put my load for una head. Make una forgive mi for dis tins wey I do!

Si, for di third time, I don ready to kom visit una and I nor go put my load for una head, bikos na una I wont and nor bi wetin una get. Nor bi pikin suppose pay for dia papa and mama food, but na papa and mama, dey pay for dia pikin food.
I go dey happy to spend all my money and even my life, as long as una soul go dey save. Una love for mi dey small, bikos my love for una plenty?
Even if e bi like dat, I nor put my load for una head. But dem sey, bikos I bi wayo pesin, I dey deceive una!
I nor play anybody wayo thru di pesin wen I send kom meet una, abi I dey lie?
Abeg Titus make e visit una and I send dat broda make e follow am kom. Dem play una wayo? Nor bi di same mind wi awasef take follow una? Abi nor bi di same way wi dey bihave?
May bi una dey tink sey wi dey tok dis tins to defend awasef. No! Wi dey tok to una like dis as Christ savant and na God bi awa witness. Evritin wey wi dey do, na to make una strong.

Bikos I dey fear sey wen I kom, I nor go like wetin I go si and una nor go like as I go tok. I dey fear sey una go dey kworel, dey jealous each oda; dey vex; dey tink of only unasef; dey tok bad about each oda; dey do aproko; dey karry body up and dey bihave anyhow.

I dey fear sey wen I kom again, God go disgrace mi for una front. And I go kry, bikos many of una still dey sin. Una neva turn from sin kom meet God; una neva turn komot from di ashawo and yeye life wey una dey live.
Na di third time wey I dey kom visit una bi dis. If dem sey pesin do bad, two or three pipol must sey, na true, before pipol go bilive am.

Wen I dey with una for my sekond visit, I tell una wey dey sin before about dis tins. Even doh I nor dey with una naw, I dey tok am again sey, if I kom again, I nor go sorry for anybody, but I go ponish am,
bikos una sey make I show sey Christ dey tok thru mi. Christ nor dey weak to una, bikos e show en pawa among una.

True-true, bikos e nor show en pawa, na dat make dem fit nail am for cross, but e dey alive naw, bikos of God pawa. Aldo wi dey weak with am, but wi go dey alive togeda with am, bikos of God pawa wey wi get.
Make una test unasef to know weda una still dey inside di faith; e good make una shek unasef well-well! Una nor know sey Christ dey inside una? May bi una don fail di test!
I hope sey una go know sey wi neva fail di test!
Wi dey pray to God make una nor do anytin bad; wi nor dey do am to show sey wi pass di test, but make una for do wetin good, even if e bi like sey wi fail di test.
Wi nor go fit do anytin against di trut, but na di trut go make us do evritin.
Belle dey sweet us wen ever wi dey weak and una dey strong. And na wetin wi dey pray for bi dis, “Una go get evritin wey una suppose get.”
Na dis make mi dey rite all dis tins since I nor dey with una, so dat wen I kom, I nor go vex for una bikos of di authority wey I get and God give mi dis authority to build; nor bi to distroy.

Finally my brodas and sistas, make una use happiness dey do tins as dem suppose bi. Make una take heart, dey greet each oda and live togeda for peace and di God wey get love and peace, go dey with una.
Make una greet each oda for Christian way.
All God pipol for here dey greet una.
Make di grace wey awa Oga God Jesus Christ give us and di love wey God get for us, plus di Holy Spirit fellowship, dey with una.
Galatians: Na mi Paul, rite dis leta, (nor bi human being make mi apostle, but na Jesus Christ and God awa Papa wey raiz am from deat).
Mi and di brodas wey dey here, dey greet una wey dey Galatia.
Make God awa Papa and Oga God Jesus Christ grace and peace, dey with una.
Na Jesus die for awa sins, bikos na so God awa Papa wont am.
Make all glory bi en own forever and ever! Amen.
I sopraiz sey una kwik turn back from di Pesin wey koll una with en grace kon bigin follow oda tishing.
Nor bi sey anoda gospel really dey, but some pipol dey disturb una, bikos dem won shange wetin wi prish about Christ.
But if wi (or angels wey kom from heaven) tish una difren tins from di one wey wi prish give una before, make God distroy us with fire!
As I tok before, I dey repeat am again, if anybody dey tish difren tins from di ones wey wi prish give una before, make God trow dat pesin for hell!

Una tink sey, I dey try to do tins make pipol for like mi? Abi I dey do wetin God wont? Or I dey try to make belle sweet pipol? If I dey try to make belle sweet pipol, den I nor bi Christ savant again!
My brodas and sistas, I wont make una know sey di gospel wey I dey prish, nor bi human being give mi.
Bikos I nor get or learn am from anybody, but I get am thru di revelashon wey Christ give mi.
Una don hear about di kind life wey I dey live before as Jew pesin; how I trobol di church kon dey try to distroy am.
I grow among Jew pipol kon know di relijon pass many of my mates for my kountry and I know my grand-grand papa dem tradishons.
But God koll mi with en grace kon separate mi even before dem born mi.
E show mi en pikin, so dat I go fit prish about am give Gentile pipol. I nor go meet anybody make e advise mi
and I nor go Jerusalem go meet pipol wey bi apostle before mi, but I komot der go Arabia, den I kon go back to Damaskus.
Afta three years, I go visit Pita for Jerusalem, so dat e go tell mi wetin I go do and I stay with am for fifteen days.
But I nor go si any oda apostle apart from James, wey bi Jesus Christ broda.
God dey si wetin I dey rite, bikos evritin wey I dey rite to una so, na true!
Afta dis, I kon go Siria and Silisia aria.
But di pipol for di church wey dey Judea, nor know mi.
Dem only dey hear sey, “Di pesin wey dey trobol us before, don dey prish di message wey e bin dey try to distroy.”
So dem kon dey praiz God bikos of mi.
Afta fourteen years, I kon go back to Jerusalem with Banabas and Titus.
I go der bikos of di revelashon wey I receive, den I tell dem about wetin I dey prish give Gentile pipol. But I tok with di oga dem, so dat dem go dey sure sey, I dey prish Christ message.
Titus dey with mi; even doh en na Greek pesin, dem nor sey e must sekonsaiz.
Dem diskuss dis matter, bikos of di fake brodas with dia wayo wey dem take dey spy di freedom wey Christ give us, so dat dem go fit make us dia slave.
But wi nor give dem shance, so dat di trut wey dey di gospel, go last for una.
But doz wey tink sey dem bi oga, (wetin dem bi, nor mean anytin to mi; bikos God nor dey support bad tin); dem wey bi leaders for di church nor add anytin to my message.
But dem kon si sey na God sey make I prish en word to pipol wey dem nor sekonsaiz, just as E sey make Pita prish to doz wey dem sekonsaiz,
(Bikos na thru God pawa Pita take prish to Jew pipol and na di same pawa I take dey prish give Gentile pipol too),
so wen James, Pita and John wey bi leaders for di church, si sey God give mi grace, dem kon dey support mi and Banabas sey, “Make wi dey prish give Gentile pipol and doz wey dem sekonsaiz.”
But dem sey make wi always remember poor pipol and na wetin dey my mind to do, bi dat.
But wen Pita kom Antiok, I kon shalenge am, bikos wetin e do, nor good.

Pita dey chop with Gentile pipol until some pipol wey James send, kom rish der. As Pita si dem, e kon stop to chop with Gentile pipol, bikos e dey fear di pipol wey kom, since dem bilive sey evribody must sekonsaiz.
Oda Jew pipol kon dey pritend like Pita, sotey Banabas join dem too.
But wen I si sey dem nor dey do wetin dem rite for God word, I kon tell Pita for dia front, “If yu wey bi Jew, dey do like Gentile pipol, how yu wont take make Gentile pipol live like Jew pipol?”
Wi bi Jew pipol bikos of how dem born us and wi nor bi Gentile pipol wey bi sinnas.

Wi know sey nobody dey free from God judgement, bikos na so di law tok and pipol go only dey free, if dem get faith for Christ. Since wi don bilive Christ, wi suppose to dey do good thru di faith wey wi get for Christ and nor bi to dey do wetin di law tok and wi nor go dey free from judgement, wen wi do only wetin di law tok.
Make wi dey kommit sin as wi dey try to do good, bikos wi get faith for Christ? If na so, dat mean sey Christ don dey support sin!
Naw, if I dey ripair di law wey I don first skata, dat mean sey I dey break God law.
As for di law, I don die to am, so dat I go fit dey alive with God.

I don die with Christ for cross, so nor bi mi dey live again, but na Christ dey live inside mi. Di life wey I dey live naw, na bikos of di good tins wey God pikin do inside mi, bikos e love and die for mi.
I nor go trowey God grace; bikos if na wetin di law tok go make pesin good, den Christ die for nor-tin!
Galatia pipol, una nor get sense at-all! Who turn una to fool naw? Bikos na for una front wi for show sey Jesus Christ die for cross!
Na di tin wey I won know from una, bi dis: Una receive di Spirit, bikos una dey do wetin di law tok or na bikos una bilive wetin wi prish give una?
Na so una mumu rish? True-true, una start with di Holy Spirit, but naw, una won finish di work with human being pawa.
Una sofa dis many tins for nor-tin? True-true, una really sofa for nor-tin.
Wetin make God give una di Spirit to do mirakle? Na bikos una do wetin di law tok or bikos una bilive wetin una hear?
Just as Abraham bilive God and God koll am raitious man,
na so too, doz wey bilive, go bi Abraham shidren.
Dem rite for God word before sey, “E go asept Gentile pipol, wen dem get faith” and na dis make am tell Abraham before di time rish sey, “E go bless evribody, bikos of am.”
So pipol wey bilive, God go bless dem togeda with Abraham, bikos dem bilive.
Pipol wey dey under di law and dem nor dey do evritin wey di law tok, dey under curse, bikos dem rite am sey, “E nor go betta for anybody wey nor dey do evritin wey dey di law.”
Dis one show sey, nobody dey good for God eye, bikos e dey obey di law. So anybody wey dey raitious, must live by faith.
Di law nor dey bring faith, but di pesin wey dey do wetin di law tok, go live by wetin e dey do.
Christ don save us from di curse wey di law bring, bikos e die for cross for us (just as dem rite am, “Anybody wey dem hang for tree, curse dey en head”),
so thru Christ, Abraham blessings go kom meet Gentile pipol and wi go receive di Spirit wey God promise us, thru faith.
My brodas and sistas, make I use wetin dey happen evriday for life take make ezample for una: Wen pipol don make agriment, nobody go fit trow di agriment for korna or add anytin join am.
Wi know sey God make dis promise with Abraham and en pikin. God word nor sey, “to di shidren”, but e sey, “and to yor pikin,” and e mean only one and dat one, na Christ.
Na wetin I dey tok bi dis: Di law wey kom afta four hundred and thirty years, nor get pawa to break di agriment and promise wey God and Abraham don make before.
Bikos if promise dey kom thru di law, den e nor bi promise again. But wi know sey, na thru promise, God take bless Abraham.
Na awa sin make law dey and na so e go bi, until di pikin wey God promise, go kom and na thru angels, God take give us di law thru en profet.
Wi know sey pesin wey bi middo-man dey stand between two pipol, but na only one God dey.
So di law dey against God promise? No! Bikos if di law dey give pesin life, den raitiousness go must kom thru di law.
But God word kondemn evritin and evribody under sin, so dat wi; di pipol wey bilive, go get God promise thru Jesus Christ.
Before faith kom, wi dey under di law, bikos di law whole us like prisonas.
So na di law bi awa tisha before Christ kom, so dat wi go fit tok sey wi dey raitious thru faith.
But since faith don kom, wi nor dey under any tisha again.
Bikos thru Jesus Christ, all of us don bikom God shidren by faith.
Una wey dem don baptize inside Christ, don wear Christ for body like klot.
E nor matter weda una bi Jew or Greek pipol, savant or free pesin, man or woman, bikos all of una dey inside one body for Christ.
And if e bi sey una bilong to Christ, den una bi Abraham shidren and pipol wey go inherit wetin God promise.
